title: Chocolate and Coconut Tart
ingredients:
1. For The Pastry
2. 12 Medjool Dates
3. 60G Desiccated Coconut
4. 30G Almonds
5. 30G Cashews
6. 45G Cocoa Nibs
7. For The Filling
8. 125G Cashews
9. 75G Coconut Oil
10. 8 Medjool Dates
11. 1 Bar Of Barocco Choco Dark Chocolate
12. 1 Tin Of Coconut Milk
13. 2 Tbsp Raw Cocao Powder Or Normal Cocoa Powder
14. 2 Tbsp Vanilla Extract
15. Pinch Of Salt
16. Topping Optional
17. Mixed Berries
18. Crumbled Pistachios
preparation:
1. Grease A 7 Inch Loose-Bottomed Tart Tin With Some Coconut Oil. Cut Two 9 Inch Strips Ofgreaseproof Paper And Line The Tin, One Strip Over The Other. This Will Make It Easier To Liftthe Tart Out Later.
2. Make The Pastry – Roast The Nuts In The Oven For 2 -3 Minutes Until Very Slightlybrowned. Add All The Pastry Ingredients Into A Food Processor And Process Until It Starts Tocome Together. Mold The Raw Pastry Into The Tart Tin, Building Up A Rim Slightly Above The Tin.Place In The Freezer For 5 – 10 Minutes To Set.
3. Make The Filling – Roast The Cashews In The Oven For 2 – 3 Minutes Until Very Slightlybrowned. Melt The Barocco Choco Dark Chocolate Over A Bain Marie And Set Aside To Coolslightly. Add The Rest Of The Filling Ingredients Into A Food Processor And Process Until Thickand Creamy. Add The Cooled, But Melted Chocolate Into The Mixture And Process Again Untilcombined.
4. Pour The Chocolate Cream Into The Pastry Case That You Prepared Earlier And Then Putthe Whole Tart Back Into The Freezer For 5 – 10 Minutes To Set. Gently Lift Out The Tart (Youmay Need To Loosen The Pastry With A Knife) And Top With Berries And A Sprinkling Ofcrumbled Pistachios.

title: Agedashi Tofu with Miso Sauce
ingredients:
1. 2 Blocks Silken Tofu
2. Organic Sunflower Oil For Deepfrying
3. 4 Tbsp Rice Flour
4. 2 Tsp Grated Fresh Root Ginger And Red Radish Slices For Garnish
5. 1 Spring Onion Finely Sliced On The Diagonal To Garnish
6. 2 Tbsp Barley Miso Mixed In A Little Water To Form A Sauce Like Consistency
preparation:
1. Press And Drain The Tofu On Paper Towel Until Dry, Changing The Paper Towel As Required.
2. Put The Oil In A Heavy-Based Deep Frying Pan And Heat To About 180O/350F.
3. Cut Each Tofu Block In Half And Then Half Again.
4. Dust With The Flour, Then Using A Spatula Gently Slide The Tofu Into The Oil And Deep-Fry Until Crisp And Golden.
5. Arrange In Bowls, Pour Over Some Miso Sauce And Garnish With The Grated Ginger, Red Radish And Spring Onion.
6. Note:Don’T Dust The Tofu With The Flour Until You Are Ready To Fry It, Otherwise It Will Become Sticky.

title: Zoodles with Basil and Avocado Pesto
ingredients:
1. 2 Courgettes Zucchini
2. 1 Carrot
3. For The Sauce
4. 1 Avocado
5. 1 Bunch Basil
6. 1 Tbsp Lemon Juice
7. 2 Tbsp Nutritional Yeast
8. 10 Olives Sliced
9. 4 Garlic Cloves Roasted
10. 2 Tomatoes Roasted
11. Pinch Of Chilli Powder Or Smoked Paprika
preparation:
1. You Can Make The Zoodles With A Julienne Peeler Or A Spiraliser.
2. This Recipe Is For Two People, As A Main Course.
3. Heat The Oven To180°C / 350°F / Gas Mark 4.Prepare The Roasted Ingredients First. Slice The Tomatoes Into Eightsegments Each And Arrange On A Sheet Of Parchment Paper, On An Oven Tray. Sprinkle With The Chilli Flakes Or Paprika And Cook For 25 Minutes. Slice The Root Ends From The Garlic Cloves (Without Unpeeling Them) And Add These To The Tomato Tray And Cook For 10 Minutes. Remove From The Oven And Leave To Cool While You Prepare The Sauce.
4. Zoodle The Noodles! This Takes About 10 Minutes, And I Usually Do This While The Tomatoes Are Roasting.
5. To Make The Sauce, Blend Together The Avocado, Basil (Stalks Included), Lemon Juice And Nutritional Yeast.
6. Unpeel The Garlic Cloves, Slice Them, And Combine In A Bowl With The Zoodles, Tomatoes, Olives And Sauce.
7. This Dish Is Great Served With Lemon-Chilli Sauteed Broccoli And Roasted Chickpeas, Which Add A Lovely Crunchy Topping.

title: Baked Golden Zucchini Fries
ingredients:
1. 23 Medium Zucchini Golden If You Can Find Them Sliced Into Thin Fry Size Slices About 14 Inch Thick
2. 1 Cup Allpurpose Flour
3. 1 Cup Breadcrumbs Or Gluten Free Breadcrumbs
4. 12 Tablespoons Italian Seasoning
5. 2 Tablespoons Vegan Parmesan
6. 1 Cup Melted Vegan Butter Or Flax Egg For Oil Free Alternative
7. Marinara Sauce For Serving
preparation:
1. Place 3 Small Clean And Shallow Baking Dishes Or Bowls Side By Side. Fill One With Flour, Another With Butter Or Flax Egg Substitute And The Last With Bread Crumbs.
2. Season The Bread Crumbs With Italian Seasoning And Vegan Parmesan, Mixing Well.
3. Preheat The Oven To 400 Degrees Fahrenheit.
4. Dip Each Slice Of Zucchini First In The Flour, Then In The Butter Or Flax Egg Mixture, And Finally Into The Breadcrumbs, Coating Completely.
5. Place Each Coated Slice Onto A Large Baking Sheet (18×13) Lined With Parchment Paper Or Foil. Leave A Small Amount Of Space Between Each Slice.
6. Place Baking Sheet Into The Oven And Bake For 25-35 Minutes (Flipping Every 10 Minutes) Until Golden Brown And Crispy. Serve With Marinara.

title: French Toast
ingredients:
1. Brineaquafaba From One Can Of Cannellininavy Beans
2. 1 Tsp Vegg Vegan Egg Yolk Substitute Made Up As Directed
3. 34 Tsp Salt
4. 1 Tsp Ground Cinnamon
5. 12 Tsp Finely Ground Pepper
6. 3 Tbsp White Sugar
7. Flavourless Vegetable Oil For Frying
8. 6 Slices Of Your Favourite Bread Seeded Bread Is Good As The Seeds Get Beautifully Caramelised
9. Maple Syrup To Serve
10. If You Dont Have Vegg Use 34 Tsp Nutritional Yeast And 14 Black Salt Whisked Into 30Cupss Water
preparation:
1. Switch Your Oven On And Put The Tray Inside. This Is To Keep Cooked Slices Warm While Cooking More.
2. Whisk The Brine/Aquafaba Until It Reaches Ribbon Stage (Around 4-5 Mins In A Stand Mixer On Med-High Speed).
3. Add The Yolk Mix (If It Is Very Stiff, Add A Little More Water – It Should Be The Consistency Of Washing Up Liquid) And Salt And Pepper. Continue Whisking For Another Minute.
4. Add The Sugar 1 Tbsp At A Time, Making Sure It Is Well Combined Each Time.
5. Transfer To The Flat Bottomed Dish. Cut Your Bread In Half Diagonally. Place 4 Pieces In The Aquafaba Mix. Turn To Coat Both Sides. It Won’T Sink Into The Bread Very Much But That’S Ok.
6. Heat Your Pan To Med-Hot, Pour In A Tbsp Of Veg Oil And Pop Your Slices In. Do Not Try To Move Them Until The Aquafaba Mix Looks Melted On The Top Side.
7. Using A Spatula, You May Need To Work A Little To Separate The Slice From The Pan. Flip And Do The Same Again. Each Side Should Be Golden Brown.
8. Put Slices In Oven To Keep Warm. Serve With Maple Syrup.

title: Vegan Chicken and Jalapeno Corn Salsa Quesadillas
ingredients:
1. 1 Pack Of Quorn Vegan Chicken Free Slices
2. 2 Fresh Jalapeno Chillies Chopped
3. 6 Tbsp Tinned Sweetcorn Drained And Rinsed
4. Red Onion Finely Diced
5. 1 Avocado Destoned Peeled And Finely Chopped
6. 15G Fresh Coriander Finely Chopped
7. 1 Tbsp Lime Juice
8. Salt And Black Pepper To Taste
9. 4 Soft Corn Tortillas
10. 100G Vegan Cheese Grated
11. 1 Tbsp Oil
preparation:
1. To Make The Jalapeno Corn Salsa, Place The Chillies, Sweetcorn, Red Onion, Avocado, Coriander, Lime Juice, Salt And Black Pepper In A Bowl And Mix Until Combined. Set Aside.
2. Place Two Tortillas On A Chopping Board Or Clean Work Surface. Divide The Pack Of Quorn Vegan Chicken Free Slices Between The Two Tortillas, Followed By The Salsa And Cheese. Place The Two Last Tortillas On Top To Make Your Two Quesadillas.
3. Place A Large Frying Pan Over A Medium Heat And Brush The Pan With The Oil. Place One Of The Quesadillas Into The Pan. Fry For 2 Minutes, Before Carefully Flipping And Frying For A Further 2 Minutes, Until The Cheese Has Melted. Repeat With The Other Quesadilla.
4. Cut Each Quesadilla Into Four Pieces And Serve Immediately.

title: Baked Tamari Mushrooms With Fresh Spinach Salad
ingredients:
1. 10 Chestnut Mushrooms Stems Removed
2. 2T Tamari
3. 2T Water
4. 1T Hot Smoked Paprika
5. 50G Cashews
6. 1T Ground Flax Seed
7. 1T Nutritional Yeast
8. 75G Silken Tofu
9. 12T White Miso
10. 12T Sea Salt
11. 25G Basil Leaf
12. 2G Garlic
13. 12T Extra Virgin Olive Oil
14. 12G Walnuts
15. 2T Lemon Juice
16. 2 Handfuls Spinach
17. 1 Corn On The Cob You Can Grill The Corn And Then Cut Off Or Have It Raw Its Lovely Either Way
18. 2 Handfuls Mini Plum Tomatoes Halved
19. 4 Spring Onions Finely Chopped
20. A Handful Coriander Leaf Finely Chopped
21. Extra Virgin Olive Oil
22. Lemon Juice
23. Salt
preparation:
1. Preheat Your Oven To 220C / 430F
2. Mushrooms – Put The Tamari, Water And Paprika Into A Tupaware Box, Add The Mushrooms, Put The Lid On And Shake So The Mushrooms Are Covered With The Liquid. Marinade For 15 Minutes. Bake In The Oven For 10 Minutes. Allow To Cool.
3. Cashew Sauce – Blend The Cashews, Flax, Nutritional Yeast, Tofu, Miso And Salt, Using The Chopper Attachment Of A Hand Blender Or A High Speed Jug Blender. You May Need To Allow It To Rest And Soften For A Few Minutes And Then Reblend To Get The Sauce Smooth.
4. Pesto – Blend The Basil, Garlic, Oil, Walnuts And Lemon Juice Until Smooth.
5. Salad – Combine The Spinach, Tomatoes, Corn, Spring Onions And Coriander Leaf. Add A Little Oil, Juice And Salt To Taste.
6. Place The Salad On The Plate, Top With The Mushrooms With The Cashew Sauce And Pesto.

title: Three Layered Aubergine Tower
ingredients:
1. 1 Aubergine
2. Olive Oil
3. Sweet Potato  Caramelised Onion Layer
4. Sweet Potato
5. White Onion Diced
6. Sprig Of Thyme
7. Whiskey Mushroom Layer
8. Handful Of Mixed Mushrooms Roughly Chopped
9. Spring Onion Diced
10. Freshly Ground Black Pepper
11. Splash Of Whiskey
12. Micro Ratatouille Layer
13. Courgette Finely Diced
14. Cup Mixed Sweet Bell Peppers Finely Chopped
15. Red Onion Finely Chopped
16. 2 Cloves Of Garlic Crushed
17. Jar Of Chopped Tomatoes
18. A Pinch Of Dried Herbs
19. A Handful Of Basil Leaves
preparation:
1. Thickly Slice The Aubergine, Keeping The Stem. Salt The Slices & Leave For 30 Mins Approx To Draw Out The Excess Fluid.
2. For The Sweet Potato Layer:Sautee The Onion With The Thyme Until Sticky & Brown. Steam & Mash The Sweet Potato & Combine With The Onion Mixture (Discarding The Thyme Sprig)
3. For The Mushroom Layer:Sautee The Mushrooms Until They Release Their Juices. Season With Black Pepper & Add The Spring Onion. When All The Liquid Is Gone, Add A Splash Of Whiskey & Cook Just Until The Alcohol Has Evaporated.
4. For The Micro Ratatouille Layer:Sautee The Onions, Garlic & Peppers Until The Onions Begin To Soften. Add The Dried Herbs, Courgettes & Tomatoes & Continue To Cook Until The Courgettes Are Just Beginning To Soften. Remove From The Heat And Add The Basil.
5. Prepare The Aubergine Slices: Rinse To Remove All Traces Of The Salt. Dry The Slices Thoroughly & Grill, Turning Once During Cooking. Don’T Forget The Stem!
6. Assemble The Tower:Place One Filling On Top Of Each Aubergine Slice. Serve Immediately & Enjoy!

title: Gooey Pecan Pie
ingredients:
1. For The Pastry
2. 250G  9 Oz Plain Flour Wheat Spelt Or Glutenfree Plus Extra For Dusting
3. 125G  4 Oz Vegan Margarine Cut Into Cubes Plus Extra For Greasing
4. Icecold Water
5. For The Filling
6. 450G  1Lb Golden Syrup
7. 50G  2 Oz Fairtrade Soft Brown Sugar
8. 1 Teaspoon Pure Vanilla Extract
9. 125G  4 Oz Granary Breadcrumbs
10. 175G  6 Oz Toasted Pecan Nuts Roughly Chopped
11. To Decorate
12. Whole Pecan Nuts
preparation:
1. To Make The Pastry, Sieve The Flour Into A Large Bowl And Rub In The Cubes Of Vegan Margarine With Your Fingertips Until The Mixture Resembles Fine Breadcrumbs. Work Quickly And With A Light Touch To Avoid The Fat Melting. Check For Any Remaining Lumps Of Margarine By Shaking The Bowl To Bring Them To The Surface.
2. Make A Well In The Centre Of The Mixture And Add Some Chilled Water, A Little At A Time. Lightly Work The Mixture To Form A Ball, Adding A Sprinkle Of Flour If The Mixture Is Too Wet, Or A Touch More Water If It’S Too Dry. Cover And Chill For 20-30 Minutes.
3. Grease A 9” Fluted Flan Tin, Preferably With A Removable Base. Roll The Pastry Out Thinly On A Lightly Floured Surface And Line The Tin. For An Extra Finishing Touch, You Can Crimp The Edge With Your Thumb. Prick Over The Pastry Case With A Fork, To Prevent The Base Puffing Up During Baking. Cover And Return To The Fridge While You Prepare The Filling.
4. Meanwhile, Preheat The Oven To 200ºc/400ºf/Gas Mark 6 And Put In A Heavy Baking Tray To Heat Through. Baking The Pie On A Hot Baking Sheet Will Ensure A Crisp Base To The Pastry Case.
5. To Make The Filling, Gently Warm The Syrup Over A Low Heat, Making Sure It Doesn’T Boil. Stir In The Brown Sugar And Vanilla Extract.
6. Remove From The Heat And Add The Breadcrumbs And Chopped Pecans. Add A Few More Breadcrumbs If The Mixture Seems A Bit Runny.
7. Pour The Mixture Into The Pastry Case And Level The Surface. Decorate The Top With The Whole Pecan Nuts, Placing Them In Concentric Circles.
8. Bake The Pie On The Preheated Baking Tray For About 10 Minutes Until The Pastry Has Started To Colour, Then Reduce The Oven Temperature To 180ºc/350ºf/Gas Mark 4. If The Pecans Appear To Be Getting Too Dark Brown, Cover The Pie With Foil.
9. Continue Baking For A Further 25-30 Minutes Until The Pastry Is Golden And The Filling Is Lightly Firm And Set. The Top Should Be Chewy And The Middle Soft And Moist, With The Pecans Nice And Crunchy.
10. Remove From The Oven And Leave In The Tin To Cool A Little And Firm Up. Serve Your Pie Warm Or Cold. You Could Add A Dash Of Maple Syrup To Your Favourite Vegan Cream Or Ice Cream Alternative To Accompany This Wonderfully Gooey Treat.
11. Like This Recipe? Sign Up To Veganuary Today To Get Recipes Like This Delivered Directly To Your Inbox.

title: Peanut Butter, Tahini and Chocolate Chip Cookies
ingredients:
1. 1 Tsp Psyllium Husks Or 1 T Flax Seeds
2. 4 Tbsp Water
3. 200G Plain White Flour
4. 12 Tsp Baking Soda
5. T Baking Powder
6. Tsp Fine Sea Salt
7. 100G Vegan Butter At Room Temperature
8. 100G Caster Sugar
9. 100G Light Brown Sugar
10. 2 Tbsp Soy Milk
11. 130G Smooth Peanut Butter Try To Use 100 Peanut Varieties If You Can
12. 50G Light Tahini
13. 160G Vegan Dark Chocolate
14. 2 Tbsp White Sesame Seeds
15. Pinch Flaky Sea Salt
preparation:
1. In A Small Bowl Whisk Together The Ground Psyllium Husks/Ground Flax Seeds With The Water. Set Aside To Thicken Into Your Egg Mixture.
2. In A Medium Bowl, Mix Together The Flour, Baking Soda, Baking Powder And Salt. Set Aside.
3. In The Bowl Of A Stand Mixer, Beat Together The Vegan Butter, Sugars, Soy Milk And Psyllium/Flax Egg Mixture Until Smooth And Fluffy. Add The Peanut Butter And Tahini And Beat For Another Few Minutes.
4. Add The Flour Mixture And Beat Gently Until Just Combined. Finally Add The Chocolate Chips, Reserving A Small Handful For Decorating The Top Of The Cookies Later.
5. Cover The Dough With Cling Film And Place In The Fridge For 30 Minutes.
6. Preheat The Oven To 170C And Line Two Baking Trays With Baking Parchment.
7. Using A Cookie Dough Scoop Or A Tablespoon, Place Scoops Of Dough Around The Size Of Walnuts On The Prepared Baking Trays With A Few Inches Between Each Cookie. You Should Fit 10 Per Tray.
8. Top Each Cookie With A Couple Of The Reserved Chocolate Chips. Sprinkle The Tops Of The Cookies With The Sesame Seeds And The Flaky Sea Salt.
9. Gently Press Down Each Ball Of Dough With A Fork. Don’T Worry About Making A Pattern Or Design On Top – This Will Disappear As They Bake.
10. Bake For 20 Minutes, Being Careful Not To Let The Cookies Burn On The Edges. Remove From The Oven And Leave To Cool Fully On A Wire Cooling Rack.
11. Once Cooled, Serve And Enjoy!
12. Did You Enjoy These Cookies? Explore More Of Our Vegan Sweet Treats!

title: Low Carb Carbonara
ingredients:
1. Sauce Ingredients
2. 150G Raw Cashews Soaked For 4 Hr Or Overnight
3. 160Cups Cold Water
4. 200G Soft Tofu Diced
5. 2 Tbsp Of Nutritional Yeast
6. 3 Tbsp Of Good Quality Wholegrain Mustard
7. Optional 1 12 Tbsp Protein Powder Soya Bean Or Pea Protein Powder Work Well
8. Pinch Of Nutmeg
9. Salt And Pepper
10. Other Ingredients
11. 1 Tbsp Coconut Oil
12. 3 Plump Garlic Cloves Crushed
13. 3 Rashers Of Diced Vegan Bacon
14. 700G Courgette Ideally Spiralised
15. 250G Edamamesoya Beans
16. 250G Button Mushrooms Sliced
17. To Garnish Freshly Chopped Herbs I Have Used Parsley In The Photos Pictures But Torn Basil Leaves Are Also A Lovely Alternative And A Sprinkle Of Ground Flaxseed If Desired
preparation:
1. Soak The Raw Cashews For 4 Hours Or Overnight (The Cashews Will Plump Up!), Drain Away The Water And Place The Soaked Cashews In A Blender Or Food Processor.
2. Add The Remaining Sauce Ingredients And Blend For A Few Seconds To Form A Creamy Sauce.
3. Spiralise Your Courgettes. If You Do Not Have A Spiraliser, Vegetable Peeler Peelings Can Be Used.
4. In A Big Non-Stick Pan, Melt The Coconut Oil. Add Crushed Garlic And Vegan Bacon. Sauté For About 3 Mins Before Adding In The Spiralised Courgettes, Mushrooms And Edamame Beans. Continue Cooking For About 6-8 Mins To Cook Through And To Evaporate As Much Moisture As Possible (This Prevents The Final Sauce From Becoming Too Watery).
5. Add The Carbonara Sauce To The Vegetables And Cook Though For 4-5 Mins. Serve, Garnishing With Fresh Herbs And Ground Flaxseed To Boost The Nutritive Profile.
6. So Man

title: Super Vegetable Salad
ingredients:
1. 28 Cherry Tomatoes
2. 3 Florets Of Broccoli
3. 12 Green Beans Cut Into 2Cm Lengths
4. 2 Carrots Peeled And Sliced Into 2Cm Pieces
5. 1 Lettuce  I Like Romaine
6. 3 Spring Onions Finely Chopped
7. 100G Polenta
8. A Handful Of Chopped Herbs Of Your Choice
9. 250G Tofu Cut Into Slices
10. Olive Oil For Frying
11. For The Dressing
12. 2 Tablespoons Olive Oil
13. 1 Tablespoon Red Wine Vinegar
14. 1 Teaspoon Dijon Mustard Optional
15. 1 Teaspoon Maple Syrup If You Like A Bit Of Sweetness
preparation:
1. Preheat The Oven To 200°C/Gas Mark 6 And Roast The Cherry Tomatoes For 10 Minutes.
2. Cover The Bottom Of A Pan With Cold Water And Place A Steamer Above It. Put The Broccoli, Green Beans And Carrots In The Steamer, Turn The Heat On Quite High And Steam For About 15 Minutes, Occasionally Prodding The Carrots With A Fork To See If They Are Done. Some People Like Them Slightly Crunchy, Others Prefer Them A Little Softer.
3. While The Vegetables Are Steaming, Make A Salad With The Leaves And Spring Onions.
4. Combine The Polenta And Herbs In A Bowl. Heat Some Olive Oil In A Frying Pan. Dip The Tofu In The Polenta Mixture, Then Fry Until Golden.
5. Whisk Together The Ingredients For The Dressing, But Only Pour Over At The Last Minute.
6. Assemble Your Meal By First Putting The Salad On The Plate, Then The Warm Vegetables And Finally The Tofu. Pour Over The Dressing Then Add A Little Seasoning Sauce Such As Braggs Or A Sauce Of Your Choice.

title: Tofu Holy Basil Stir-Fry
ingredients:
1. 3 Red Birds Eye Chillies
2. 3 Garlic Cloves
3. 2 Tablespoons Vegetable Oil
4. 150G 5Oz Firm Tofu Or
5. Textured Vegetable Protein
6. Cut Into Chunks
7. 1 Tablespoon Light Soy Sauce
8. Tablespoon Dark Soy Sauce
9. Tablespoon Sugar
10. Pinch Of White Pepper
11. Onion Chopped
12. Red Pepper Sliced
13. Yellow Pepper Sliced
14. 30G 1Oz Yardlong Beans Or
15. Green Beans Cut Into 2Cm
16. Inch Pieces
17. Handful Of Thai Basil Holy Basil Leaves
18. 2 Kaffir Lime Leaves Chopped
19. Steamed Jasmine Rice To Serve
20.
preparation:
1. Using Either A Pestle And Mortar, Grind The Chillies And Garlic To A Paste.
2. Heat The Oil In A Wok Set Over A High Heat. Add The Chilli And Garlic Mixture And Stir-Fry For About 30 Seconds, Until Nice And Golden Brown.
3. Now Add The Tofu Or Tvp Chunks, Both Soy Sauces, The Palm Sugar And White Pepper And Cook, Tossing Everything Around In The Pan, For About 1 Minute, Until The Tofu Or Tvp Is Well Coated And Has Taken On A Little Colour From The Sauces.
4. Once Everything Is Mixed Well, Add The Onion, Peppers And Long Beans And Cook For A Further 30 Seconds, All The While Tossing The Mixture Together. Throw In The Basil And Lime Leaves And Stir-Fry For A Further 30 Seconds. Serve Immediately With Jasmine Rice.
5. Did You Enjoy This Dish? Explore More Vegan Thai Recipes.

title: Raspberry, Chocolate & Almond Milk Muffins
ingredients:
1. 240Cups 1 Cup Nutty Bruce Activated Almond Mlk Or Your Favourite Plant Milk
2. 200G 2 Cups Plain Flour
3. 2 12 Tsp Baking Powder
4. 14 Tsp Bicarbonate Of Soda
5. 1 Tsp Crunchy Almond Butter
6. 12 Tsp Salt
7. 150G 34 Cup Brown Sugar
8. 90Cups Generous 13 Cup Vegetable Oil
9. 2 Tsp Vanilla Extract
10. 80G 34 Cup Pico Super Dark Chocolate Or Your Preferred Dark Chocolate
11. Handful Of Raspberries
preparation:
1. Preheat The Oven To 180C/350F/Gas 4. Spray A Muffin Tin With Cooking Spray And Set Aside.
2. In A Medium Bowl Combine Flour, Baking Powder, Baking Soda, Salt, And Nut Butter.
3. Combine The Almond Milk, Sugar, Oil, And Vanilla Extract, Whisking Together Until The Sugar Has Completely Dissolved. Add The Wet Ingredients To Dry Ingredients And Mix Together.
4. Break Up The Chocolate Into Pieces And Fold Into The Batter, Along With The Raspberries.
5. Spoon The Batter Into The Prepared Baking Tin So That The Muffin Moulds Are Two Thirds Of The Way Full. Bake For 20-25 Minutes Until Lightly Brown And A Knife Inserted In The Middle Comes Out Clean.
6. Remove From The Oven, Allow To Cool.

title: Apple-Berry Cooler
ingredients:
1. 1 Litre 4 Cups Organic Apple Juice Or Juice Of Your Choice
2. Small Pinch Of Sea Salt
3. Agaragar Flakes 1 Level Tablespoon Of Flakes Per Cup Of Liquid
4. Some Fresh Berries Such As Raspberries Strawberries If Not In Season Use Frozen
preparation:
1. Pour The Juice Into A Small Saucepan And Add The Salt. Sprinkle The Agar-Agar Flakes On Top And Heat Without Stirring, Then Simmer For 3-5 Minutes, Stirring Occasionally Until The Flakes Dissolve.
2. Place The Fruit In Whatever Moulds Or Bowls You Have Chosen. Pour Over The Hot Liquid, Allow To Cool And Then Place In The Refrigerator To Set.
3. Note:Soft Fruits Such As Berries, Cherries, Peaches Or Melons Do Not Need To Be Cooked With Agar- Agar. However, Firmer Fruits Such As Apples Or Pears Need To Be Peeled, Chopped And Cooked In The Agar- Agar And Juice Mixture To Soften Them.
4. Agar Flakes Are Sold In Many Supermarkets, They Are A Natural Gelatine Made From Dried Seaweed.

title: Butternut Squash Pear Bisque
ingredients:
1. 3 Tbsp Olive Oil
2. 2 Medium Leeks White And Tender Green Parts Finely Chopped 3 Cups
3. 1 Small Butternut Squash Peeled And Cut Into 1Inch Pieces
4. 3 Pears Peeled Cored And Cut Into 1Inch Pieces
5. 5 Cups Miso Bouillon
6. Sea Salt
7. 1 14Oz Can Organic Coconut Milk
8. 1 Tsp Chopped Fresh Thyme
9. Toasted Pumpkin Seeds For Garnish Optional
preparation:
1. Heat The Oil In A Saucepan Over Medium-Low Heat. Add Leeks, And Cook 10 Minutes, Or Until Soft, Stirring Often. Add Squash And Pears, And Sauté 5 Minutes. Stir In The Bouillon, And Bring To A Boil. Reduce Heat To Medium-Low, And Add Salt, If Desired.
2. Simmer 20 Minutes, Or Until Squash Is Fork-Tender. Remove From Heat, And Stir In Coconut Milk. Purée The Soup In A Blender Or Food Processor, Blend Until Smooth. Return Soup To Saucepan, And Stir In Thyme. Reheat Over Medium-Low Heat 2 To 3 Minutes, Or Until Warmed Through. Serve Garnished With Pumpkin Seeds.

title: Vegan Fish & Chips
ingredients:
1. Banana Blossoms
2. Flour Mixture
3. Plain Flour
4. Salt
5. Dill
6. Batter
7. 1 Cup Of Allpurpose Flour
8. 12 Cup Of Mighty Pea Mlk Or Your Favourite Plant Milk
9. 12 Cup Of Water
10. 14 Cup Of Baking Powder
11. 1 Teaspoon Of Salt
preparation:
1. Rinse And Drain The Banana Blossoms Before Preparing Your Flour Mixture And Batter.
2. To Prepare Your Batter, Simply Whisk Together The Flour, M.Lk, Water, Baking Powder And Salt In A Bowl Until Smooth.
3. Coat The Banana Blossoms In Flour Mixture And Then Dip The Banana Blossoms In The Batter.
4. Fry Until Golden, Removing Any Excess Oil On A Kitchen Towel.
5. Serve With A Generous Helping Of Chips And Tomato Ketchup.
6. For More Recipes Like This, Sign Up To Veganuary. You’Ll Get Our Celebrity Cookbook, Meal Plans, Nutritional Advice, Recipes And More – All For Free! You Can Thank Us Later.

title: Quinoa with Salad Greens & Radishes
ingredients:
1. 1 Cup Quinoa Rinsed
2. 2 Cups Water
3. Fresh Salad Greens Such As Rocket Watercress
4. 1 Small Bunch Of Red Radishes Very Thinly Sliced
5. 1 Handful Parsley
6. 1 Cup Extra Virgin Olive Oil
7. 2 Tbsp Umeboshi Vinegar
8. 1 Tbsp Shoyu
9. 2 Tbsp Mustard
10. 2 Tbsp Lemon Juice
preparation:
1. Basic Salad Dressing:
2. Place All The Ingredients Marked With A (*) Into A Blender.
3. Adjust Ingredients According To Taste.
4. Store In A Sealed Glass Jar In The Refrigerator And Keep For Up To 5 Days.
5. Bring The Quinoa And Water To A Boil In A Pan, And Simmer On A Very Low Heat 15-20 Minutes Until The Water Is Absorbed.
6. Remove From Heat And Put Into A Large Bowl And Leave To Cool Then Fluff Up With A Fork.
7. Add The Fresh Salad Greens And Radishes To A Large Salad Bowl And Pour Over Some Of The Dressing. Stir In The Quinoa And Serve.

title: Spiced Plum Muffins
ingredients:
1. 150G Spelt Flour
2. 150G Ground Almonds
3. 2 Tsps Ground Ginger
4. 1 Tsp Baking Powder
5. 1 Tsp Bicarbonate Of Soda
6. 50G Sugar Or Sweetener
7. 50G Agave Syrup
8. 115G Vegetable Oil
9. 250Cups Soya Yogurt
10. 150G Plums Stoned And Chopped Into Small Pieces
11. A Sprinkle Of Toasted Chopped Almonds
preparation:
1. In A Mixing Bowl, Add The Flour, Ground Almonds, Ginger, Baking Powder, Bicarbonate Of Soda And Xylitol And Stir Through.
2. Add The Agave Syrup, Vegetable Oil And Soya Yoghurt And Mix – But Not To Thoroughly Because You Don’T Want To Overwork The Mixture. Stir Through The Chopped Plums.
3. In A Muffin Tray, Place 12 Muffin Cases And Spoon The Mixture To Evenly Fill The Cases.
4. Bake In The Oven For 20-25 Minutes Until Cooked Through. Pop A Skewer Through One Of The Muffins And If It Comes Out Clean, They’Re Cooked.
5. Pre-Heat The Oven To 180C.

title: Super Green Thai Curry
ingredients:
1. Small Bunch Coriander
2. Small Bunch Spring Onions White And Green Parts Separated
3. 100G Spinach Leaves
4. 300 Cups Alpro Coconut Unsweetened Drink Or Similar
5. 12 Tbsp Depending On Heat Preference Green Curry Paste
6. 50G Peas
7. 1 Medium Sweet Potato Peeled And Cut Into 2Cm Cubes
8. 8 Cherry Tomatoes Halved
9. 100G Baby Sweetcorn In Half Through The Middle
10. Juice Of 1 Lime
11. Sunflower Oil
12. 1 Tbsp Soya Sauce Or Tamari
13. Salt And Pepper
preparation:
1. Preheat The Oven To 180C. Toss The Sweet Potato In A Little Sunflower Oil, Season And Roast In The Oven For 20 Minutes Until Soft.
2. Add The Spinach, Spring Onion Tops, Coriander (Leaves And Stems), Green Curry Paste, Soya Sauce Or Tamari And Alpro Coconut Unsweetened Drink To A Blender Or Food Processor And Blend Until Smooth
3. In A Large Frying Pan Over A Medium Heat Sauté The Baby Corn For 2-3 Minutes Until Starting To Colour, Add In The Tomato’S And Sauté For 30 Seconds
4. Lower The Heat And Add In The Green Sauce, Peas And Sweet Potato Heating Through Until The Sauce Is Hot
5. Finely Chop The White Parts Of The Spring Onion. Add The Lime Juice To The Curry And Season To Taste. Sprinkle Over The Spring Onions And Serve With Brown Or White Rice.

title: Herby Falafel Shakshuka & Turmeric Drizzle
ingredients:
1. 1 12 Tbsp Oil
2. 12 Tsp Turmeric
3. 1 Brown Onion
4. 1 Red Pepper
5. 1 Tsp Ground Cumin
6. 1 Tsp Sumac
7. 20G Creamed Coconut
8. 20G Flaked Almonds
9. 240G Chickpeas Drained
10. 2 Tsp Harissa Paste
11. 400G Chopped Tomatoes
12. 4 Tbsp Chickpea Flour
13. Large Handful Of Fresh Coriander
preparation:
1. Preheat The Oven To 220C / Gas Mark 7 And Boil A Kettle.
2. Dice The Onion And Red Pepper. Roughly Chop The Coriander.
3. Heat A Large Pan With 1 Tbsp Oil On A Medium Heat And Add The Brown Onion And Red Pepper, Cook For 7 Mins Until Softened.
4. Meanwhile, Drain The Chickpeas. Reserve 1-2 Tbsp Of The Liquid. In A Large Bowl, Mash The Chickpeas Until They Are All Crushed, You Can Use A Potato Masher Or A Fork To Do This.
5. Mix In The Chickpea Flour, Reserved Chickpea Liquid, Sumac, Half Of The Ground Cumin And Half Of The Fresh Coriander. Season With Sea Salt And Black Pepper.
6. Form The Mix Into 12 Small Balls To Form Falafels. Place The Falafels On A Baking Tray And Drizzle With 1/2 Tbsp Oil. Place In The Oven For 15 Mins Until Turning Golden.
7. Add The Chopped Tomatoes, Harissa Paste And Remaining Ground Cumin To The Onion And Pepper Pan. Season With Sea Salt And Black Pepper And Cook For 15 Mins Until Thickened.
8. Meanwhile, Make The Turmeric Drizzle; Dissolve The Creamed Coconut In 30Ml Boiling Water And Stir In The Turmeric With A Pinch Of Sea Salt And Black Pepper.
9. Spoon The Tomato Shakshuka Into Two Warm Bowls (Or Serve In The Pan) And Nestle The Falafels Into The Sauce. Sprinkle Over The Flaked Almonds, Remaining Coriander And Spoon Over The Turmeric Drizzle.

title: Tahini Beans on Toast
ingredients:
1. 900G Broad Beans In Their Pods Shelled Boiled For 5 Minutes And Skinned
2. 1 Tbsp Olive Oil
3. 1 Clove Garlic Finely Chopped
4. 1 Tbsp Lemon Juice
5. 2 Tbsp Chopped Fresh Mint
6. 1 Tbsp Light Tahini
7. 2 Slices Sourdough Rye Bread Toasted
8. Tofu Cream Cheese Or Your Preferred Alternative
preparation:
1. Once You Have Boiled The Beans And Taken The Thick Outer Skins Off You Should Have Around 5 To 6 Tablespoons Of Beautiful Vivid Beans.
2. Pour The Olive Oil Into A Small Frying Pan And Place On A Medium Heat Until The Garlic Begins To Sizzle But Not Colour.
3. Add The Beans To The Pan And Stir To Incorporate The Garlic. Keep Stirring For A Couple Of Minutes, The Beans Only Need Warming Through Rather Than Frying.
4. While The Beans Are Heating Through Toast The Rye Bread And Spread With A Layer Of Cream Cheese.
5. Add The Lemon Juice And Mint To The Pan And Remove From The Heat.
6. Stir In The Tahini And Carefully Spoon The Beans Onto The Toast.
7. Enjoy!

title: Feijoada, Brazilian Black Bean Stew
ingredients:
1. 1 Medium Onion Peeled And Sliced
2. 2 Tbsp Oil
3. 2 Cloves Garlic Peeled And Crushed
4. 1 Tbsp Smoked Paprika
5. 2 Tsp Ground Cumin
6. 1 Large Carrot Diced
7. 200G Sweet Potato Peeled And Diced
8. 125G Potato Peeled And Diced
9. 200 Cups Vegetable Stock
10. 1 Bay Leaf
11. 400G Can Black Beans
12. Salt And Pepper To Taste
13. 1 Orange Zest
preparation:
1. Fry The Onion In The Oil For 3-4 Minutes, Add The Garlic And Spices, And Then The Vegetables, Turning Them To Coat Them.
2. Add The Stock And The Bay Leaf, Then The Beans. Bring To The Boil.
3. Simmer For 10-12 Minutes Or Until The Sweet Potato Is Tender, Adding A Little More Water If It Starts To Dry Out
4. Remove From The Heat, Stir In The Orange Zest And Remove The Bay Leaf Before Serving. It’S Even Better The Next Day!
5. Want More Recipes? Sign Up To Veganuary To Have Them Sent Straight To Your Inbox (It’S Free!)

title: Chocolate Mousse Trio
ingredients:
1. Mousse 1  Thyme And Sea Salt
2. 1 Avocado
3. 50G Dates
4. 1T Cacao Powder
5. 12T Fresh Thyme Leaves
6. 14T Sea Salt
7. Mousse 2  Coffee And Pistachio
8. 1 Avocado
9. 70G Dates
10. 1T Cacao Powder
11. 1T Freeze Dried Coffee Granules
12. 1T Pistachios
13. 2 Cardamom Pods
14. Mousse 3  Raspberry And Almond
15. 1 Avocado
16. 50G Dates
17. 1T Cacao Powder
18. 12T Almond Essence
19. A Handful Of Frozen Raspberries
preparation:
1. Mousse 1 – Thyme And Sea Salt
2. Soak The Dates In Boiling Water For 5 Minutes, Discard The Water
3. Blend The Avocado Using A Hand Blender Till Smooth
4. Add The Dates And Blend Again, You May Have To Move The Blender Up And Down To Get A Smooth Consistency
5. Add The Cacao And The Thyme, Blend Again
6. Pour Into A Serving Dish, Sprinkle With The Sea Salt And Decorate With More Thyme Leaves
7. Mousse 2 – Coffee And Pistachio
8. Soak The Dates In Boiling Water For 5 Minutes, Discard The Water
9. Blend The Avocado Using A Hand Blender Till Smooth
10. Add The Dates And Blend Again, You May Have To Move The Blender Up And Down To Get A Smooth Consistency
11. Add The Cacao And The Coffee, Blend Again
12. Grind The Cardamom In A Pestle And Mortar
13. Add The Pistachios To Roughly Grind Them
14. Put 1/2T Of The Nuts Aside For The Topping
15. Add The Rest Of The Nuts To The Mousse And Mix Well
16. Pour Into A Serving Dish, Sprinkle With The Remaining Pistachio Cardamom Mixture
17. Mousse 3 – Raspberry And Almond
18. Soak The Dates In Boiling Water For 5 Minutes, Discard The Water
19. Blend The Avocado Using A Hand Blender Till Smooth
20. Add The Dates And Blend Again, You May Have To Move The Blender Up And Down To Get A Smooth Consistency
21. Add The Cacao And The Almond Essence, Blend Again
22. Pour Into A Serving Dish, Scatter The Raspberries And Push Them Down Into The Pudding

title: Warm Sesame Toasted Strips
ingredients:
1. 1 Box Frys Chickenstyle Strips
2. 1 Cup Toasted Sesame Seeds
3. 14 Cup Agave Syrup
4. Grapeseed Oil
5. As Many Salad Vegetables As You Wish To Have
6. Ripe Avo
7. For The Thai Dressing
8. 1 Tbsp Sesame Oil
9. 12 Cup Lime Juice
10. 1  2 Red Chillies Finely Chopped
11. 1 Tbsp Coriander Leaves
preparation:
1. Place The Agave Syrup And 1 Tbsp Boiling Water In A Shallow Small Bowl.
2. Place The Toasted Chicken-Style Strips In Another Small Bowl.
3. Dip Each Strips In The Mix And Then Into The Seasme Seeds And Coat Both Sides.
4. Lay Strips On A Baking Tray And Place In The Fridge For 15 Minutes.
5. When Ready, Warm A Little Grapeseed Oil In A Frying Pan And Toast The Strips On.
6. The Strips Can Burn Very Easily So Watch Carefully!
7. To Serve:
8. In An Individual Bowl, Place The Salad Ingredients.
9. Slice Avocado Thinly And Place On Top Of The Salad Ingredients.
10. Top With The Warm Strips And Serve With The Well Mixed Thai Dressing.

title: Christmas Tree Tarts
ingredients:
1. 125G Doves Gluten Free Plain Flour
2. 12Tsp Salt
3. 30G Baby Spinach
4. 30G Margarine
5. 4Tbsp Water
6. 1Tbsp Sunflower Oil
7. 2 Shallots Or 1 Small Onion Finely Chopped
8. 170G Butternut Squash Peeled And Finely Chopped
9. 30G Walnuts Finely Chopped
10. 1Tbsp Tamari
11. 1Tbsp Balsamic Vinegar
12. 12Tsp Fresh Sage Finely Chopped
13. 12Tsp Fresh Rosemary Finely Chopped
14. 12Tsp Ground Nutmeg
15. 100G Silken Tofu
16. 3Tbsp Plant Milk  A Little For A Glaze
17. 1Tbsp Cornflour
18. 1Tbsp Stock Powder
19. 4 Cherry Tomatoes Halved
preparation:
1. Heat Your Oven To 180C/360F/Gm4.
2. Put The Flour And Salt In A Bowl, Mix Well. Put The Spinach, Margarine And Water In A Jug, Blend, With A Hand Blender, Until Smooth. Add The Spinach Mixture To The Flour, Mix Into A Dough. If It Is Too Sticky Add More Flour.
3. Roll Out The Dough To 5Mm Thickness. Cut Out 4 Circles Of Dough And 4 Trees. Place The Circles Into The Tart Tins Ensuring The Dough Goes Up The Sides. Trim The Edges With A Sharp Knife And Prick The Bottom With A Fork. Bake The Tart Base For Around 10 Minutes Until They Have Dried Out.
4. In A Large Frying Pan Heat The Oil On A Medium Heat. Once Hot, Add The Shallots And Squash, Cook For 8-12 Minutes Until The Shallots Are Translucent. Add The Walnuts, Tamari, Vinegar, Sage, Rosemary And Nutmeg. Take The Pan Off The Heat.
5. Whisk The Tofu, Milk, Cornflour And Stock In A Small Bowl. Add This To The Pan And Mix In. Divide This Mixture Between The Tart Bases. Top Each Tart With A Tree, Brush A Little Milk Onto Each Tree And The Tart Edges. Bake For A Further 10-15 Minutes Until Cooked Through.
6. Top Each Tart With Half A Tomato Before Serving.

title: Tooti Frooti Chicken Burger
ingredients:
1. 2 Frys Chickenstyle Burgers
2. 4 Wholewheat Burger Buns
3. 4 Red Chilli
4. 2 Tbsp Olive Oil
5. 1 Tbsp Smoked Paprika
6. Eggfree Mayonnaise To Serve
7. Red Salad Onions Thinly Sliced
8. 1 Mango Peeled And Cut In Small Cubes
9. Thinly Sliced Pineapple Halved
10. 1 Pomegranate
preparation:
1. Pre Heat The Oven To The Recommended Temperature For The Burgers
2. Bake The Crumbed Chicken Burgers In A Preheated Oven For 10 Minutes.
3. Chop The Chillies And Place In A Small Saucepan With The Olive Oil And Smoked Paprika And Gently Fry Over A Low Heat For 2 To 3 Minutes.
4. Serve The Chicken Burgers On The Buns With A Base Of The Chilli Relish Topped With A Generous Dollop Of Mayonnaise, Sliced Purple Spring Onions And Fresh Mango And Pineapple And A Spoonful Of Pomegranate.

title: Quesadillas
ingredients:
1. 23 Tbsp Olive Oil
2. 400G Meatless Farm Co Mince
3. 1  Medium Red Onion Diced
4. 23 Sticks Celery Diced Optional
5. 3  Garlic Cloves Peeled  Minced
6. 400G Chopped Tomatoes With Liquid
7. 4 Tbsp Chipotle In Adobo Minced
8. 4 Green Onions Thinly Sliced
9. 1 Handful Coriander Roughly Chopped
10. 6 Large Flour Tortillas
11. 500G Vegan Cheese
12. Serve With Cashew Sour Cream Lime Coriander Avocado Etc
preparation:
1. Place A Large Pan Over Medium Heat With 2-3Tbsp Of Oil, And Cook The Onions Until Soft And Tender, For About 5 Minutes. Add The Garlic And Cook For Another Minute Until Fragrant. Add The Chipotle Peppers And The Diced Tomatoes With Their Liquid. Stir Frequently And Cook Until The Sauce Thickens And The Liquid Has Mostly Evaporated, For About 20 Minutes. Stir In The Meatless Farm Co Mince, Green Onions And Coriander. Reduce The Heat To Low, Enough To Keep The Mixture Warm.
2. Heat A Clean Grill Pan On Medium Heat. We Like To Put A Touch Of Oil In The Pan To Make The Tortilla Extra Crispy, But That’S Not Necessary, It’S Just A Matter Of Preference. Place The Tortilla On A Hot Grill, Cover With A Layer Of Cheese, Then Spread Some Of The Meatless Farm Co Chipotle Mixture Over Half. Once The Cheese Has Melted, Fold The Tortilla Over To Make Your Quesadilla. Repeat With Remaining Tortillas, They Can Be Kept Warm In The Oven Until You’Re Ready To Serve. Allow Them To Rest For A Couple Of Minutes Before Slicing To Ensure Everything Doesn’T Ooze Out.
3. Serve With Fresh Lime Slices, Cashew Sour Cream, Avocado Slices And Extra Coriander.

title: Spicy Bean and Veg Soup
ingredients:
1. 60 Cups Sunflower Oil
2. 2 Onions Roughly Chopped
3. 2 Cloves Garlic Crushed
4. 75 Cups Medium Masala
5. 75 Cups Curry Powder
6. 3 Stalks Celery Chopped
7. 5 Carrots Peeled And Sliced
8. 3 Potatoes Peeled And Roughly Chopped
9. Herb Salt And Freshly Ground Black Pepper
10. 1 Tin Red Kidney Beans And 1 Tin Butter Beans Drained And Rinsed
11. 60 Cups Tomato Puree
12. 1 Tin Chopped Tomatoes Or 4 Fresh Tomatoes Chopped
13. 60 Cups Chopped Fresh Herbs Parsley Coriander Oregano  If You Dont Have Fresh Dried Will Work Fine
14. 2 Stock Cubes Dissolved In  300 Cups Boiling Water
15. Pink Himalayan Salt To Taste
16. Coconut Cream For Serving
preparation:
1. Heat Oil In A Large Saucepan And Sauté Onions, Garlic And Spices.
2. Add Celery, Carrots, Potatoes, Beans And Tomato (Puree And Tinned).
3. Add Fresh/Dried Herbs.
4. Dissolve Cubes In The Boiling Water.
5. Cover Vegetables With Water And Allow To Slowly Simmer For Approx 1 Hour.
6. Blend And Add Seasoning To Taste.
7. Add More Liquid If Too Thick.
8. Serve Hot With Drizzle Of Coconut Cream.
9. For Optional Extra Heat/Spice, Add Chopped De-Seeded Chillies.
10. Did You Enjoy This Dish? Explore More Vegan Soup Recipes.

title: Tofish and Chips
ingredients:
1. 280G Naked Tofoo Or Similar
2. 3 Tbsp Olive Oil
3. 300G Peas
4. 3 Tbsp Vegan Crme Fraiche
5. 800G Potatoes Such As King Edward
6. 1 Tbsp Plain Seasoned Flour
7. 100G Selfrising Flour
8. 1 Tsp Dried Seaweed Crumbled Optional
9. 100Cups Vegan Ale
10. Oil For Deep Frying
preparation:
1. Preheat The Oven To 200°C/180Fan Gas 6. Drain The Tofoo And Pat Dry.
2. Peel The Potatoes And Cut Into Chips, Bring A Large Pan Of Lightly Salted Water To The Boil And Cook The Cut Potato For 5 Minutes, Drain Well Then Toss With The Olive Oil. Spread Out Onto A Non Stick Baking Tray And Cook In The Oven For 30 Minutes, Turning Half Way Through Cooking Time.
3. While The Chips Are Cooking, Cook The Peas In A Pan Of Boiling Water For 5 Minutes, Drain And Tip Into A Food Processor With The Crème Fraiche, Blitz Until Well Combined .Heat Gently.
4. Cut The Tofoo Into 4 Slabs And Dust In The Seasoned Flour. Blitz The Self-Rising Flour With The Seaweed And Add The Ale, Blitz Again Until You Have A Smooth Creamy Batter.
5. Heat About 8Cm Oil In A Pan To 180°C. Take A Piece Of Tofu And Dip In The Batter To Coat Evenly, Carefully Lower Into The Hot Fat And Cook For 2 To 3 Minutes, Until Golden And Crispy. Repeat With The Other 3 Pieces.
6. Serve Cooked Tofish With Chips And A Spoon Full Of Peas, Garnish With Lemon Wedges.

title: Warm Lentil Salad with Smoked Tofu
ingredients:
1. 350G Puy Lentils Uk 12Oz  Us 2 Cups
2. 200G Smoked Tofu Uk 7Oz
3. 3 Medium Carrots
4. 1 Medium Leek
5. 1 Onion Finely Chopped
6. 3 Garlic Cloves Crushed
7. 2 Bay Leaves
8. 2 Tsp Dried Thyme
9. 3 Tsp Wholegrain Mustard
10. 5 Tbsp Olive Oil  Extra For Frying
11. 2 Tbsp Balsamic Vinegar
12. 23 Tbsp Capers
13. 1 2 Handful Fresh Parsley Leaves Finely Chopped
14. 750Cups Vegetable Broth Uk 13 Pint  Us 3 Cups
15. Salt  Pepper
preparation:
1. Place Vegetable Broth And Lentils In A Pan. Cook For Around 15 Mins Until Liquid Has Evaporated And Lentils Are Cooked But Still Have A Bite (If The Lentils Take Longer To Cook Add More Liquid). When The Lentils Are Cooked, Drain Any Left Over Liquid From The Lentils And Keep Covered.
2. In The Meantime Heat Some Olive Oil In A Casserole Dish. Gently Fry Together Onion And 2 Crushed Garlic Cloves Until Soft While You Cut The Vegetables.
3. Peel Carrots And Cut Into Small Dice. Chop The Leek Finely.
4. Add Cut Vegetables In The Casserole Dish. Add Bay Leaves And Thyme And Cook At Medium Heat Until Vegetables Are Soft. (Add More Olive If Necessary)
5. Once The Vegetables Are Soft, Add Lentils And Diced Smoked Tofu. Mix Well.
6. Make Dressing In A Separate Bowl By Mixing Together Mustard, 5 Tbsp Olive Oil, Balsamic Vinegar And 1 Crushed Garlic Clove.
7. Add Dressing To The Lentil Salad Along With The Capers And Finely Chopped Parsley Leaves. Toss Well. Season To Taste.
8. Serve Warm.

title: Apple Cinnamon Wholemeal Waffles
ingredients:
1. 150G 1 14 C Wholemeal Flour
2. 1Tsp Baking Powder
3. 2Tbsp Lucuma Powder Or Brown Sugar
4. 2 Chia Eggs 1 Egg  1Tbsp Milled Chia Seeds Mixed With 3Tbsp Water To Form A Gel
5. 1Tsp Vanilla Bean Paste
6. 215Cups Almond Milk Or Dairyfree Milk Of Your Choice
7. 60G 4 Tbsp Dairyfree Margarine Melted
8. 500G About 1 Pound Apples Pre Coring Spiralised Grated Or Cut Into Thin Strips
9. 1Tsp Ground Cinnamon
10. 2Tbsp Water
preparation:
1. Mix The Flour, Baking Powder And Lucuma Together In A Large Bowl.
2. In A Separate Bowl, Mix The Chia Eggs And Vanilla Bean Paste Together. Add The Almond Milk A Little At A Time, Stirring Well, Until It Has Combined With The Chia Mix.
3. Create A Hole In The Middle Of The Dry Ingredients And Slowly Begin To Pour In The Chia Mix, Stirring Constantly To Form A Batter. Be Careful Not To Mix The Batter Any More Than Necessary – It Doesn’T Need To Be Completely Smooth. Now Add The Melted Butter And Gently Mix In.
4. Set The Batter Aside For Ten Minutes.
5. In The Meantime, Add The Spiralised Apple, Cinnamon And Water Into A Large Pan. Heat Over A Medium High Heat And Simmer For Ten Minutes Until The Apples Are Soft.
6. Set The Waffle Maker To Heat Up.
7. Gently Mix The Apples Into The Waffle Batter And Scoop Around A Quarter (Depending On The Size Of Your Waffle Maker) Of The Mix Onto The Iron. Press And Cook According To Your Machine And Preference (I Chose A Medium Setting).
8. Once Cooked And Golden Brown, Remove The Waffle From The Machine And Place On A Piece Of Kitchen Paper To Prevent It Becoming Soggy.
9. Repeat The Process For Each Waffle.
10. Serve With Plant-Based Honey, Syrup Or A Caramel Sauce.

title: Crispy Tofu Turkey
ingredients:
1. 3X Tofu Blocks Extra Firm Hand Broken Into Bite Size Pieces
2. 1 Cup Flour
3. 1 Cup Rice Flour Or Corn Starch
4. Cup Breadcrumbs Fine
5. 4 Tbsp Parsley Chopped Fine
6. 3 Tbsp Wicked Sageoniongarlic Seasoning Or Similar
7. 1 Tsp Granulated Onion
8. Salt  Black Pepper
9. Oil
preparation:
1. Make Sure You Have The Firmest Tofu You Can Purchase.
2. Carefully Tear Apart The Tofu Into Bite Size Pieces And Place Into A Large Bowl.
3. In A Medium Sized Bowl Add The Rest Of The Ingredients (Except For The Oil) And Mix Well.
4. Add Each Piece Of Tofu To The Seasoned Flour To Coat Completely And Evenly On All Side.
5. In A Medium Cast Iron Pan (Or Sauté Pan) Add Enough Oil To Cover The Bottom About 1 Cm Deep.
6. Heat On Med-High Heat Until Hot.
7. When The Oil Is Hot, Begin By Adding 6-7 Pieces Of Breaded Tofu To The Pan At Time And Pan Fry Each Side Until Completely Golden Brown. When Done Remove From Oil And Place On Paper Towel Lined Plate To Dry.
8. When Ready To Serve Preheat Oven To 200C/400F.
9. Place The Crispy Tofu Onto A Baking Sheet And Roast In Oven For 15 Minutes.
10. Remove From Oven And Serve With Our Vegan Gravy And All The Fixings.
11. Explore More Vegan Christmas And Thanksgiving Recipes.

title: Summer Veg Tacos
ingredients:
1. 2 Bell Peppers One Red One Yellow
2. 2 Medium Courgettes
3. 1 Red Onion Sliced
4. 34 Garlic Cloves
5. 1 Tbsp Vegetable Oil
6. 1 Tsp Salt
7. 1 Tsp Ground Cumin
8. 12 Tsp Paprika
9. 12 Tsp Oregano
10. Pinch Of Chilli Powder
11. Pepper
12. To Serve
13. Small Tortillas Store Bought Or Make Your Own
14. Mexican Rice
15. Cooked Black Beans
16. Chopped Tomatoes
17. Avocado
18. Lime Wedges
19. Hot Sauce
20. Cilantro Optional
preparation:
1. Slice The Courgettes And Peppers Using A Food Processor With The Slicing Blade. (You Can Also Slice By Hand, But I Find This Process Much Quicker).
2. Heat The Oil Over Medium In A Large Pan. Add The Onion With A Pinch Of Salt And Sauté Until Soft And Translucent (Around 5-6 Minutes). Add The Garlicand Cook For Another 1-2 Minutes, Taking Care Notto Let It Burn.
3. Add The Peppers, Courgettes And Spices, Stirring Well To Ensure Everything Is Coated,Around 2-3 Minutes. Reduce The Heat Slightly And Cover, Cooking Until The Veggies Have Softened And Cooked Through, Around 6 Minutes.
4. Remove From The Heat And Adjust For Flavor. Serve With Warm Tortillas, Mexican Rice And Black Beans And Top With Avocado, Tomatoes, Hot Sauce And Lime.

title: Banoffee with Whipped Cream and Chocolate Syrup
ingredients:
1. For The Crust
2. 145G Coconut Flour
3. 50G Allpurpose Flour
4. 50G Plantbased Butter Melted
5. 45Cups Maple Syrup
6. 45Cups Coconut Oil Melted
7. 1 Flax Egg 1 Tbsp Flax Seeds 3 Tbsp Water
8. 1 Tsp Cinnamon
9. For The Banana Caramel Cream
10. 1  Packs Violife Creamy Original Or Your Favourite Vegan Cream Cheese
11. 2 Bananas
12. 640G Coconut Milk Can
13. 100G Coconut Sugar
14. 2 Tsp Vanilla Extract
15. Tsp Sea Salt
16. For The Creamy Coconut Whipped Cream
17. Pack Violife Creamy Original Or Your Favourite Vegan Cream Cheese
18. 100G Coconut Cream From A Tin Preferable From The Freezer
19. For The Cocospread Syrup
20. 1 Pack Violife Cocospread Or Your Favourite Chocolate Spread
21. 4 Tbsp Coconut Milk
22. To Decorate
23. 1 Ripe Banana Sliced Thinly
preparation:
1. To Make The Crust, Place All Ingredients In A Bowl And Mix Well, Until Combined. Transfer In A Greased Tart Tin, With A 20Cm Diameter And Use Your Fingers To Spread The Pastry Out Evenly.
2. Place In A Preheated Oven At 180°C For 15-20 Minutes. Set Aside To Cool.
3. For The Banana Caramel Cream, Place All Ingredients In An Electric Mixer And Beat Until Creamy. Pour Into The Baked Crust And Place In The Fridge To Set For 2 Hours.
4. To Make The Whipped Cream, Combine The Violife Creamy (Or Other Vegan Cream Cheese) With The Coconut Milk, Whisking Constantly, Until A Whipped Cream Consistency Is Created. Place In A Piping Bag To Decorate The Banoffee Tart.
5. Meanwhile, Make The Cocospread Syrup By Whisking Together The Chocolate Spread With The Coconut Milk, Until Combined.
6. Decorate The Cake With Banana Slices, Whipped Cream And A Drizzle Of Cocospread Syrup.

title: Chunky Spanish Rice
ingredients:
1. 2 Tablespoons Olive Oil
2. 1 Cups Brown Or Basmati Rice
3. 2 Cups Water
4. 1 Large Green Pepper Finely Chopped
5. 4 Stalks Of Celery Finely Chopped
6. 1 Large White Or Yellow Onion Finely Chopped
7. 145 Oz Can Diced Tomatoes
8. Half Of A 145 Oz Can Tomato Sauce
9. 1 Package Of Soy Chorizo Tempeh Taco Mix Or Meatless Ground Cajun Seasoning Or Paprika  Cayenne Pepper Mix
10. Pinch Of Cumin
11. Salt  Pepper To Taste
preparation:
1. Bring 4 Cups Of Water To A Boil.
2. In A Medium Bowl, Add Cajun Seasoning Or Paprika/Cayenne Mix To Dry Rice And Mix Well And Add Into Into Boiling Water And Set Aside To Cook Down.
3. Add Olive Oil To A Medium Pot And Heat To Medium. Sautépeppers, Onions, And Celery Until Translucent But Still Crispy.
4. Add In The Diced Tomatoes And Season With Salt & Pepper To Taste.
5. Mix In Your Veggie Mix, Soy Chorizo And Tomato Sauce To Your Finished Rice. Incorporate Well And Serve!

title: Portuguese Rice Pudding
ingredients:
1. 250Gr Risotto Rice Or Rice Pudding Rice
2. 750Cups Warm Water
3. Pinch Of Sea Salt
4. Lemon Rind 1 Lemon
5. 1 Cinnamon Stick
6. Cinnamon Powder
7. 1Lt Of Soy Milk Or Other Dairy Free Milk Such As Almond
8. 250Gr Sugar Pref Brown Light Soft Sugar
9. Lemon Zest 1 Lemon
preparation:
1. Rinse The Rice With Water Until The Water Is Clear.
2. Put The Washed Rice In A Big Saucepan With The Water, Salt, Cinnamon Stick And Lemon Rind.
3. Cook It On Medium Heat Until The Water Has Evaporated.
4. Then Add The Milk (Don’T Let The Rice Stick Or Burn) And Wait Till It Bubbles; Keep Stirring.
5. Now Add The Sugar And Keep Stirring For Some Minutes Until Everything Is Creamy.
6. Even If It’S A Bit Runny, Don’T Worry, It Will Thicken Once It’S Cold.
7. Turn Off The Heat And Add The Lemon Zest.
8. Pour Everything Into A Low Dish And Let It Cool Down, As It Cools Down It Will Thicken More.
9. When It Is Cold Have Fun Decorating With Cinnamon Powder.
10. Like This Recipe? Sign Up To Veganuary Today To Get Recipes Like This Delivered Directly To Your Inbox.

title: Mighty Meatballs
ingredients:
1. For The Meatballs
2. 1 X 400G Tinned Red Kidney Beans Drained And Rinsed
3. 12 Red Onion Roughly Chopped
4. 2 Garlic Cloves
5. 35G Oats
6. 30G Walnuts
7. 4 Tbsp Nutritional Yeast
8. 1 Tsp Dried Oregano
9. 12 Tsp Salt
10. 12 Tsp Pepper
11. Small Handful Of Fresh Basil
12. For The Sauce
13. 12 Red Onion Sliced
14. 1 Carrot Diced
15. 120Cups Vegan Red Wine
16. 120Cups Vegetable Stock
17. 300G Tideford Organics Tomato  Basil Sauce Or Similar
18. Oil For Frying
preparation:
1. Preheat The Oven To 200°C And Line A Baking Tray With Greaseproof Paper Unless You’Re Using A Non Stick Tray.
2. Add The Meatball Ingredients To A Food Processor And Process The Ingredients Together Until The Mixture Reaches A Rough Consistency, Ensuring Some Larger Pieces Remain. It’S Really Important You Avoid Processing The Ingredients For Too Long, Otherwise The Meatballs Will Turn Into A Mush!
3. Take Roughly A Tbsp Of The Mixture In Your Hand And Roll It Into A Ball, Then Place It On The Baking Tray. Repeat Until All The Mixture Has Been Used Up And You’Re Left With 12 Balls.
4. Transfer The Baking Tray To The Oven And Bake The Balls For 20 Minutes.
5. Meanwhile, Prepare The Sauce By First Adding A Little Oil To A Frying Pan On A Medium Heat. When The Oil Is Hot, Add The Red Onion And Fry For 3 Minutes. Then Add The Carrot And Fry For A Further 3 Minutes, Stirring Occasionally.
6. Next, Add The Wine To The Pan And Simmer On A Low Heat For 5 Minutes.
7. Then Add The Vegetable Stock, Sauce, And Finally Add The Meatballs To The Pan. Simmer For 10-12 Minutes, Or Until The Sauce Has Started To Thicken.
8. Remove The Pan From The Hob And Serve. We Recommend Serving With Mashed Potato And A Sprinkle Of Basil. Enjoy!
9. Did You Enjoy This Dish? Check Out More Of Our Budget-Friendly Vegan Recipes.

title: Medjool Dates with Cream Cheese and Sherry Vanilla Sauce
ingredients:
1. Dates
2. 1 Pack Of Medjool Dates Approximately 23 Medjool Dates Per Person
3. 1 Tsp Plain Vegan Cream Cheese Tofutti Tesco Or Sheese Per Date
4. Sauce
5. 60Cups4 Tbsp Sweet Or Medium Sherry Made Up With Water To 250Cups8Fl Oz Many Sherries  Including Most Of Harveys  Are Vegan But Check First
6. 1 Tsp Arrowroot Or 2 Tsp Cornflour If You Cant Get It
7. 1 Tbsp Dark Brown Sugar
8. Tsp Vanilla Extract
preparation:
1. Mix Arrowroot Into The Sherry/Water, Whisking Well.
2. Bring To The Boil, Stirring Continuously.
3. Add The Sugar And Vanilla Extract And Simmer For A Few Minutes – Until The Sugar Is Dissolved.
4. Let It Cool – You Want The Sauce To Be Just Warm.
5. Split The Dates With A Sharp Knife And Spoon Cream Cheese Into Each One. Place The Dates On A Serving Plate, Drizzle The Sauce Artistically Around Them And Serve.

title: Roasted Red Pepper Soup
ingredients:
1. 1 Large Onion
2. 1 Bulb Of Garlic  Cut In Half Through The Middle
3. 3 Tbsp Olive Oil
4. 6 Large Red Peppers
5. 2 Bay Leaves
6. 2 Tsp Ground Cumin
7. 1 To 2 Tsps Brown Sugar
8. 12 Tsp Chilli Flakes Or 1 Red Chilli Deseeded And Finely Chopped Optional
9. 500Cups Vegetable Stock
10. 12 Lemon Add Juice To Taste
11. Topping A Handful Of Chopped Parsley And A Spoonful Of Vegan Plain Yoghurt
preparation:
1. Preheat The Oven To 180C/ Gas Mark 4
2. Halve And De-Seed The Peppers. Rub Them With A Little Olive Oil And Place Ona Baking Tray With The Halved Garlic And Roast For 40 Minutes, Or Until The Peppers Arewrinkly And Blackened.
3. Place The Cooked Peppers In A Bowl And Cover With Cling Film To Trap The Heat Andhelp Release The Skin. When Cool Peel Off The Skins.
4. Peel And Dice The Onion. Fry The Onion, Cumin Seeds And Bay Leaves In Olive Oil For15 Minutes Until The Onion Is Translucent, Add The Garlic, The Peeled Peppers, The Salt, Sugar And Chilli.
5. Add The Stock And Bring To The Boil. Simmer With A Lid On For 5 Minutes.
6. Remove The Bay Leaves And Blend The Soup Until It Is Smooth. Add More Lemon Juice, Sugar And Salt To Taste.
7. To Serve, Sprinkle The Top With Generous Amounts Of Parsley And Top With A Spoonfulof Dairy-Free Yoghurt.

title: Tikka Smoked Tofu Skewers with Apple Slaw
ingredients:
1. 1 Apple
2. 50G Red Cabbage
3. 1 Handful Of Fresh Coriander
4. 40G Kale
5. 2 Garlic Cloves
6. 1 Lime
7. 250G Steamed Brown Basmati Rice
8. 4 X Skewers
9. 1 Tbsp Tikka Masala Paste
10. 225G Firm Smoked Tofu
11. Tsp Turmeric
12. 80G Coconut Yoghurt
preparation:
1. Preheat The Oven To 220C/Fan200C/Gasmark 7.
2. Drain The Tofu And Pat Dry With A Paper Towel, Then Cut Into 12-16 Equal Cubes. Heat A Non-Stick Frying Pan With 1Tbsp Oil On A Medium-High Heat. Add The Tofu And Cook For 5-7Mins, Stirring Occasionally, Until Golden Brown.
3. Meanwhile,Make The Tikka Marinade. Peel The Garlic And Grate Or Finely Chop. Cut The Lime In Half. Place The Garlic Into A Small Bowl Followed By Half The Coconut Yoghurt, The Tikka Masala Paste, Juice From Half The Lime And A Pinch Of Sea Salt. Mix Well.
4. When The Tofu Is Cooked, Thread 3-4 Cubes Onto Each Skewer. Place All The Skewers Onto A Baking Tray Or In An Ovenproof Dish. Spoon The Tikka Marinade Evenly Over The Tofu To Coat, Then Bake In The Oven For 7 Mins.
5. Roughly Chop The Kale. To The Same Frying Pan Used To Cook The Tofu, Add The Rice, Turmeric, Kale, 2 Tbsp Water And A Pinch Of Sea Salt And Black Pepper. Cook On A Medium Heat For 5 Mins, Until The Rice Is Hot And The Kale Has Wilted.
6. Make The Red Cabbage And Apple Slaw. Very Finely Slice The Red Cabbage And Roughly Chop The Coriander Leaves. Cut The Apple In Half And Grate Half Of It, Leaving The Skin On (Enjoy The Second Half As A Snack!). Place The Red Cabbage, Grated Apple And Coriander Into A Small Bowl. Add The Remaining Coconut Yoghurt And The Juice From The Remaining Half Lime. Stir To Combine And Season With Sea Salt.
7. Spoon The Turmeric Rice And Kale Into Warm Bowls. Serve With The Red Cabbage And Apple Slaw. Place The Baked Tofu Skewers On Top.

title: Vegan Chicken Summer Tortillas
ingredients:
1. Chickn Fillets
2. 1 Box Frys Chickn Fillets
3. Dried Mixed Herbs
4. Smoked Paprika
5. Drizzle Of Olive Oil
6. Salsa
7. 250 G Baby Tomatoes
8. Red Onion
9. 2 Tbsp 30 Cups Red Wine Vinegar
10. 1 Tbsp 30 Cups Lime Juice
11. Tsp Garlic Powder
12. Salt And Pepper
13. Avo Smash
14. 2 Avocados Peeled And Flesh Scooped Out
15. 1 Tsp 5 Cups Paprika
16. Tsp 25 Cups Ground Cumin
17. Juice And Zest Of 1 Lemon
18. Salt And Pepper
19. Chipotle Mayo Drizzle
20. Cup 125 Cups Vegan Mayo
21. 1 Tsp 5 Cups Dried Chipotle Spice Alternatively Use Smoked Paprika Or A Few Drops Of Your Favourite Hot Sauce
22. Other
23. 1 Packet Flour Tortillas
24. 1 Red Onion Thinly Sliced
25. 1 Red Pepper Thinly Sliced
26. 1 Yellow Pepper Thinly Sliced
27. Handful Of Fresh Coriander Cleaned And Roughly Chopped
28. Handful Of Sweet Red Piquante Peppers Thinly Sliced
29. 1 Lime
preparation:
1. Chick’N Fillets
2. Combine Herbs And Paprika With The Olive Oil. Brush Lightly Over The Fillets And Cook As Per Packet Instruction :. Once Cooked, Slice Thinly. Set Aside.
3. Salsa
4. Place Tomatoes, Red Onion, Red Wine Vinegar, Lime Juice And Seasoning Into A Food Processor. Pulse To Lightly Chop/Combine. Don’T Over Process. The Tomatoes Should Contain Some Of Their Shape. You Can Also Do This By Hand By Finely Chopping The Tomatoes And Red Onion And Combining With The Other Ingredients. Set Aside.
5. Avo Smash
6. Scoop The Two Avos Out Into A Bowl. Add The Spices, Seasoning, Lemon Juice And Zest And Roughly Mash With A Fork. Set Aside.
7. Chipotle Mayo Drizzle
8. Combine The Mayo And Chipotle Spice And Mix To Combine.
9. To Assemble:
10. Warm The Tortillas According To Packet Instruction :.
11. Assemble With A Few Slices Of Fillet, Red Onion, Red/Yellow And Piquante Peppers, And Fresh Coriander.
12. Top With Some Salsa, Avo And A Drizzle Of Lime Juice.
13. Wrap Tightly And Enjoy!
14. Tip: For Some Added Heat, Why Not Add Some Finely Chopped Red Chillies. You Can Enjoy These Sprinkled On Top Of Your Filling Or Added To Your Salsa.

title: High Protein Chocolate Pancakes
ingredients:
1. Pancake Ingredients :
2. 40G Buckwheat Flour
3. 10G Chocolate Pea Protein
4. 10G Cocoa Powder
5. 10G Oat Flour
6. 1 Tsp Baking Powder
7. 5G Milled Flaxseed Or Chia Seed
8. 160Cups  180Cups Almond Or Cashew Milk
9. Tsp Apple Cider Vinegar
10. Sauce Ingredients :
11. 30Cups Maple Syrup
12. 30G Cocoa Powder
13. 15G Coconut Oil Melted
14. 60Cups Full Fat Coconut Milk
preparation:
1. Whisk Together All Batter Ingredients. Start With 160Ml Of Almond Or Cashew Milk And Add More To Create A Thick But Pourable Batter.
2. Heat A Non-Stick Pan Over A Medium Heat. Lightly Grease With Spray Oil.
3. Cook ¼ Cup (60Ml) Measures Of The Batter To Make 5 -6 Pancakes. Allow To Cook For 2 -3 Minutes, Flip And Cook For 1 -2 Minutes More.
4. For The Sauce, Whisk Together All Ingredients In A Small Pot, Bring The Boil And Simmer For 2 – 3 Minutes. Add A Little Hot Water If It Gets Too Thick.
5. Store Leftovers Of Sauce In The Fridge For Up To Two Days, Reheat As Needed In A Pot Or In Short 20 Second Burst In The Microwave.

title: Vegan Shabu Shabu
ingredients:
1. The Broth
2. 60G Dried Kombu
3. 2 Litres Cold Water
4. 
5. 
6. Ponzu Dipping Sauce
7. 2 Tsp Sugar
8. 2 Tbsp Lime Juice
9. 4 Tbsp Orange Juice
10. 1 Tbsp Mirin Rice Wine
11. 1 Tbsp Soy Sauce
12. 
13. 
14. The Platter
15. Create A Platter For Each Person From Any Ingredients You Like Perhaps
16. Firm Tofu
17. Cabbage Chopped
18. Spring Onion Sliced
19. Carrots Sliced
20. Mushrooms Especially The Exotic Kinds
21. Baby Corn
22. Yams Diced
23. Udon Noodles Frozen
preparation:
1. The Night Before, Make The Broth By Wiping The Kombu With A Clean Cloth, Then Steeping In Cold Water Overnight. Remove The Seaweed, Retaining The Broth. (If Short Of Time, Steep The Kombu In The Water For 30 Mins, Then Heat To Near-Boiling But Do Not Let It Boil!)
2. Combine All The Dipping Sauce Ingredients And Refrigerate.
3. When You Are Ready To Eat, Place The Broth In A Pan On The Portable Stove And Bring It To A Gentle Boil. Start Adding Ingredients From The Platter. Vegetables Like Carrots And Cabbage Take A Little Longer To Cook, So Put Some Of Those In First, Then The Tofu, And Pick Them Back Out When They Are Done! Keep Adding Ingredients From Your Platter. Don’T Worry – It Is Very Hard To Get This Wrong!!
4. As The Tofu And Vegetables Come Out Of The Pot, Dip Them In The Sauce And Eat Straight Away.

title: Chocolate, Nut and Cherry Fridge Cake
ingredients:
1. 2 X 130G Bags Nkd Cocoa Delight Fruit  Nut Bits
2. 75G Dairy Free Soya Spread
3. 75G Vegan Dark Chocolate Broken Into Pieces
4. 1 Tablespoon Fruit Syrup
5. 175G Gluten Wheat And Dairy Free Digestive
6. Biscuits Roughly Broken Into Small Pieces
7. 100G Whole Shelled Pistachios
8. 100G Whole Almonds Roughly Chopped
9. 75G Glac Cherries Halved
10. 2 X 25 G Packs Nkd Cherry Infused Raisins
preparation:
1. Makes: About 24 Squares
2. Instruction : Time: 15 Minutes, Plus 2 Hours Setting Time
3. Line The Base Of A 18Cm Square Cake Tin With Baking Paper
4. Place The Nākd Cocoa Delight Bits, Dairy Free Spread, Chocolate And Syrup In A Medium Pan, Heat Gently And Stir Occasionally Until The Butter And Chocolate Have Melted And The Nākd Cocoa Delight Fruit & Nut Bits Have Softened Slightly
5. Pour All The Remaining Ingredients, Including The Nākd Cherry Infused Raisins, Into The Chocolate Mixture And Stir Until All The Ingredients Are Evenly Coated
6. Tip The Mixture Into The Prepared Tin And Even Out The Mixture With The Back Of A Spoon, Pressing The Mixture Together
7. Chill For At Least 2 Hours Or Until Firm
8. Turn Out Onto A Board And Remove The Baking Paper. Serve Cut Into Squares
9. Cook’S Tip: The Mixture Will Keep For Up To 1 Week In An Airtight Container.

title: Breaded Chicken Skewers & Vegan Honey BBQ Sauce
ingredients:
1. 2 Packs Like Meat Breaded Chicken 180G X 2
2. Vegan Honey Bbq Sauce Recipe Below
3. Vegetables Of Choice For Example Red Pepper Red Onion Courgette And Baby Tomatoes
4. Vegan Honey Bbq Sauce
5. 200G Ketchup
6. 100G Vegan Honey Alternatively Use Agave Or Maple Syrup
7. 50G Cider Vinegar
8. 3 Tsp Brown Sugar
9. 1 Tsp Liquid Smoke
10. 1 Tsp Paprika
11. Tsp Chilli Powder
12. 1 Tsp Onion Powder
13. Tsp Garlic Powder
14. Tsp Salt
15. Tsp Ground Black Pepper
16. A Little Vegetable Oil
preparation:
1. Defrost The Like Breaded Chicken Fillets.
2. Make The Vegan Honey Bbq Sauce:
3. Measure Out Ketchup, Honey, Vinegar And Brown Sugar Into A Small Saucepan And Heat Gently, Stirring Until Smooth. Stir The Liquid Smoke And The Rest Of The Ingredients Into The Ketchup Mixture, Reduce Heat To Low, And Simmer Until Thickened, About 20 Minutes.
4. While The Sauce Is Simmering, Chop Your Veggies Chunkily. Toss In A Little Oil To Coat.
5. Carefully Cut Each Like Breaded Chicken Fillet Into 5-6 Pieces With A Sharp Knife And Place In A Large Bowl/Tub.
6. When The Vegan Honey Bbq Sauce Is Ready, Drizzle It Over The Like Breaded Chicken Pieces And Stir Gently To Ensure They’Re Evenly Coated.
7. Thread Veggies And The Sauce Coated Like Breaded Chicken Pieced Onto Skewers. (If Using Wooden Skewers, Wet Them First To Avoid Them Burning When Grilling.)
8. Cook Skewers On The Barbecue For Around 20 Mins Until Piping Hot, Turning Regularly, And Veggies Are Nicely Charred Round The Edges.
9. If The Weather Is Not Right For A Barbecue, You Can Cook The Dish In An Oven Proof Tray In The Middle Of The Oven, Pre-Heated To 200°C.
10. Serve The Like Breaded Chicken Skewers With A Fresh Summer Salad And Boiled New Potatoes, Tossed In Plant Based Butter And Topped With Chopped Fresh Chives.
11. Recipe & Photo: Rachel Clarke @Myvegandiary87

title: Mushroom Tempeh Soup
ingredients:
1. Olive Oil
2. 1 White Onion Finely Chopped
3. 2 Garlic Cloves Finely Chopped
4. 10 Chestnut Mushrooms Roughly Chopped
5. 2 Tsp Fresh Thyme Leaves
6. 1 Litre Water
7. 2 Tsp Stock Powder
8. 12 Block Tempeh Roughly Chopped
9. Salt And White Pepper
10. Black Peppercorns
11. 14 Kale Flowers Or Brussel Sprouts
12. A Squeeze Of Lemon Juice
preparation:
1. Heat The Oil In A Large Pan
2. Add The Onion, Fry It On A Medium Heat Until Soft
3. Add The Garlic And Fry For Another 5 Minutes
4. Add The Mushrooms, Thyme, Water, Stock And Tempeh
5. Simmer For 15 Minutes, Blend With A Hand Blender Till Smooth
6. Taste And Add Salt And White Pepper To Your Personal Preference
7. Grind The Black Peppercorns In A Pestle And Mortar
8. Cut The Kale Flowers Or Sprouts In Half Length Ways
9. Heat A Little Oil In A Frying Pan On A High Heat, Add The Kale Flowers/Sprouts
10. Fry For A Few Minutes, Add A Splash Of Water, A Dash Of Salt And A Lid Or Plate To Completely Cover
11. Cook For A Few Minutes Until Just Cooked, You Can Put A Fork Into Them
12. Add The Lemon Juice And Stir, Remove From The Heat
13. Pour The Soup Into Bowls And Dress With The Kale Flowers/Sprouts And Black Pepper

title: Whole Roasted Coconut Cauliflower
ingredients:
1. For The Coconut Paste
2. 4 Spring Onions Roughly Chopped
3. 1 Green Chilli Deseeded And Roughly Chopped
4. 1 Small Bunch Of Coriander Stalks And Leaves Separated Leaves Reserved For Scattering Over The Cauliflower Stalks Roughly Chopped
5. 4 Garlic Cloves Peeled And Roughly Chopped
6. 1 Small Thumb Of Fresh Root Ginger Peeled And Roughly Chopped
7. 2 Teaspoons Ground Turmeric Or 1 Small Thumb Of Fresh Turmeric Peeled And Roughly Chopped
8. 1 Tablespoon Cumin Seeds Toasted
9. 1 Tablespoon Coriander Seeds Toasted
10. 400Cups Can Coconut Milk
11. For The Coconut Cauliflower
12. 500G Baby Potatoes Larger Ones Halved
13. 1 Large Cauliflower About 750G
14. 4 Kaffir Lime Leaves
15. 4 Tablespoons Coconut Oil
16. Juice Of 1 Lime
17. 1 Teaspoon Coriander Seeds Bashed With A Pestle And Mortar Or Rolling Pin
18. 100G Curly Kale Washed
19. 2 Red Chillies Deseeded And Finely Chopped Plus 1 Extra Cut Into Slivers For Garnish But This Is Optional
20. Salt And Freshly Ground Black Pepper
preparation:
1. Preheat The Oven To 200°C/180°C Fan/Gas Mark 6.
2. First, Make The Coconut Paste. Using A Food Processor Or Stick Blender, Blitz The Spring Onions, Green Chilli, Coriander Stalks, Garlic, Ginger, Turmeric And Cumin And Coriander Seeds With Half The Can Of Coconut Milk Until A Rough Paste Forms.
3. Bring A Large Saucepan Of Water To The Boil, Lower In The Potatoes And Boil Or 15 Minutes Or Until A Sharp Knife Passes Through Them Easily. Drain And Set Aside.
4. Place The Cauliflower In A Deep Roasting Tin And Pour The Remaining Coconut Milk Around It. Scatter The Kaffir Lime Leaves Over The Coconut Milk. Rub 1 Tablespoon Of The Coconut Oil Over The Cauliflower And Season Well With Salt And Pepper. Then Use A Spatula Or Spoon To Rub The Spice Paste All Over The Cauliflower, Getting Into Every Crevice Of Each Floret. Squeeze The Lime Juice Over The Cauliflower. Cover The Tin Tightly With Foil, Place On The Middle Shelf Of The Oven And Roast The Cauliflower For 20 Minutes.
5. Meanwhile, Heat The Remaining 3 Tablespoons Coconut Oil In A Separate Shallow Roasting Tin On The Top Shelf Of The Oven Above The Cauliflower For A Couple Of Minutes. Carefully Remove The Tin From The Oven, Arrange The Potatoes In A Single Even Layer In The Hot Oil And Use A Potato Masher To Press Down On Them Just To Split Their Skins. Scatter The Mustard And Coriander Seeds Over The Top, Season Well With Salt And Pepper And Roast On The Top Shelf For 45 Minutes Until The Potatoes Are Crispy And Golden All Over.
6. Once The Cauliflower Has Roasted For 20 Minutes, Lift The Foil Away And Baste The Top With The Bubbling, Spiced Coconut Milk From The Tin. Roast, Uncovered, For A Further 25–30 Minutes Until The Top Of The Cauliflower Is Crispy And Charring.
7. When The Roasted Potatoes Are Done, Remove The Tin From The Oven, Scatter The Kale And Chopped Red Chillies Over The Potatoes And Stir To Coat In The Flavoured Oil. Roast For 5 Minutes Until The Kale Is Just Starting To Wilt But Is Still Bright Green.
8. Lift The Kale And Potatoes Out Of The Tin With A Slotted Spoon And Arrange On A Large Platter. Place The Cauliflower In The Centre Of The Platter And Spoon Over Any Bright Yellow Liquid From The Tin. Scatter Over The Reserved Coriander Leaves. At The Table, Use A Serrated Knife To Slice The Cauliflower Into Bold Wedges And, If You Want Extra Heat, Garnish With The Slivers Of Bright Red Chilli.

title: Roasted Celeriac and Caraway Soup with Herb and Caper Croutons
ingredients:
1. For The Soup
2. 1 Medium Celeriac Approx 900G Before Peeling
3. 1 Large Onion Chopped
4. 2 Cloves Garlic Chopped
5. 2 Tsp Caraway Seeds
6. Bouquet Garni Of Bay Rosemary And Sage
7. 600Cups Vegetable Stock Preferably Homemade
8. 100Cups Soya Milk Or Other Dairy Free Milk
9. For The Croutons
10. 100G Stale Bread Cut Into Very Small Cubes
11. 2 Cloves Garlic Chopped Finely
12. Zest Of A Lemon
13. A Large Handful Of Parsleyor A Selection Of Herbs That You Like
14. 1 Tbsp Capers
15. 4 Tbsps Extra Virgin Olive Oil
16. Salt And Pepper
preparation:
1. Soup:
2. Pre Heat The Oven To 200C/ Gas Mark 6.
3. Peel The Celeriac Using A Sharp Peeler And Remove Any Areas Where The Roots Are Still Visible.
4. Chop Into 1 Cm Cubes And Place In A Roasting Tin With A Splash Of Rapeseed Or Vegetable Oil.
5. Roast The Celeriac For 25 Minutes Or Until It Is Softened And Golden Around The Edges. Add The Caraway Seeds And Return To The Oven For Another Five Minutes.
6. While The Celeriac Is Roasting Heat A Little Oil In A Large Sauce Pan And Gently Cook The Onion, Until It Is Really Soft And Starting To Caramelise. Add The Garlic And Fry For Another 5 Minutes.
7. Add The Roasted Celeriac, Bouquet Garniand Caraway To The Onion Mixture And Stir Well.
8. Pour On The Stock And Soya Milk And Simmer For 5 Minutes.
9. Remove The Bouquet Garni And Blend Until Smooth With A Hand Blender. Taste, Season And Serve
10. Tip: A Bouquet Garni Is A Small Bunch Of Herbs That You Add To Soups And Stews To Infuse The Dish With Flavour-It Is Removed Before Serving. Traditionally The Herbs Are “Hard Herbs” Such As Bay, Rosemary, Sage, Thyme, All Of Which Grow Well In The British Winter. You Can Tie Them Together With Clean String (You Can Buy Cooking String From Kitchen Shops) Or Use A Heatproof Plastic Freezer Clip-One That Has Been Washed In A Hot Dishwasher Or Placed In Boiling Water Before Use To Sterilise.
11. Croutons:
12. Preheat The Oven To 200C/ Gas Mark 6
13. Heat A Roasting Dish In The Oven. Add The Oil And Then The Bread And Mix Well.
14. Cook In The Oven For Approximately 10 Minutes And Then Add The Chopped Garlic And Stir In. Return To The Oven And Roast For Another 5-10 Minutes, Stirring Occasionally So That The Bread Is Crispy And Golden.
15. Finely Chop The Herbs And Capers Together With The Lemon Zest.
16. Add The Chopped Herbs To The Crispy Croutons And Mix Together. Taste And Add Pepper (You Probably Won’T Need Salt As The Capers Are Salty Already)
17. Use To Garnish The Soup-Any Leftovers Can Be Stored In An Airtight Box In The Fridge And Will Keep For About 3 Days.
18. Tips: These Croutons Are A Great Way Of Using Up Stale Bread-They Are Traditionally Made With Sourdough Or Ciabatta Style Bread. You Can Also Use A Wheat Free Or Spelt Bread. Croutons On Their Own (Without Added Herbs) Will Keep For Weeks In A Sealed Container Out Of The Fridge-Once You Add Fresh Herbs They Won’T Last So Long And Need To Be Kept Cold. If You Like Things Spicy Add Some Flaked Chilli To The Croutons. Croutons Don’T Need To Be Just For Soup-They Are Also Great Added To Pasta Dishes, Rice Or Salads. Vary The Herbs That You Use – Parsley Is Ideal But Basil, Chives, Dill, Sorrel And Coriander Would Also Work.

title: Roast Tenderstrips Panzanella
ingredients:
1. 1 Pack Naked Glory Chilled Roast Tenderstrips
2. 1 Red Pepper
3. 100G Ciabatta Torn Into Chunks
4. 1 Tbsp Olive Oil
5. 1 Clove Garlic Crushed
6. 1 Small Red Onion Thinly Sliced
7. 150G Ripe Tomatoes
8. 1Tbsp Sherry Vinegar
9. Tbsp Capers Roughly Chopped
10. Tbsp Black Olives Pitted
11. 1 Tsp Oregano
12. 1 Bunch Basil
13. Salt And Pepper
preparation:
1. Preheat Oven To 200˚C. Put The Whole Pepper In A Roasting Tin And Roast For 20 Minutes Until The Skin Starts To Blacken. Remove From Oven And Cool. In The Same Roasting Tin, Place The Bread, Drizzle With Oil And Garlic, And Toast For 10 Mins.
2. While Bread Is Toasting, Sprinkle The Red Onion With Salt And Cover With Water For 15 Mins. Drain Thoroughly.
3. Roughly Chop The Tomatoes And Put Them In A Sieve. Sprinkle Over Plenty Of Salt And Leave Over The Salad Bowl To Catch The Juices. Peel The Cooled Pepper And Tear Into Strips.
4. Chargrill Naked Glory Roast Tenderstrips On A Hot Grill Pan, Turning Regularly.
5. Now Assemble The Salad. Add Vinegar, Capers, Olives And Bread. Mix Thoroughly And Add Naked Glory Roast Tenderstrips, Tomatoes, Onion And Pepper. Enjoy!

title: Sweet Potato Chilli Chowder
ingredients:
1. 12 Tbsp Coconut Oil
2. 2 Medium Red Onion Finely Diced
3. 3 Litres Vegetable Stock
4. 2 Large Red Peppers Finely Sliced Into 2 Cm Bitesize Slices
5. 12 Red Chillies Sliced Finely Depending How Hot You Like Your Soup Reserve A Few Slices For The Garnish
6. Optional 2 Tbsp Pulsin Protein Powder Soya Or Pea Varieties Work Well 1 Tbsp Milled Chia Seeds
7. To Garnish Freshly Chopped Parsley And A Few Slices Of Red Chilli
8. 2 Cloves Of Garlic Crushed
9. 5 Large Sweet Potatoes Approx 1Kg Roughly Chopped Into 225Cm Chunks
10. 200G Sweet Corn Kernels
11. 4 Spring Onions Finely Sliced Reserve Some For The Garnish
12. 3 Tbsp Cashew Cream Or Coconut Cream Alternatively 30G Of Silken Tofu
13. Salt And Pepper To Taste
preparation:
1. In A Deep-Bottomed Pot, Melt The Coconut Oil. Add The Crushed Garlic, Chopped Onions And Sweet Potato Chunks And Sauté For 5 Mins.
2. Add The Stock And Bring To The Boil.
3. Simmer The Soup For Approx. 13 Mins Until The Vegetables Are All Soft (You Can Check This By Poking A Fork Through A Couple Of The Sweet Potato Chunks).
4. Remove From The Heat. If Using Silken Tofu Or Protein Powder Add This Now And Blend To Make A Creamy Soup. (A Hand-Blender Is Great For This!)
5. Return The Blended Soup To The Hob And On A Low Heat Stir In The Sweet Corn, Sliced Peppers, Most Of The Chopped Chilli And Spring Onions. Stir For About 3-4 Mins Until Cooked Through.
6. Stir In The Cashew Cream Or Coconut Cream, If Using.
7. Stir In The Milled Chia Seeds Or Protein Powder If Using.
8. Season To Taste With Freshly Ground Black Pepper And Salt.
9. Ladle Into Bowls And Garnish With Chopped Spring Onion, A Few Slices Of Chopped Chilli And Some Finely Chopped Parsley. Enjoy!
10. To Transform This Soup Into A Chowder, You Have Options! You Can Add Coconut Cream, Cashew Cream Or Silken Tofu – They All Work Well!
11. So Man
12. Www.Sobody.Co.Uk
13. Hello! I Am So From Sobodyuk. I Am A Gym Bunny, Healthy Food Blogger & A Geeky Scientist! These Days My Lab Is The Kitchen! I Love Creating Delicious, Healthy, Wholefood, Clean-Eating, Nutrition-Dense Recipes To Maximise Performance & Health. My Recipes Include Paleo, Low Carb, Vegan, Vegetarian, Gluten Free.

title: Mac Daddy Taco Platter
ingredients:
1. For The Wicked Healthy Base Cheez Sauce
2. 1 Large White Onion Diced And Steam Sauted Until Translucent
3. 1 Cup  200G Raw Cashews Soaked In Water For Couple Hours Then Drained
4. 3 Cups  750Cups Unsweetened Soymilk
5. 18 Cloves Garlic Boiled Soft
6. 12 Cup  120Cups White Wine
7. 3 Tbsp Nutritional Yeast
8. 2 Tbsp Red Or White Miso
9. 1 Tsp Onion Powder
10. 1 Tsp Smoked Paprika
11. 12 Tsp Black Pepper
12. 12 Tsp White Pepper
13. 12 Tsp Salt
14. 12 Tsp Turmeric Optional For Colour
15. 400G Macaroni
16. For The Taco Platter
17. 812 Fresh Tortillas 34 Inch
18. 2 Cups  500Cups Wicked Healthy Base Cheez Sauce
19. Smoked Hot Sauce Powder Or Cayenne  Smoked Paprika Mixed
20. Sriracha Sauce
21. 14 Head Red Cabbage Shredded
22. 812 Fresh Basil Leaves
preparation:
1. To Make The Mac And Cheez
2. Dice And Steam Sauté The Onion With A Splash Or Two Of Water Or Wine, No Oil Is Needed, No Need To Bother With The Extra Empty Calories.
3. Add Warm Onions And Rest Of Ingredients To High Powered Blender.
4. Blend All Ingredients For Couple Minutes Making Sure Mixture Is Wicked Smooth.
5. Add About Half Of The Sauce To The Drained Hot Pasta And Mix Well.
6. To Make Thetaco Platter:
7. Preheat Oven To 350.
8. Warm Tortillas And Fill Each Compartment In The Cast Iron Pan.
9. Spoon The Mac And Cheese Into Each Tortilla Mould.
10. Sprinkle The Tops With Powdered Hot Sauceand Sriracha.
11. Bake At 350 Degrees For 15 Minutes.
12. Remove And Top With More Sriracha As Desired, Topping With The Cabbage Shreds And Basil.

title: Thai Vegetable Red Curry
ingredients:
1. 25G Flora Freedom Or Similar
2. 1 Tablespoon Vegetable Oil
3. 1 Red Onion Peeled And Cut Into Thin Wedges
4. 2 Garlic Cloves Crushed
5. 1 Red Chilli Deseeded And Thinly Sliced
6. 3 Tablespoons Thai Red Curry Paste
7. 410G Coconut Milk
8. 500G Sweet Potatoes Peeled And Cut Into Chunks
9. 220G Green Beans Trimmed And Halved
10. 400G Tinned Chickpeas Drained
11. 1 Lime Juiced
12. 1 Pack Basil
13. Thai Jasmine Rice Or Basmati Rice To Serve
preparation:
1. Heat Flora And Oil In A Large Frying Pan And Fry The Onion For About 5 Minutes Until Soft.
2. Add Crushed Garlic And Half The Chilli And Cook For 2-3 Minutes.
3. Stir In The Thai Red Curry Paste, Coconut Milk And 250Ml Water And Bring To The Boil.
4. Add Sweet Potatoes, Reduce Heat To A Simmer And Cook Uncovered For 10 Minutes.
5. Add Green Beans And Chickpeas And Cook For A Further 5-10 Minutes Until The Sweet Potatoes And Beans Are Just Tender.
6. Stir Through The Lime Juice And Garnish The Curry With Remaining Sliced Chilli And Basil Leaves.
7. Serve With Rice.
8. Like This Recipe? Sign Up To Veganuary Today To Get Recipes Like This Delivered Directly To Your Inbox.

title: Peach Pastries Danish
ingredients:
1. For The Custard Filling
2. 250Cups Plant Milk Oat Is Best
3. 12 Tsp Vanilla Bean Paste
4. 50G Icing Sugar
5. 30G Corn Starch
6. Pinch Turmeric Powder
7. 20G Vegan Butter
8. For The Peach Halves
9. 3 Peaches Or Six Canned Peach Halves
10. For The Pastries
11. 375G Pack Prerolled Puff Pastry Make Sure Its Plantbased
12. 4 Tbsp Plant Milk
13. 1 Tsp Vegetable Oil
14. Tsp Agave Syrup Or Maple Syrup
15. For Finishing
16. 80G Icing Sugar
17. 3 Tsp Plant Milk
18. 5 Tbsp Unsalted Pistachios Roughly Chopped
preparation:
1. To Make The Custard
2. In A Small Saucepan, Combine 200Ml Of The Plant Milk, Vanilla Bean Paste, And Icing Sugar. Whisk Well To Combine And Place Over A Low Heat.
3. Place The Remaining 50Ml Of Plant Milk In A Small Bowl And Add The Cornstarch And Turmeric Powder. Whisk Well Until Smooth And No Lumps Remain.
4. Gradually Whisk The Cornstarch Mixture Into The Warmed Plant Milk. Keep Whisking Constantly Over Low Heat Until The Mixture Thickens Dramatically. Once Thickened, Leave The Mixture To Bubble A Couple Of Times Before Removing From The Heat And Vigorously Whisking In The Vegan Butter.
5. Pour The Custard Into A Baking Tray (This Will Allow It To Cool More Quickly) And Cover With Cling Film, Making Sure The Film Is Making Contact With The Surface Of The Custard.
6. Once Cooled To Room Temperature, Refrigerate The Custard For A Minimum Of 20 Minutes.
7. To Peel The Peaches
8. If Using Fresh Peaches Rather Than Canned, Fill A Large Bowl With Ice Cold Water.
9. Place A Medium Saucepan Over Medium Heat And Bring To The Boil. Once Boiling, Remove The Pan From The Heat And Carefully Drop The Peaches Into The Water. Leave Them There For Maximum Three Mins Or Until The Skins Start To Split.
10. Use A Slotted Spoon To Remove The Peaches From The Hot Water And Put Them Straight Into The Cold Water To Stop Them From Cooking.
11. The Skin Should Slip Off Easily, But If Not, You May Need To Use A Vegetable Peeler To Start The Process.
12. Once Peeled, Halve The Peaches And Remove The Stones. Set Aside.
13. To Make The Pastries
14. Preheat The Oven To 200C Fan.
