6. In A Hot Pan With A Drizzle Of Sunflower Oil , Brown The Carrots And Shimeji Mushrooms For A Few Minutes, Add The Sliced White Onions And Fresh Ginger. Reserve The Sautéed Vegetable Mixture
7. In A Frying Pan With A Little Oil Add The Rice And Fry It On Low Power For 15 Minutes, To Slowly Evacuate The Humidity, Increase The Power To Obtain A Little Crispiness And Caramelisation On The Surface.
8. Add To Rice The Mixed Vegetables And 3 Tablespoons Of Sambal Sauce, Mix And Fry It Over Medium Heat For About 10 Minutes, Stirring Regularly
9. In Another Skillet With A Little Oil, Brown The Marinated Chicken Pieces With The Small Yellow Pepperoncini. Cook 2 Minutes On Each Side Until Nicely Browned And Add The Rice Mixture To The Chicken
10. Fry The Mixture For A Few Minutes, Add 2/3 Tablespoons Of Sambal Sauce Mix And Sprinkle With Chopped Fresh Cilantro, Roasted Sesame Seeds, Lime Zest And Juice

title: Chilli Chocolate Orange Brownies
ingredients:
1. 2 Tsp Coconut Oil Solid
2. 1 Tin Of Black Beans
3. 8 Dates Pitted And Chopped
4. 8 Tbsp Water
5. 2 Tbsp Flax Seeds
6. 1 Tsp Vanilla Extract Or Fresh Vanilla Seeds
7. 2 Tbsp Agave Nectar
8. Zest Of One Orange
9. Juice Of Half An Orange
10. Tsp Cayenne Pepper
11. 2 Tsp Baking Powder
12. 4 Tbsp Cocoa Powder
13. 2 Tbsp Cacao Nibs
14. Himalayan Pink Salt To Taste
preparation:
1. Heat The Oven To 180°C / 350°F / Gas Mark 4.
2. Put The Coconut Oil Into A Ramekin And Put This In The Oven For 5 Minutes, To Melt.
3. Drain And Thoroughly Rinse The Beans And Put Them Into A Mixing Bowl. Addthe Dates. Combine The Flax Seeds With The Water In A Small Bowl Then Add This As Well.
4. Use An Electronic Hand Blender Or Processor To Combine The Ingredients You Have In The Mixing Bowl.
5. Dab A Little Of The Cooled Coconut Oil Into Each Muffin ‘Hole’ To Prevent The Brownie Mix From Sticking (I Do This By Hand To Avoid Wasting Any, But You Could Use A Pastry Brush). Add Theremaining Oil To The Mixing Bowl.
6. Stir In The Remaining Ingredients, Except The Salt.
7. Use A Teaspoon And Spatula To Put An Equal Amount Of The Brownie Mixture Into Each Hole Of The Muffin Tray, Smooth The Top Down, And Sprinkle A Little Salt On Each.
8. Cook For 20 Minutes. Once Cooled, Store In The Fridge.
9. Hungry For More Recipes Like This? Sign Up To Veganuary For Our Celebrity Cookbook, Meal Plans, Nutritional Advice, Recipes, And More – Straight To Your Inbox. The Best Bit? It’S 100% Free!

title: Quorn Vegan Fillets & Szechuan Noodles
ingredients:
1. 4 Quorn Vegan Fillets
2. 1Tsp Sesame Seeds
3. 2 Tsp Szechuan Peppercorns Crushed
4. 100G Noodles
5. 2 Tbsp Olive Oil
6. 1 Large Onion Finely Sliced
7. 1 Red Pepper Deseeded And Finely Sliced
8. 4 Tbsp Soy Sauce
preparation:
1. Toast The Sesame Seeds Until Golden Brown Over A Medium High Heat In A Non Stick Frying Pan Then Leave To One Side
2. Heat One Tablespoon Of Oil In A Pan And Add The Chicken Style Fillets And Szechuan Pepper. Cook For 10 Minutes Over A Medium Heat, Turning Frequently Then Set Aside And Keep Warm. Fry The Onion And Pepper Until Soft
3. Meanwhile Cook The Noodles In Boiling Water As Per Pack Instruction :, Drain And Keep Warm
4. In A Separate Pan, Cook The Green Vegetables In Boiling Water For 5 Minutes, Drain And Add To The Onions And Peppers With The Noodles, Soy Sauce, Coriander, Sesame Seeds
5. Serve The Noodles Topped With The Sliced Quorn Meat Free Chicken Fillets

title: Fresh Salad with Homemade Cocktail Sauce
ingredients:
1. 90 G Heura Tiras Originales Or Other Vegan Meatstyle Strips
2. 60 G Rocket
3. 1 Avocado
4. 1 Beetroot
5. 1 Tbsp Pumpkin Seeds
6. 30 G Alfalfa Sprouts
7. 90 G Mushrooms
8. 150 G Precooked  Canned Chickpeas
9. 12 Lemon
10. For The Homemade Cocktail Sauce
11. 50 G Raw Ground Almonds
12. 70 Cups Water
13. 10 G Salt
14. 500 Cups Olive Oil
15. 15 Cups Lemon Juice
16. 50 G Ketchup
preparation:
1. Prepare The Homemade Cocktail Sauce By Whisking Together The Almonds, Water And Salt. Then Gradually Whisk In The Olive Oil.
2. Add The Ketchup And A Squeeze Of Lemon Juice And Whisk Together To Finish The Sauce.
3. Prepare The Salad By Putting The Rocket And Chickpeas Into A Bowl.Slice The Mushrooms And Add Them To The Mixture.
4. Fry The Heura® (Or Other) Strips In A Skillet Until Golden Brown. If You Like Them Crispy, Sauté For Another Minute.Put Them On Top Of The Salad Mix And Add The Sliced Avocado.
5. Sprinkle The Sprouts And Pumpkin Seeds On Top.
6. Dress With A Splash Of Olive Oil, A Bit Of Lemon Juice And A Pinch Of Salt.
7. Finally, Top With A Generous Spoonful Of Homemade Cocktail Sauce.

title: Crunchy Spelt Raisin Cookies
ingredients:
1. 300G Spelt Flakes 105 Oz  Us 3 Cups
2. 125G Wholemeal Spelt Flour 44 Oz  Us 34 Cup Packed
3. 125G Sultanas 44 Oz
4. 1 Tsp Cinnamon
5. 1 Tsp Vanilla Extract
6. 1 Tsp Bicarbonate Of Soda
7. 12 Tsp Baking Powder
8. 12 Tsp Salt
9. 125Cups Melted Coconut Oil 42 Fl Oz  Us 12 Cup
10. 200G Light Brown Sugar 7Oz  Us 1 Cup
11. 2 Chia Eggs 2 Tbsp Ground Chia Seeds  6 Tbsp Of Water
preparation:
1. Pre-Heat The Oven To 180°C/350°F/Gas 4.
2. In A Bowl, Prepare Chia Eggs By Mixing 2 Tbsp Ground Chia Seeds With 6 Tbsp Of Water. Leave To Rest For 10 Mins.
3. In Another Bowl, Soak Sultanas Covered With Boiling Water For 10 Mins.
4. Cream Chia Eggs And Sugar. Add Cinnamon, Vanilla, Bicarbonate Of Soda, Baking Powder, Salt And Coconut Oil. Mix Well.
5. Mix In Spelt Flakes And Spelt Flour. Add Drained Sultanas Last. Mix Together Until Everything Is Well Blended.
6. Line A Baking Tray With Parchment Paper.
7. Drop 1 Heaped Tablespoon At A Time To Make Cookies Of Around 8Cm (3 Inches) Diameter And 1.5Cm (0.5 Inch) Thickness. Space Them Apart. Cook For 10-12 Mins Until Golden.
8. Once Cooked Place The Cookies Carefully On A Cooling Rack To Cool Down Completely. These Cookies Will Keep In An Airtight Container For Up To 3-5 Days.

title: Pear and Coconut Crumble
ingredients:
1. 46 Large Ripe Pears
2. 6 Tbsp Coconut Oil Or Margarine
3. 10 Tbsp Coconut Sugar Or Other Unrefined Sugar Or Maple Syrup
4. Juice Of Half A Lemon
5. 2 Cups Coconut Cream
6. Dusting Of Ground Ginger
7. Crumble
8. 13 Cup Solid Coconut Oil Or Margarine But Coconut Is Better
9. Cup Coconut Sugar Or Other Unrefined Sugar
10. 2 Cups Jumbo Oats
11. 13 Cup Desiccated Coconut
12. Cup 80 Dark Chocolate Broken Into Pieces Ginger Chocolate Is Especially Good
preparation:
1. Preheat The Oven To 350F/180C. Peel The Pears, Cut In Half, And Remove The Stalks And Seeds. Drizzle With Lemon Juice To Stop Browning.
2. Melt Coconut Oil (Or Margarine) In A Pan, And Add The Pear Halves. Add The Sugar, And Allow To Caramelise.
3. After About Fifteen Minutes, Add The Coconut Cream. Place The Contents Into A Casserole Dish. It Will Look Like There’S Too Much Liquid, But Don’T Worry, As It Will Be Absorbed By The Crumble.
4. Make The Crumble: I Prefer Not To Use Flour In My Crumble As I’M Gluten Free, But If You’D Like It, Use About 80G Flour, And Half The Amount Of Oats. Rub The Oil Or Margarine Into The Oats. Add The Sugar And Desiccated Coconut. Add The Pieces Of Chocolate And Mix Well. Place The Mixture Onto The Top Of The Pears. Bake For 45 Minutes.
5. Serve With Soya Cream Or Soya Ice Cream.

title: Carrot Cake Bites
ingredients:
1. 80G Walnuts
2. 1 Small Carrot Grated
3. 7 Dates Pitted
4. Zest Of 1 Lemon Unwaxed
5. Pinch Ground Cinnamon
6. Pinch Ground Nutmeg
7. 1 Tsp Maple Syrup
8. 15G Dried Fruit Goji Berries Sour Cherries Or Sultanas
9. 25G Desiccated Coconut
preparation:
1. Begin By Blitzing The Walnuts In A Food Processor Until They Form A Powder (How Chunky You Want This To Be Is Up To You).
2. Add The Rest Of The Ingredients, Except The Coconut, To The Food Processor And Pulse On A Slow Speed Until They All Come Together. Increase The Speed To Form A Smoother Paste.
3. Taking A Teaspoon Of The Carrot Cake Mixture At Time, Roll Into Balls Using Your Hands And Coat In The Coconut.
4. Place In The Freezer Until Needed.
5. Like This Recipe? Sign Up To Try Veganuary Today To Get Recipes Like This Delivered Directly To Your Inbox.

title: Vegan Cheese, Pâté and Crackers
ingredients:
1. Cashew Nut Cheese
2. 280G Cashew Nuts
3. 250Cups Water
4. 2 Tbsp Lemon Juice
5. 2 Tbsp Nutritional Yeast
6. 1 12 Tsp Salt
7. 12 Tsp Onion Granules
8. 14 Tsp Ground Nutmeg
9. Mushroom And Chestnut Pt
10. 500G Mushrooms I Used Chestnut Mushrooms
11. 100G Chestnuts
12. 250G Firm Tofu
13. 2 Shallots
14. 3 Cloves Of Garlic
15. 12 Tsp Nutritional Yeast
16. 14 Tsp Peppercorns
17. 12 Tsp Salt
18. 1 Tsp Chopped Or Dried Herbs Such As Sage Or Thyme
19. 3 Tbsp Mushroom Ketchup Optional
20. 1 Tbsp Lemon Juice
21. Flax Seed Crackers
22. 300G Flax Seeds You Can Used Half Golden And Half Brown If You Have Them
23. 30G Sunflower Seeds
24. 200Cups Water
25. 12 Tsp Salt
26. A Small Bunch Of Cavolo Nero
preparation:
1. Individually These Recipes Are Pretty Simple And Easy But It Is A Bit Of Work Making Them All. However, I Find There’S Plenty Of Time Around Christmas To Spend A Few Hours In The Kitchen And These Recipes Will Make Enough To Keep You And Your Family Going Over The Festive Period.
2. The Flax Seed Crackers Recipe Makes About 30 Crackers, 15 Plain And 15 Flavoured. I Used Cavolo Nero But You Can Use Any Leafy Greens Or Even Sun-Dried Tomatoes, Or Whatever You Fancy To Flavour Them.
3. Cashew Nut Cheese
4. Place The Cashews In A Glass Bowl And Cover With Water, Leave Them To Soak For At Least 2 Hours Or Leave Them Overnight.
5. Drain The Cashews, Blend Them With 250Ml Water, The Nutritional Yeast, Salt And Lemon Juice. If Your Nutritional Yeast Flakes Are Quite Large You Might Want To Put Them In The Blender First To Break Them Down So They Are Nice And Small. Keep Blending The Mix Until You Get A Nice Creamy Paste.
6. Stir In The Onion Granules And Nutmeg.
7. Pour The Mixture Into A Tin Or Bowl And Leave It At Room Temperature, Covered For 12 Hours.
8. Put The Mixture Into The Fridge And Leave To Chill For At Least 2 Hours.
9. Mushroom And Chestnutpâté
10. Cut A Cross In The Shell Of Each Chestnut And Roast Them On A Baking Tray For 30 Minutes At 170C.
11. Place Your Block Of Tofu On A Flat Surface Between Two Folded Sheets Of Kitchen Paper And Place Something Heavy On Top To Press Out The Water.
12. Whilst The Chestnuts Are Roasting, Sauté The Onion And Garlic In A Large Frying Pan Until Soft. Roughly Chop The Mushrooms And Add Them To The Pan, Cooking Them For 10-15 Minutes Until All The Liquid Has Evaporated.
13. Stir In The Crushed Peppercorns, Salt, Herbs And Mushroom Ketchup. Cook For Another Few Minutes Until The Ketchup Has Reduced Down, Then Set Aside To Cool.
14. Once The Chestnuts Are Roasted, Take Them Out Of The Oven And Leave Them To Cool Before Shelling Them.
15. Put The Chestnuts Into A Blender And Blitz Until Roughly Chopped. Add The Cooled Mushroom Mixture, Tofu, Nutritional Yeast And Lemon Juice. Blend To A Fairly Smooth Paste.
16. Spoon The Mixture Into A Springform Tin Or Lined Loaf Tin And Press Down Firmly. Chill In The Fridge For At Least 2 Hours, Preferably Overnight.
17. Flax Seed Crackers
18. Grind Half The Flax Seeds With The Sunflower Seeds In A Blender Or Spice Grinder.
19. Mix Together The Ground Seeds With The Whole Flax Seeds, Salt And Water.
20. Put Half This Mixture Into A Blender With The Cavolo Nero.
21. Line Two Baking Trays With Baking Paper And Spoon Out The Two Mixtures On The Trays And Press Down Firmly With The Back Of A Spoon.
22. Score The Mixture Into Small Squares And Bake At 170C For 30 Mins Or Until The Begin To Crisp Slightly And Aren’T Too Chewy Inside. (If You Have A Dehydrator, Even Better!)
23. Lift The Baking Paper And Crackers Out Of The Trays And Place On A Wire Rack, Serve Once Cooled.

title: Artichoke Soup With Balsamic Reduction
ingredients:
1. 1 Tablespoon Extra Virgin Olive Oil
2. 4 Sticks Of Celery Finely Chopped
3. 2 Garlic Cloves Finely Chopped
4. 10 Mini Artichokes Stem Choke And Top Of Leaves Removed
5. 1 Tablespoon Truffle Oil
6. 2 Litres Vegetable Stock
7. 4 Tablespoons Balsamic Vinegar
8. 1 Preserved Lemon Finely Chopped
preparation:
1. Heat The Oil In A Large Saucepan
2. Fry The Celery For 10 Minutes On A Medium Heat
3. Add The Garlic. Fry For A Further 5 Minutes
4. Add The Artichokes And Stock
5. Simmer For 20 Minutes Until The Artichokes Are Soft
6. Blend With A Hand Blender Until Completely Smooth
7. Add Salt To Taste
8. In A Small Pan Heat The Balsamic Vinegar Until It Is Bubbling
9. Allow The Vinegar To Reduce By One Half
10. Pour The Soup Into Bowls
11. Drizzle The Balsamic Reduction And Truffle Oil Over The Soup
12. Scatter The Preserved Lemon On Top

title: Sweet and Fruity Couscous Recipe
ingredients:
1. 150 G Couscous
2. 125 Cups Cashew Milk
3. 1 Tsp Cinnamon
4. 8 Dates
5. 6 Dried Figs
6. 6 Dried Apricots
7. 4 Tbsp Raisins
8. 3 Tbsp Coarsely Chopped Almonds
9. 3 Tbsp Grated Almond
10. 1 Pomegranate
11. A Couple Of Mint Leaves
12. 1 Tbsp Of Orange Blossom Water
preparation:
1. Put The Couscous In A Large Bowl And Immerse In Boiling Water.
2. Cover The Bowl And Let The Couscous Swell Up.
3. If The Water Is Completely Absorbed After 3-4 Mins, You Can Mash The Couscous With A Fork And Let It Cool.
4. Smother The Couscous With The Cashew Milk And Stir In The Cinnamon.
5. Cut The Dates, Figs And Apricots In Pieces And Mix With The Raisins, Almond, The Orange Blossom Water And Add Everything To The Couscous.
6. Cut The Pomegranate In Half And Submerge It In Water.
7. Loosen The Seeds With Your Hands.
8. The Seeds Will Sink To The Bottom And The Skin Will Float On The Surface.
9. Remove The Skin From The Water And Drain The Water.
10. Add The Seeds To The Couscous.
11. Serve With A Couple Of Leaves Of Mint.
12. Want To See More Recipes Like This? Sign Up To Veganuary For Our Celebrity Cookbook, Meal Plans, Nutritional Advice And More Recipes. Plus, It’S 100% Free. What’S Not To Love?

title: Winter Vegetable Coulibiac with Porcini Mushroom Sauce
ingredients:
1. For The Coulibiac
2. 400G Brussels Sprouts 14 Oz
3. 2 Handfuls Fresh Cranberries
4. 200G Vacuum Packed Chestnuts 7 Oz
5. 75G Basmati  Wild Rice 26 Oz
6. 3 Large Banana Echallion Shallots Finely Chopped
7. 2 Large Garlic Cloves Crushed
8. 2 Tbsp Light Brown Sugar
9. 2 Tbsp Balsamic Vinegar
10. 2 Large Handfuls Of Chopped Parsley Leaves
11. 1 Vegan Puff Pastry I Used Jus Rol  Melted Dairy Free Butter To Seal
12. For The Porcini Mushroom Sauce
13. 50G Dried Porcini Mushrooms 175Oz
14. 1 Small Onion Finely Chopped
15. 1 Large Garlic Clove Crushed
16. 2 Tbsp Fresh Rosemary Leaves Chopped
17. 500Cups Vegetable Stock Just Under 12 Pint  Us 2 Cups
18. 125Cups Vegan White Wine 4 Fl Oz  Us 1 Cup
19. 1 Tbsp Dairy Free Butter
20. 1 Tbsp Plain Flour
21. 3 Tbsp Dairy Free Cream
22. Salt  Pepper
23. Olive Oil
preparation:
1. The Only Piece Of Equipment You Need For The Top Is A Lattice Pastry Cutter. If You Do Not Have One Just Cover The Top With A Regular Sheet Of Pastry Leaving A Little Hole In The Middle So The Steam Can Escape.
2. Put Porcini Mushrooms In A Bowl And Cover With Boiling Water. Set Aside.
3. Cook The Rice According To Packet Instruction :. It Should Still Have A Bit Of A Bite. Drain And Set Aside.
4. In The Meantime, Heat Some Olive Oil In A Large Frying Pan. Add Banana Shallots And 2 Crushed Garlic Cloves. Fry Gently Until Golden And Soft.
5. Clean Brussels Sprouts. Cut Them In Thin Slices.
6. Add Brussels Sprouts To Frying Pan With Cranberries, Balsamic Vinegar And Sugar. Mix Well And Cook Together For 10 Mins.
7. Add Chopped Chestnuts. Cook Together For 5-10 Mins Until Sprouts And Cranberries Are Cooked. Season To Taste.
8. Preheat The Oven To 200°C/400°F/Gas 6.
9. Roll Out Puff Pastry To A Rectangle Of About 33 X 44 Cm (13 X 17 Inch). Cut Pastry To Obtain Two Rectangles Of Different Widths. One Should Be About 19 X 44 Cm (7.5 X 17 Inch) And The Other 14 X 44 Cm (5.5 X 17 Inch).
10. Cover A Baking Tray With Some Parchment Paper. Please Large Piece Of Pastry On Top.
11. Blend Vegetables And Rice Together And Pile The Mixture On Top Of Pastry Leaving A 3 Cm (Just Over 1 Inch) Edge All Around. Brush The Edges With Some Melted Dairy Free Butter.
12. Run The Lattice Pastry Cutter In The Middle Of The Smaller Piece Of Pastry Leaving An Edge Of Around 3 Cm (Just Over 1 Inch). Carefully Place On Top Of The Vegetable/ Rice Mixture. The Lattice Will Open As It Goes Over The Filling. Press Edges Together To Seal, Folding Pastry If Necessary.
13. Brush Melted Dairy Free Butter On The Lattice And Place In The Oven For Around 20 Mins Until Golden.
14. In The Meantime Make The Porcini Mushroom Sauce. Heat Some Olive Oil In A Saucepan. Fry Onion, Garlic And Rosemary Until Soft.
15. Add Porcini Mushrooms With Their Liquid, Vegetable Stock And Wine. Boil Together Until Liquid Has Reduced By Half.
16. Put Flour In A Bowl And Dilute With Some Of The Liquid From The Mushroom Sauce, Making Sure There Are No Lumps.
17. Add Butter And Diluted Flour To The Mushroom Sauce. Whisk Regularly And Cook Under High Heat Until It Has Thickened. Blend Cream In Just Before Serving. Season To Taste.
18. Serve Coulibiac With Porcini Mushroom Sauce On The Side.

title: Granola
ingredients:
1. 3 Cups Rolled Oats
2. Cup Mixed Nuts
3. Cup Mixed Seeds
4. Cup Flaked Almonds
5. Cup Desiccated Coconut
6. 1 Tsp Cinnamon
7. 1 Cup Unsweetened Apple Juice
8. Cup Rice Syrup
9. Cup Maple Syrup
10. 1 Cup Dried Raisins Or Other Fruit Of Your Choice
preparation:
1. Place The Oats, Nuts, Seeds, Flaked Almonds And Coconut In A Large Bowl And Mix Together. In A Small Bowl, Whisk The Apple Juice, Rice Syrup And Maple Syrup And Pour Over The Dry Mixture Stirring Thoroughly.
2. Heat The Oven To 180C/350F. Add The Mixture To A Baking Sheet And Bake For Around 25 To 35 Minutes Until Golden Brown And Crisp. Every 5 Minutes, Stir The Mixture And Turn It Over To Allow Even Browning Of The Oats.
3. Remove From The Oven And Allow To Cool. Stir In The Dried Fruit. Store In A Sealed Container.
4. Serve With Rice Milk Or Almond Milk And Some Fresh Berries When In Season.

title: Nutty Slices with Strawberry Chia Jam
ingredients:
1. Strawberry Chia Jam
2. 2 Cups Of Diced Strawberries
3. 14 Cup Maple Syrup
4. 3 4 Tbsp Of Chia Seeds
5. Slice And Crumble
6. 2 And 12 Cups Of Gluten Free Oats
7. 1 Cup Peanut Butter
8. 14 Cup Maple Syrup
9. 1 Small Apple Blended To Apple Sauce
10. 1 Tsp Cinnamon
11. 1 Flax Seed Or Chia Egg   Cup Of Water Mixed With  Cup Of Flax Seeds Or Chia Seeds
12. 12  34 Cup Of Sliced Almonds
preparation:
1. Preheat Oven To 160 Degrees.
2. Simmer The Strawberry Chia Jam Ingredients On Low Heat Until It Thickens. Set Aside To Cool Down
3. Then Make The Slices:
4. Combine Oats, Apple Sauce, Cinnamon And ‘Egg’.
5. Mix Maple Syrupand Peanut Butter Together And Put In A Microwave For 20 Seconds.
6. Pour Into The Oats Mixture And Combine Thoroughly, So All The Oats Are Fully Coated.
7. Now Set 1/2 Cup Of The Oats Mixture Aside And Put The Remaining Mixture Into A Square Glass Dish. Press Down Firmly And Spread The Strawberry Chia Jam On The Top.
8. Crumble The Reserved 1/2 Cup Of Oat Mixture And Sliced Almonds Over And Press The Topping Down Making Sure It Sticks Well.
9. Bake For 25-30 Minutes.
10. Love This Recipe? Sign Up To Veganuary (For Free!) And Get Our Celebrity Cookbook And More Sent Straight To You.

title: Five Ingredient Chocolate Chip Pecan Cookies
ingredients:
1. Makes 12 Cookies
2. 170G 1 Heaped And Packed Cup Of Flour Whole Wheat Spelt White Gluten Free
3. 60G 12 Cup Toasted Pecans
4. 85G 12 Cup Dried Apricots
5. 6 Tbsp Almond Milk Or Other Non Dairy Milk
6. 60G Heaped 14 Cup Dark Vegan Chocolate Chips
7. Pinch Of Sea Salt Optional
8. Sweetener Of Choice Such As 12 Tbsp Maple Or Agave Syrup 1 Tsp Nunaturals Simple Syrup 24 Drops Of Plain Or Vanilla Stevia Liquid Optional
preparation:
1. Makes 12 Cookies
2. Preheat The Oven To 180C/350F And Line A Baking Sheet.
3. Process The Flour, Pecans, Apricots And Salt If Using In A Food Processor Until Crumbly. Gradually Add The Milk And Sweetener If Using Until A Moist But Not Sticky Ball Of Dough Is Formed.
4. Transfer To A Bowl And Work In The Chocolate Chips By Hand.
5. Divide The Dough Into 12 And Roll Each Onto A Ball And Place Spaced Apart On The Baking Sheet. Flatten The Cookies With Your Palm, They Won’T Spread Much While Baking.
6. Bake For 10-12 Minutes Until Golden And Firm To Touch. Cool On A Wire Rack.

title: Hijiki Quinoa Salad with Orange Ume Plum Dressing
ingredients:
1. 1 Cup Quick Cook Rice  Quinoa
2. 3 Cups Filtered Water Or Organic Vegetable Stock
3. Cup Hijiki Rinsed And Soaked For 10 Minutes
4. Yellow Pepper Very Thinly Sliced
5. 1 Bunch Fresh Watercress
6. 1 Small Bunch Of Red Radishes Very Thinly Sliced
7. Fresh Sprouts Mung Beans Or Alfalfa
8. 3 Tbsp Roasted Seeds With Goji Berries Purchase As A Mix Or Make Your Own
9. Juice Of Half A Lemon
10. Juice Of 1 Orange
11. 2 Tsps  Umeboshi Pureepaste
12. 2 Tbsp Omega Flaxseed Oil
13. 2 Tsps Finely Chopped Chives
preparation:
1. Prepare The Quick Cook Rice And Quinoa As Per Pack Instruction :.
2. Remove To A Large Bowl And Leave To Cool Then Fluff Up With A Fork.
3. Cook The Soaked Hijiki In A Small Saucepan With Enough Water To Cover, Simmering For 10 Minutes.
4. Remove From The Heat, Drain Any Excess Water And Allow To Cool.
5. Add The Hijiki To The Rice Along With The Watercress, Yellow Pepper, Radishes And Sprouts And Mix Gently.
6. Pour Over The Orange Ume Plum Dressing And Top With The Roasted Seeds/Goji Berries.
7. Orange Ume Plumdressingis Adelicious Dressing That Works Well Withthishijiki Salad, Or You Can Simply Serve It Over Fresh Greens Or Noodle Salads In The Summer. Store In A Glass Jar In The Refrigerator For Up To 5 Days.
8. Combine The Ingredients Marked With A (*) To Make The Dressing.

title: Miso Sweet Potato Pie with a Crispy Onion Crust
ingredients:
1. 56 Large Sweet Potatoes
2. 1 Litre Vegan Cheese Sauce
3. 2 Small White Onions Skinned And Left Whole
4. 1 Tsp Ginger Minced
5. 1 Tsp Miso
6. 1 Lime Juiced
7. 1 Tsp Rosemary Minced
8. 1 Tsp Kosher Salt
9. 1 Tsp Black Pepper
preparation:
1. In A Medium-Size Bowl Add Ginger, Lime, Miso And Herbs And Mix Well, Add Wicked Healthy “Cheez’ Sauce To This And Mix Until Incorporated.
2. Slice Potatoes As Thin As You Can On Mandolin. Mind Your Fingers! Best Not To Rinse Them After Slicing, Add To A Large Bowl.
3. Slice Onions Into Super Thin Rounds, Rinse With Cold Water And Set Aside In A Separate Bowl.
4. Add Sauce With The Sweet Potatoes And Mix Well To Coat Each Slice. Add A Little Sauce To The Onions Too And Toss.
5. In A Large Baking Pan. Spray Oil Pan And Assemble Potatoes Evenly Throughout The Pan About 3 Inches Thick / Pour The Remainder Of Sauce On Top. Just Enough So It Reaches The Top 1/2 Inch Of The Layers.
6. Mix Onions With A Little Bit Of Extra Sauce Just Enough To Coat And Spread Evenly On Top Of Potatoes.
7. Cover With Tin Foil – Try To Keep Foil Tight And Not Touching The Top Of The Potatoes.
8. Bake Covered @ 350 Degrees For 60 Minutes Or Until Tender And Skewer Can Go Through Easily.
9. Uncover And Roast Another 10 – 15 Minutes To Brown The Top And Crisp The Onions – Remove From Heat And Let Rest 20 Minutes Before Slicing.
10. Want More Recipes Like This? Sign Up To Veganuary For Our Celebrity Cookbook, Recipes, Meal Plans And More Straight To Your Inbox. (It’S Also 100% Free!)

title: Vegan Fish Fingers
ingredients:
1. Step 1 Ingredients
2. Plenty Of Cooking Oil
3. Sushi Sheets
4. Step 2 Ingredients
5. 250G Extra Firm Tofu
6. 150G Artichoke Hearts In Oil
7. Juice Of 12 Lemon
8. Step 3 Ingredients
9. 80G Chickpea Flour
10. 5 Tbsp Nutritional Yeast
11. 2 Tbsp Olive Oil
12. 1 12 Tsp Salt
13. 1 Tsp Garlic Powder
14. Step 4 Ingredients
15. Breadcrumbs Eg Glutenfree Ones
16. Optional Ingredients
17. Lemons
18. Peas
19. Ketchup
20. Vegan Mayo
21. Potatoes Salad
22. Chips
preparation:
1. Step 1:
2. Pour Cooking Oil Into A Pan And Add 1 Pack Of Sushi Nori Sheets To Infuse The Oil. The Longer You Leave Them In The Better: E.G. You Could Soak Them In The Morning And Then Cook The Vegan Fish Fingers In The Evening For A More Intense Taste. Alternatively, If You Don’T Have Much Time Heat Them Up A Bit For 5 Minutes So They Give Up More Flavour. Make Sure The Heat Isn’T Too High Because They Burn Easily.
3. Step 2:
4. Place Ingredients Of Step 2 Into A Food Processor Until You Get A Semi-Smooth Mixture.
5. Step 3:
6. Transfer The Mixture Into A Large Bowl And Add All Other Ingredients From This Step And Mix. Make Sure There Are No Chickpea Flour Lumps, Otherwise The Fish Fingers Might Taste Bitter.
7. Form Fish Finger Shapes. Alternatively, Just Form Sausage Shapes. Admittedly It Was A Bit Of Work To Make Rectangular Shapes And When They Were Fried They Lost Their Shape A Bit Anyway. So If You Want To Make Your Life Easier, Roll Them Into A Sausage Shape, It Won’T Make A Difference In Terms Of Taste. They Will Be Quite Soft At This Stage, But Don’ Worry They Will Firm Up When Fried.
8. Step 4:
9. Add Breadcrumbs To A Bowl And Roll The Vegan Fish Fingers In Them Until They Are Covered On All Sides.
10. Take The Sushi Sheets Out Of The Pan With Cooking Oil And Heat Up The Pan. Fry The Fish Fingers In The Pan Until They Are Golden Brown. Place On A Kitchen Towel To Soak Up The Excess Oil.
11. Optionally Drizzle Some Lemon Juice On Top When Serving The Fish Fingers. Have Cooked Peas, Chips Or Potato Salad And Ketchup Or Vegan Mayo On The Side. Enjoy!
12. Did You Enjoy This Dish? Explore More Vegan Seafood Recipes.

title: Cottage Pie Cobbler
ingredients:
1. 2 Tsp Olive Oil
2. 1 Red Onion
3. 6 Cloves Garlic
4. 250G Chestnut Mushrooms
5. 1 Small Carrot
6. 15G Fresh Rosemary Leaves Picked
7. Tsp Dried Chilli Flakes
8. 1 Tsp Each Smoked Paprika Ground Cinnamon And Coriander Seeds
9. 2 Tbsp Pumpkin Seeds
10. 125Cups Red Wine
11. 2 Tbsp Red Wine Vinegar
12. 1 Tbsp Tamarisoy Sauce Or A Handful Of Olives
13. 2 Tbsp Tomato Pure
14. 1 Tin Chopped Tomatoes 400G Plus  Tin Water
15. 1 Tin Puy Lentils 400G  Drained Weight 240G Rinsed
16. 250G Spinach
17. 600G Potatoes I Like To Use Rooster Potatoes
18. To Season Black Pepper Nutritional Yeast
preparation:
1. Preheat The Oven To 220°C / 425°F / Gas Mark 7.
2. I Use An Enamel Cast-Iron Casserole Dish For This Recipe, However You Could Just As Easily Prepare The Sauce In A Pan On The Hob And Transfer To An Oven Dish For Baking.
3. Puy Lentils Also Go By The Name Of ‘Lentilles Vertes’ And Can Be Found Tinned, Dried Or Vacuum Packed In Most Supermarkets.
4. Place A Heavy-Based Casserole Dish On The Hob And Heat The Oil On A Moderate To High Heat. Chop The Onion, Garlic, Mushrooms, Carrot And Rosemary Leaves And Add These To The Oil, Stirring.
5. Leave To Sauté For 5 Minutes, Or Until The Onions Soften.
6. Stir In The Chilli Flakes, Smoked Paprika, Cinnamon, Coriander Seeds And Pumpkin Seeds, Followed By The Red Wine, Vinegar, Tamari, Tomato Purée, Chopped Tomatoes And Water. Simmer For 10 Minutes.
7. While This Is Bubbling Away, Slice The Potatoes As Thinly As You Can.
8. Now Add The Lentils, Spinach And Black Pepper To The Sauce And Give It A Good Stir. Remove From The Heat And Arrange The Potato Slices To Cover The Dish In Any Pattern You Like. If You Are Using Nutritionalyeast, Sprinkle Onto The Potato Topping.
9. Cover The Dish And Cook In The Oven For 20 Minutes.
10. Remove The Lid And Return To The Oven For A Further 20 Minutes. The Potatoes Should Be Cooked Through And Nicely Crisp.
11. Serve With Lovely Steamed Greens Or A Fresh Salad.

title: Vegan Lava Cake
ingredients:
1. 1 Pack Violife Cocospread
2. 120G Allpurpose Flour
3. 60Cups Coconut Oil
4. 100Cups Canned Coconut Milk
5. 22G Dark Chocolate In 4 Pieces
6. 100G Sugar
7. Tspsalt
8. 1Tspcocoa Powder
9. Tspbaking Powder
10. Tspbaking Soda
11. 1Tsp Vanilla Extract
12. Icing Sugar To Serve
preparation:
1. Prep Time: 30 Mins
2. Makes: 4
3. Preheat Oven To 180°C. Grease 4 Ramekins With Coconut Oil And Then Dust With Flour, Shaking Off Any Excess.
4. In A Large Bowl, Whisk Together The Flour, Sugar, Cocoa Powder, Salt, Baking Powder And Baking Soda. Pour In The Coconut Oil And Vanilla Extract. Gradually Add Coconut Milk And Violife Cocospread. Whisk Until Smooth.
5. Divide The Batter Into The Prepared Ramekins. Push One Piece Of Dark Chocolate Into The Center Of Each Ramekin.
6. Bake For 25 Minutes, Remove From Oven And Allow To Cool Slightly For 10 Minutes, Before Removing From The Ramekin And Serving Upside Down. You Might Need The Help Of A Knife To Release The Cake From Its Mold Along The Sides Of The Ramekin.
7. You Can Serve With Vegan Ice Cream Or Simply Sprinkle With Some Icing Sugar.

title: Chocolate Brownies
ingredients:
1. 75 G Dried Pitted Prunes
2. 75 G Flora Freedom Or Similar
3. 200 G Golden Caster Sugar
4. 2 Tablespoons Golden Syrup
5. 1 Teaspoon Vanilla Essence
6. 175 G Plain Flour
7. 25 G Cocoa Powder
8. 1 Level Teaspoon Baking Powder
9. 100 Cups Soya Milk
10. 50 G Dark Chocolate Roughly Chopped
preparation:
1. Preheat Oven To 180° C, 160° C Fan, Gas Mark 4.
2. Place Prunes In A Heatproof Bowl, Pour Over 5 Tablespoons Of Boiling Water And Leave To Stand For 15-20 Minutes.
3. Liquidize The Prune Mixture Using A Hand Blender Until Smooth And Pour Into A Large Mixing Bowl.
4. Sieve The Flour Into A Bowl, Then Add The Remaining Ingredients, Except The Chocolate, And Mix Well Together.
5. Stir Through Half Of The Chocolate Then Spoon The Mixture Into A Greased And Lined 20Cm Square Tin.
6. Sprinkle The Remaining Chopped Chocolate Over The Top And Bake In Preheated Oven For 30 Minutes Until Well Risen.
7. Check To See If Your Cake Is Cooked By Inserting A Skewer Into The Centre Of Each Half.
8. If It Comes Out Clean, Leave The Cakes In The Tins For 5 Minutes Before Turning Out And Cooling On A Wire Rack. Cut Into 16 Squares.

title: Long Grain Brown Rice Pilaf with Toasted Almonds
ingredients:
1. 4 Shallots Thinly Sliced
2. 2 Large Clove Garlic Minced
3. 1 Tsp Turmeric
4. 1 Cup Long Grain Brown Rice
5. 2  Cups Organic Vegetable Stock
6. 1 Tsp Rice Mirin
7. 1 Tsp Shoyu Or Tamari Soy Sauce
8. Cup Toasted Almonds
9. Cup Coriander Minced
10. 1 Spring Onion Thinly Sliced
11. 2 Tbsp Sweet White Miso
12. 1 Tbsp Tahini
13. Tsp Soy Sauce Shoyu Or Tamari
14. Cup Spring Or Filtered Water Used Sparingly
15. Grated Zest And Juice Of  Lemon
preparation:
1. Heat A Heavy Based Pot Over Medium Heat And Add ¼ Cup Of Stock. When Hot, Add Shallots, A Pinch Of Salt And Sweat (About 5 Minutes).
2. Add Garlic And Stir To Combine. When Fragrant, Add Turmeric.
3. When Onions And Garlic Are A Dark Yellow From Turmeric, Add Rice And Toast For 3 Minutes. Add Remaining Stock. Bring To A Boil Then Reduce To A Simmer.
4. When Rice Is Finished Cooking, About 40 Minutes, Remove From Heat And Let Sit For 5 Minutes, Then Fluff With A Fork.
5. Combine Rice With The Mirin And Shoyu. When Combined, Add Almonds, Coriander And Spring Onions.
6. Serve Hot With A Generous Topping Of The Sauce And Some Fresh Greens.
7. Lemon Tahini And Miso Sauce:
8. Place All The Ingredients Marked (*) In A Blender, Add The Water A ¼ Cup At A Time And Blend To A Cream.

title: Celebration Pie
ingredients:
1. Pie Filling
2. 2 Tablespoons Oil
3. 2 Tablespoons Butter
4. 6 Large Leeks Sliced
5. 1 Tablespoon Rosemarythymesage
6. 6 Gloves Garlic Crushed
7. 300G Mixed Mushrooms Sliced
8. 700G Mixed Nuts Finely Chopped In Blender
9. 2 Tubs Vegan Cream Cheese
10. 200G Dried Cranberries
11. Some Frozen Cranberries For Top Of Pie
12. 1 Tablespoon Of Maple Syrup
13. Pastry
14. 120Cups Water
15. 100G Butter
16. 125G Plain Flour
17. 200G Wholemeal Flour
18. 1 Teaspoon Salt
preparation:
1. Melt The Oil And Butter, Sauté The Leeks Until Soft, Add Garlic And All Herbs, Cook For 3 Mins. Add The Mushrooms And Cook For A Further 5 Mins. Add The Nuts And Stir Well, Followed By The Tubs Of Cream Cheese, Stir Until Mixed Together Well. Take Off Heat.
2. Heat The Oven To 180C.
3. Mix Flours And Salt. Melt The Butter And Water Together. Then Add To The Flour Mix And Stir Well. Shape Into A Ball And Leave For 5 Minutes.
4. Take One-Fifth Off The Pastry And Set Aside, This Is For The Lid.
5. Knead Remaining Pastry On A Floured Work Surface, Roll Into A Large Circle Then Press Into Cake Tin And Droop Over The Sides Of Tin, Trim Leaving A 1 Inch Border. Any Tears In The Pastry Can Easily Be Pressed Back Together.
6. Spoon In Half The Pie Filling Then Add The Dried Cranberries Evenly On Top, Finish With The Rest Of The Mixture, Pressing Down.
7. Roll Out The Pastry Lid, Place On Top And Fold The Pastry From The Sides On To Pie Lid, Crimp Together. (There Should Be An Inch Wall For The Cranberries To Sit In)Make A Slit In The Middle Of The Pie To Let Steam Out. Brush With Any Plant Milk.
8. Place In The Oven For 40 Mins.
9. Now Mix The Frozen Cranberries With The Maple Syrup And Place On Top Of Pie, Cook For 5 Minutes, The Cranberries Can Burn Easily So Keep An Eye On Them 😊
10. Let Pie Cool Slightly Before Removing From The Tin.

title: Korma
ingredients:
1. 2 Tbsp Coconut Oil Or Cooking Oil Of Your Choice
2. 4 Black Peppercorns
3. 1 Dried Red Chilli Deseeded And Finely Chopped
4. Tsp Chilli Powder
5. 2 Cinnamon Sticks
6. 6 Green Cardamom Pods
7. 1 Clove
8. 1 Tsp Turmeric
9. 1 Tbsp Coriander Seeds Lightly Toasted In A Pan And Then Crushed
10. 2 Tbsp Chopped Fresh Coriander Cilantro Leaves Plus Extra To Garnish
11. 1 Tsp Garam Masala
12. 1 Garlic Clove Pured
13. 1 Large Onions Pured
14. 1Cmin Fresh Root Ginger Peeled And Blended With The Onion
15. 1 Small Cauliflower Cut Into Small Florets
16. 250G9Oz1 Cup Pumpkin Diced
17. 100G3Oz1 Cup Green Beans
18. 200Cups7Fl Ozscant 1 Cup Coconut Milk
19. 150G5Oz1 Cup Cashews Soaked For 2 Hours
20. 500Cups17Fl Ozgenerous 2 Cups Water
21. 40G1Oz Cup Sultanas Golden Raisins
22. Salt
23. Cooked Basmati Rice To Serve
24. 1 Lime Cut Into Wedges To Serve
preparation:
1. Heat The Coconut Oil In A Pan With The Peppercorns, Chilli And Chilli Powder, Cinnamon, Cardamom, Clove, Turmeric, Coriander Seeds And Leaves, Garam Masala, Garlic, Onion And Ginger And Slowly Cook On A Low Heat, Mixing It Around Occasionally, While You Prepare The Vegetables. You Want To Cook It Until There’S No Longer The Smell Of Raw Onion, Which Should Take About 10 Minutes.
2. Add The Vegetables And Continue To Cook Over A Low Heat.
3. Meanwhile, In A Blender, Combine The Coconut Milk And Cashews And Add To The Vegetable Mix, Along With The Water And The Sultanas. Leave To Simmer For About 30 Minutes, Stirring Occasionally To Prevent It From Catching. Season To Taste, Garnish With Coriander Leaves And Serve With Basmati Rice And Lime Wedges For Squeezing Over.
4. Like This Recipe? Sign Up To Veganuary Today To Get Recipes Like This Delivered Directly To Your Inbox.

title: Spaghetti Bolognese by The Meatless Farm
ingredients:
1. 23 Tbsp Olive Oil
2. 400G Meatless Farm Mince
3. 1 Medium Onion Peeled And Diced
4. 2 Garlic Cloves Peeled  Minced
5. 1 Tbsp Tomato Puree
6. 400G Of Tinned Chopped Tomatoes
7. 3 Tbsp Of Vegan Worcestershire Sauce
8. 1 Bunch Basil
9. 1 Cup Of Vegan Style Parmesan Or Hard Cheese
10. 200G Of Fresh Or Dried Spaghetti
11. Salt
12. Black Pepper
preparation:
1. Heat A Saucepan Over A Medium Heat With 2-3 Tablespoons Of Oil And Add The Onion And Garlic. Cook Without Colouring For A Few Minutes, Then Add The Meatless Farm Co Mince And Season With Salt And Pepper.
2. Cook The Meatless Farm Co Mince Until Its Browned All Over, Then Stir In The Tomato Purée, Followed By The Tinned Tomatoes And Season To Taste. Bring To A Boil Then Let Simmer For Around 10 Minutes – Add A Splash Of Water Or Vegetable Stock If It Is Looking A Bit Dry.
3. Meanwhile, Bring A Large Pan Of Seasoned Water To The Boil And Add The Pasta. Stir To Stop The Pasta From Sticking And Cook For 7–10 Minutes.When It Is Fully Cooked, Drain In A Colander And Drizzle With A Little Olive Oil To Prevent The Spaghetti From Sticking Together.
4. Serve And Enjoy!

title: Buckwheat Banana Pancakes
ingredients:
1. 150200Cups Alpro Coconut No Sugars Drink
2. 200Cups Alpro Plain With Coconut Alternative To Yoghurt
3. 250G Buckwheat Flour
4. 1 Large Ripe Banana
5. 1 Tsp Baking Powder
6. 1 Tsp Vanilla Essence
7. A Pinch Of Salt
8. 1 Tbsp Vegetable Oil
9. 12 Tbsp Alpro Plain With Coconut Alternative To Yoghurt For Topping
10. 8 Tbsp Pomegranate Seed For Topping
preparation:
1. In A Bowl Mix The Buckwheat Flour, Salt, And Baking Powder. In Another Bowl, Mash The Banana And Mix With The Alpro Plain With Coconut Alternative To Yoghurt And The Alpro Coconut No Sugars Drink.
2. Combine The Wet And Dry Mixtures And Blend Until You Have A Nice, Smooth Batter. If It’S Too Thick, Just Splash In A Little More Alpro Coconut No Sugars Drink.
3. Next, Heat Up Some Vegetable Oil In A Non-Stick Frying Pan On A Medium Heat. Ladle In 1 Heaped Tablespoon Batter Into The Heated Pan And Repeat According To How Many You Can Fit In Your Pan. The Batter Will Begin To Bubble After About 1-2 Minutes. Next, Carefully Flip The Pancakes And Cook For Another 1- 2 Minutes Until Browned On The Underside. Transfer To A Plate And Cover To Keep Warm Until Serving. Carry On Until You’Ve Used All Your Batter.
4. Serve Each Stack Topped With The Alpro Plain With Coconut And Pomegranate Seeds. Breakfast, Dessert, Snack – Make These Any Time You Feel Like A Yummy Plateful Of Plant-Based Goodness!

title: Vegan Gooey Skillet Cookie
ingredients:
1. 110 G Vegan Butter 12 Cup
2. 150 G Plain Flour 1 13 Cups
3. 130 G Brown Sugar 23 Cup
4. 1  Tbsp  Ground Flax Seeds
5. 2  Tbsp Water
6. 1  Tsp Vanilla Extract
7. 12 Tsp Baking Powder
8. 14 Tsp Baking Soda
9. 150 G Vegan Dark Chocolate Chopped
preparation:
1. Pre-Heat Oven To 200C/180C Fan. Grease 8-Inch Skillet With Vegan Butter.
2. First Mix The Ground Flax Seeds With Water. Set Aside For 5-10 Minutes.
3. Melt The Butter, Then Combine With Vanilla Extract And Flax Egg.
4. Combine All Dry Ingredients With The Wet.
5. Fold In 3/4’S Of The Chocolate.
6. Pour The Cookie Dough Into The Skillet And Press The Remainder Of The Chocolate On Top.
7. Bake For 30-35 Minutes.
8. Allow To Cool Slightly, Then Top With Vegan Ice Cream. (I Used Salted Caramel)

title: Chocolate Tacos
ingredients:
1. 23 Cup Buckwheat Four
2. 13 Cup Almond Flour
3. 13 Cup White Rice Flour
4. 1 Tbsp Baking Powder
5. 1 Tbsp Coconut Sugar
6. 1 Tbsp Raw Cacao Powder
7. Pinch Of Salt
8. 2 Flax Eggs 2 Tbsp Ground Flax Seeds Mixed With 6 Tbsp Water
9. 1 23 Cup Almond Milk
10. 1 Tbsp Neutral Oil Coconut Oil
11. 2 Tsp Vanilla Exact
12. Extra Oil For The Pan
13. Filling And Decoration
14. Miiro Popsicles
15. Banana Fruits
16. Toasted Chocolate Chips
17. Peanut Butter Or Caramel Sauce
preparation:
1. Mix All The Dry Ingredients (Flours, Baking Powder, Sugar, Salt And Cacao Powder) Together In A Large Bowl.
2. In A Separate Bowl, Prepare The Wet Mixture. Prepare 2 Flax Eggs By Whisking 2 Tbsp Of Ground Flax Seeds With 6 Tbsp Of Water And Allow To Sit For 3 Minutes. Add The Almond Milk, Oil And Vanilla Extract And Mix Until Well Combined.
3. Pour The Wet Mixture Onto The Dry Ingredients And Mix Using A Spatula Until You Reach A Smooth And Homogeneous Texture. If The Batter Is Too Dry And Compact, Add Some Extra Milk.
4. Coat A Non-Sticky Skillet With Some Extra Oil And Put On Medium Heat.
5. When The Skillet Is Hot, Pour In A Scoop Of The Pancake Batter And Cook Until Bubbles Pop At
6. The Surface (2-3 Minutes). At This Moment, Turn The Tortilla In The Pan And Cook The Second Side
7. Until Brown (1-2 Minutes).
8. Serve As Tortillas, Wrapping Some Miiro Popsicles, Bananas, Coconut Chips And Drizzle Some
9. Peanut Butter Or Chocolate Sauce; Or Can Be Served As Pancakes With Maple Syrup.
10. Makes 6-8 Tortillas

title: Roscón de Reyes, Christmas Ring Cake
ingredients:
1. 300G Doves Gluten Free Plain Flour
2. 1Tsp Baking Powder
3. 1Tsp Bicarbonate Of Soda
4. 12Tsp Ground Cardamom
5. 12Tsp Ground Cinnamon
6. 14Tsp Salt
7. 150G Coconut Sugar
8. The Juice And Zest Of 2 Oranges
9. 120Cups Olive Oil
10. 180Cups Water
11. 1Tsp Vanilla Essence
12. 4 Thin Slices Of Orange
13. 30G Pecans You Can Also Use Almonds Or Walnuts
14. 200G Cashews Soaked In Hot Water For 30 Minutes
15. 120Cups Plant Milk
16. 2Tbsp Agave Syrup
17. 12Tsp Vanilla Essence
18. 25G Glace Cherries Halved
preparation:
1. Heat Your Oven To 180C/360F/Gm4.
2. In A Large Bowl Mix The Flour, Raising Agents, Spices, Salt And Sugar. Make A Well In The Centre, Add The Juice And Zest, Oil, Water And 1Tsp Vanilla Essence. Mix The Wet Ingredients With The Dry Ingredients.
3. If You Do Not Have A Ring Shaped Cake Tin Put A Ramekin In The Middle Of A 20Cm/8 Inch Cake Tin. Pour The Batter Around The Ramekin Filling The Cake Tin. Bake For 25-30 Minutes Until The Cake Is Cooked Through. Remove From The Tin. Allow The Cake To Cool Completely Before Adding The Frosting.
4. Turn The Oven Temperature Down To 70C/160F/Gm⅛. Cover A Baking Tray With Baking Paper, Put The Orange Slices On The Paper With The Nuts. Bake For 45-60 Minutes Until The Orange Has Dried Out And The Nuts Are Toasted. Finely Chop The Nuts.
5. To Make The Frosting Drain The Cashew Nuts, Blend The Cashew Nuts With The Plant Milk, Agave And 1/2Tsp Vanilla Essence Until Completely Smooth. The Frosting Needs To Be Completely Smooth So That It Is Thick And Will Not Slide Off The Cake.
6. Spoon The Frosting Onto The Cake. Dress The Cake With The Orange Slices, Nuts And Cherries.

title: Vegan Quiche
ingredients:
1. Basic Ingredients
2. 1 Cup Chickpea Flour
3. 1 Tbs Flax
4. Tsp Salt
5. Tsp General Mixed Seasoning
6. Tsp Baking Powder
7. Tsp Baking Soda
8. Half A Head Of A Smallmed Cauliflower Equal To 1 Cup Grated
9. An Onion Sliced Thinly
10. 1 Cup Water
11. Options  Add One Of These Or More Than One If Making Mini Quiches
12. 12 Cup Black Beans I Teamed This With A Smoky Chipotle Sauce And Nutritional Yeast
13. 12 Cup Corn And Sliced Red Onion I Used Frozen Corn And Added Paprika
14. 12 Cup Sliced Red Pepper And Sundried Tomatoes I Teamed This With Fresh Basil
15. 12 Cup Chopped Spinach I Teamed This With Garlic
16. 12 Cup Sliced Courgette I Teamed This With Dried Italian Herbs And Fresh Rosemary
preparation:
1. Mix The Dry Ingredients Together And Set Aside.
2. Chop The Onion Finely And Grate/Process The Cauliflower (To A Rice-Like Consistency) And Add Both To The Dry Mix, Then Add The Water And Mix Through Well.
3. If You Are Making Mini Quiches, Separate The Batter Now.
4. Stir Through Your Chosen Additions (Add Flavours At The Same Time As The Other Ingredients In Previous Steps If More Appropriate To Do So)
5. The Mixture Should Be Thick And Clumpy But Easy To Spoon Into A Tin.
6. I Used An 8” Silicone Cake Tin, But You Could Also Use A Metal One With Removable Bottom, Or Large Silicone Muffin Cups.
7. Press The Mixture Firmly Into The Pan But Leave The Top Quite Rough For Some Nice Texture.
8. Bake At 180C For Approx 30 Mins Until The Tops Are Nice And Golden, Or Around 20 Minutes For Mini Quiches (Keep An Eye On The Colour).
9. Serve Either Hot Or Cold.

title: Vegan Pomegranate Cheesecake
ingredients:
1. For The Crust
2. 300G Vegan Gingerbread Biscuits
3. 180G Plantbased Butter
4. Tspsalt
5. For The Cheesecake
6. 2 Packs Violife Creamy Original Or Your Favourite Vegan Cream Cheese
7. 100G Canned Coconut Milk
8. 2G Agaragar
9. 2Tbsp Maple Syrup
10. 1 Tbsp Lemon Juice
11. 1 Tsp Vanilla Essence
12. For The Pomegranate Syrup
13. 300Cups Pomegranate Juice
14. 3Tbsp Cornstarch
15. Pomegranate Seeds To Garnish
preparation:
1. Place The Gingerbread Biscuits In A Blender And Blitz Until They Form A Powder. Add In The Butter And The Salt And Blitz Again Until Combined.
2. Place In 6 Individual Greased Tart Tins And Smooth Over The Base With The Back Of A Spoon. Place In The Fridge To Set.
3. Meanwhile, In A Small Pot On Low Heat Dissolve The Agar-Agar In The Coconut Milk, Whisking Constantly. Once It Comes To A Boil, Remove From Heat And Set Aside.
4. In A Large Bowl Mix The Rest Of The Ingredients And Slowly Pour Over The Warm Coconut Milk, Whisking Until Combined And Creamy. Divide Evenly Amongst The Tart Tins And Place In The Fridge For 4 Hours.
5. In A Small Bowl Combine 100Ml Pomegranate Juice With The Cornstarch. Place The Rest Of The Juice In A Small Pot And Bring To A Boil For 5 Minutes. Pour In The Cornstarch And Pomegranate Mixture And Whisk For A Further 5 Minutes, Until A Syrup Starts To Form. Allow To Cool.
6. When The “C*****Cakes” Have Set, Remove From The Tins And Serve On Plates. Pour The Pomegranate Syrup On Top And Sprinkle With Pomegranate Seeds.

title: Moroccan Vegetable Tagine
ingredients:
1. For The Spices
2. Tsp Coriander Seeds
3. Tsp Ginger
4. 1 Tsp Smoked Paprika
5. Tsp Allspice Berries
6. 1 Cardamom
7. Tsp Ground Mace
8. Tsp Turmeric
9. Tsp Cayenne Pepper
10. Tsp Chilli Flakes
11. Tsp Sea Salt Flakes
12. Tsp Freshly Ground Black Pepper
13. 2 Tbsp Olive Oil
14. 1 Tbsp Agave Syrup
15. 2 Large Red Onions
16. 2 Cloves Of Garlic
17. 1 Large Butternut Squash
18. 1 Fennel Bulb
19. 1 Large Aubergine
20. 1 X 400G Tin Chopped Tomatoes
21. 1 Tbsp Tomato Puree
preparation:
1. Place The Cardamom, Coriander Seeds And Allspice Berries In A Dry Frying Pan And Heat Over A Medium Flame Until You Can Smell Their Fragrant Scent – About 1 Minute But Keep An Eye On Them. Transfer To A Pestle And Mortar And Grind To A Fine Powder.
2. Next, Combine All Of The Spices Together In A Small Bowl. Pour Over 1 Tablespoon Of The Olive Oil And All Of The Agave Syrup. Stir Together Until Combined.
3. Preheat The Oven To 120C. Peel The Onion And Cut Into Half Moon Slices, Slice The Garlic Into Thin Rounds. Next, Peel And Deseed The Squash. Chop The Squash, Fennel And Aubergine Into Large Chunks Approximately 4 Cm In Size.
4. Heat The Remaining Olive Oil In A Large Heavy Based Casserole. Gently Fry The Onion And Garlic Until Softened.
5. Add The Squash And Fry With The Onion Until The Squash Begins To Give At The Edges.
6. Add The Fennel And Aubergine To The Pan And Stir Together. Pour Over The Spice Mixture And Stir In Until Evenly Mixed, Frying For A Further Minute.
7. Pour Over The Tomatoes And Puree, Bring To A Rolling Simmer And Then Cover And Transfer To The Oven To Cook Slowly For 2 – 3 Hours.

title: Mixed Root Vegetable Gnocchi in Sage-Pistachio Pesto
ingredients:
1. For The Pesto
2. 2 Shallots Minced
3. 10 Leaves Of Fresh Sage Minced
4. 1 Tbsp Coconut Oil
5. 18 Tsp Cinnamon
6. 2 12 Tbsp Maple Syrup
7. 1 Tbsp Fresh Parsley
8. 1 Tbsp Tahini
9. 1 Cup Shelled Pistachios
10. 2 Tsp Apple Cider Vinegar
11. Olive Oil To Thin As Needed
12. For The Gnocchi
13. 12 Of A Butternut Squash Seeded
14. 2 Large Beets Peeled
15. 1 Medium Sweet Potato Peeled
16. 1 Medium Celeriac Peeled
17. 1 Large Parsnip Peeled
18. 1 Medium Turnip Peeled
19. 46 Cups Brown Rice Flour Divided Plus More For Dusting
preparation:
1. Combining Quintessential Autumnal Flavors—Sage, Maple Syrup, Cinnamon—With An Array Of Multi-Colored Root Vegetables, This Perfect Fall Entrée Is Sophisticated Comfort Food At Its Finest. While The Combination Of Root Vegetables Produces An Aesthetically Striking Dish, It Does Complicate The Process A Bit. If You’D Like To Make The Recipe Simpler, Simply Use One Root Vegetable Instead Of All Six.
2. Preheat The Oven To 400°F.
3. Wrap The Beets, Sweet Potato, Celeriac, Parsnip, And Turnip Each Individually In Aluminum Foil And Place On A Baking Sheet. Place The Butternut Squash, Face-Down, On The Baking Sheet, As Well. Roast All Of The Veggies For 45-60 Minutes Until You Can Pierce Through Them With A Fork. Remove From The Oven And Let Sit Until Cool Enough To Handle.
4. Meanwhile, Make The Pesto. Heat The Coconut Oil Over Medium-High Heat. When The Oil Shimmers, Add The Shallots And Sage. Sauté For 5-10 Minutes, Or Until Golden Brown. Add The Sauté To A Food Processor Along With The Rest Of The Pesto Ingredients, Except For The Olive Oil. Pulse Until Well Combined, Scraping Down The Sides As Necessary. As The Motor Is Running, Drizzle In Olive Oil To Achieve The Desired Consistency.
5. Set A Large Pot Of Salted Water To Boil.
6. Once The Veggies Have Cooled, Puree Each Of Them Separately In A Food Processor(Or Mash Them Separately With A Potato Masher) And Place The Purees Into Separate Bowls. Make Sure That You Process The Beets Last So As Not To Stain The Other Veggie Purees With A Magenta Hue. Combine The Purees Of Celeriac, Turnip, And Parsnip. You’Ll Have Four Bowls Of Puree In Front Of You: One Deep Orange(Butternut Squash), One Light Orange(Sweet Potato), One Magenta(Beet), And One White(Celeriac, Turnip, And Parsnip). Combine Each Of The Purees With 1 Cup Of Brown Rice Flour, Adding More To Each Bowl To Achieve An Ever-So-Slightly Sticky Consistency(The Butternut Squash And Sweet Potato Purees Will Require Less Than The Others).
7. Dust A Work Surface With Additional Flour. Divide Each Dough Into Two Portions And Roll Them Into Snakes About 1/2-Inch In Width. Cut Each Snake Into 10-20 Gnocchi And Place In A Single Layer On A Baking Sheet.
8. Once The Pot Of Water Is Boiling, Drop The Gnocchi—Ten At A Time And Only With Gnocchi Of Like Color—Into The Pot. Cook Until The Gnocchi Floats To The Top, About 30 Seconds. Remove The Gnocchi From The Water And Place In A Colander Sitting Over A Bowl To Allow The Water To Drain.
9. Combine All Of The Gnocchi In A Large Bowl(At This Point, The Boiling Will Have Sealed Their Color, So It’S Safe To Combine Them). Add The Pesto And Stir Well To Coat. Serve Warm.

title: Chocolate Banana Bread Muffins
ingredients:
1. 120G 1 13 Cup Rolled Oats
2. 4 Bananas
3. 30G A Scant 14 Cup Dried Sour Cherries
4. 1 Tbsp Maple Syrup
5. 1 Tsp Cinnamon
6. Tsp Ground Ginger
7. Tsp Nutmeg
8. 1 Tsp Baking Powder
9. Vegan Dark Chocolate Spread Or Chocolate Squares
10. Optional Oil For Greasing The Muffin Tin If Needed
preparation:
1. Heat The Oven To 180°C / 350°F / Gas Mark 4.
2. Blitz The Oats In A Food Processor Until You Have A Flour (You Can Use Wheat Flour If You Don’T Have A Food Processor).
3. In A Large Mixing Bowl, Mash The Bananas With A Fork Until You Have A Smooth Purée And Stir In The Remaining Ingredients, Except The Chocolate Spread/Chocolate.
4. Half-Fill Each Muffin Pocket With The Muffin Mixture, Place ½ A Tsp Of The Chocolate In The Centre Of Each, Then Cover With The Rest Of The Mix.
5. Place On The Top Shelf Of The Oven And Cook For 20-25 Minutes.

title: Festive Yuletide Log
ingredients:
1. 140 G Self Raising Flour
2. 30 G Cocoa Powder
3. 1 Tbs Cornflour
4. 12 Tsp Bicarbonate Soda
5. 12 Tsp Baking Powder
6. 14 Tsp Salt
7. 125 G Caster Sugar
8. 235 Cups Soy Milk
9. 1 Tsp Red Wine Vinegar
10. 120 Cups Sunflower Oil
11. 1 Tsp Vanilla Extract Tsp
12. 1000 G Icing Sugar
13. 30 G Cocoa Powder
14. 250 G Vegan Butter
15. 2 Tbs Soya Milk
16. 125 G Black Cherry Jam
preparation:
1. For The Swiss Roll. Preheat Your Oven To 160ºc Fan/Gas 3. Line A Shallow Baking Tray Approximately 30Cm X 20Cm With Greaseproof Paper.
2. Sift The Flour And Cocoa Powder Into A Large Bowl, Then Add The Cornflour, Bicarbonate Of Soda, Baking Powder, Salt And Sugar And Stir Together.
3. Pour The Milk, Vinegar, Oil And Vanilla Extract Into A Jug And Whisk Until Combined.
4. Add The Milk Mixture To The Flour Mixture And Stir Well With A Light Hand, Be Careful Not To Overwork The Batter Then Pour Into The Prepared Baking Tray And Bake In The Oven For Approximately 25 Minutes Until Cooked Through And A Skewer Comes Out Clean.
5. Meanwhile For The Buttercream. Add The Icing Sugar, Cocoa Powder And The Butter Into A Food Processor And Blitz Together. Add The Soya Milk, A Little At A Time Until The Buttercream Starts To Combine And Is Smooth. You Want A Medium To Firm Texture. Split Into Two Bowls.
6. Once The Cake Is Cooked. Leave To Cool For Around 5 Minutes And Then Carefully Roll Into A Swiss Roll Shape, Keeping The Greaseproof Paper On. When Cooled After Around Half An Hour, Gently Unroll The Log And Spread With Black Cherry Jam Followed By Half Of The Buttercream. Once Again Carefully Re-Roll The Cake This Time Carefully Removing The Greaseproof Paper As You Roll. Once Rolled, Place The Log On A Piece Of Clingfilm And Roll Tightly And Place In The Fridge To Chill Until Needed, You Could Actually Freeze The Cake At This Stage For Half An Hour.
7. To Assemble. Remove The Cling Film From The Swiss Roll And Cover The Outer Swiss Roll With The Remaining Buttercream. We Use A Piping Bag For This And Pipe Lines Down Sides Of The Roll Then Use A Fork To Create A Textured Log Effect.
8. Sprinkle With Icing Sugar And Serve.
9. Notes
10. You Could Use Holly, Sprinkles Or Vegan Edible Decorations For Garnish, Christmas Is The Occasion To Go All Out With Your Decorating.
11. For Ease You Could Just Use Jam Inside The Yuletide Log And Buttercream The Outside Only.

title: Cherry Cheesecake
ingredients:
1. 225G Vegan Digestive Biscuits Crushed
2. 12 Cup Vegan Margarine Melted
3. 1 Dessert Spoon 2 Teaspoons Of Syrup
4. 1 Tub Bute Island Sheese Original Creamy Or Tofutti Dairyfree Cream Cheese
5. 1 Carton Vegan Whipped Cream
6. 14 Cup Caster Sugar
7. Grated Rind Of One Lemon Unwaxed
8. 1 Tin Black Cherries
preparation:
1. Other Things That You’Ll Need:
2. Rolling Pin And Plastic Food Bag To Crush The Digestive Biscuits
3. Large Bowl
4. Whisk
5. Flan Tin Withremovablebottom
6. Place The Digestive Biscuits In A Strong Plastic Food Bag And Crush Them With A Rolling Pin.
7. Mix The Digestive Biscuits, Margarine And Syrup Together And Put Into A Large Flan Tin With A Removable Bottom.
8. Pat The Mixture Down Firmly To Make A Base.
9. Put The Base In The Fridge While Making The Filling.
10. Beat The Dairy-Free Cream Cheese Until Creamy (Beat Until It Holds Soft Peaks. These Soft Peaks Should Fold Over When The Whisk Is Lifted).
11. Add The Whipped Cream, Sugar And Lemon Rind. Beat Well.
12. Fill The Tin With The Mixture.
13. Decorate With The Cherry Pie Filling.
14. Chill Well Before Serving (Minimum 3 Hours, But Ideally Overnight).
15. Bring The Cheesecake To Room Temperature Before Serving.
16. If You Liked This Dessert, Check Out This Vegan Lemon Cheesecake Too!

title: Buffalo Wings n Waffles
ingredients:
1. 8 Quorn Buffalo Wings
2. For Buffalo Sauce
3. 100Cups  Franks Red Hot
4. 60G Plant Butter
5. 1 Tbsp White Vinegar
6. 1 Tsp Cayenne Pepper
7. 1 Tsp Vegan Worcester Sauce
8. 1 Tsp Garlic Powder
9. For Ranch
10. 100Cups Vegan Mayo
11. 12 Tbsp Nondairy Milk
12. 12 Teaspoon Apple Cider Vinegar
13. 1 Cloves Garlic  Crushed
14. 12 Teaspoon Dried Dill
15. Teaspoon Onion Powder
16. Teaspoon Paprika
17. 14 Teaspoon Pepper
18. Salt  To Taste
19. For The Waffles
20. 375G Unsweetened Plant Milk
21. 2 Teaspoons Apple Cider Vinegar
22. 240G Plain Purpose Flour
23. 1 Tablespoon Baking Powder
24. 12 Teaspoon Sea Salt
25. 1 Tablespoon Brown Sugar Or Maple Syrup
26. 2 Tbsp Melted Vegan Butter
27. 12 Teaspoon Vanilla Extract
28. Spring Onions
preparation:
1. In A Medium Saucepan Add The Hot Sauce, Butter, White Vinegar, Vegan Worcestershire
2. Add Sauce, Cayenne, And Garlic And Bring To A Boil.
3. Reduce To A Simmer For 6 Minutes And Cool.
4. To Make Ranch Combine All Ingredients And Put To One Side.
5. To Make Waffles Mix The Plant Milk, Vanilla Extract And Acv Together In A Small Bowl And Set Aside For About 5 Minutes To Make The Vegan Buttermilk.
6. In A Large Bowl Add The Flour, Baking Powder And Salt Before Adding The Sugar, Melted Butter, Buttermilk Mixture.
7. Pre-Heat Your Waffle Maker To Instruction : And Add Enough Mixture To Just Cover And Cook Until Steam Stops. Keep Warm In A Low Oven
8. Cook Quorn Buffalo Wings As Per Instruction : And Toss In Buffalo Sauce As Soon As Ready
9. Stack The Waffles With Ranch Sauce, Quorn Buffalo Wings And Sprinkle With Spring Onions

title: Golden Topped Banana, Seed and Walnut Cake
ingredients:
1. Cake
2. 225G Plain Flour Or Use Selfraising Flour And Reduce The Baking Powder To 2 Heaped Tsp
3. 3 Heaped Tsp Baking Powder
4. 100G Brown Sugar
5. 3 Tsp Cinnamon Or Mixed Spice
6. 3 Large Black Bananas Mashed
7. 75G Vegetable Or Sunflower Oil Weight
8. 50G Pumpkin And Sunflower Seeds
9. 100G Crushed Walnuts
10. Icing
11. 200G Icing Sugar
12. 4 Teaspoons Of Cold Water
13. A Few Teaspoons Of Golden Syrup
preparation:
1. Mash The Peeled Bananas With A Fork And Mix In With Oil And Sugar.
2. Add The Flour, Baking Powder And Cinnamon, And Combine Well.
3. Add The Seeds And Crushed Walnuts
4. Baked In A Lined 8In Cake Tin For About 15 Minutes, Before Checking. Continue Baking, Checking Every 5 Minutes Until A Cocktail Stick, Popped Into The Middle Of The Cake, Comes Out Clean.
5. Stand To Cool And Then Remove From The Tin.
6. For The Icing:
7. Sift The Icing Sugar Into A Bowl, Add The Water And Mix Into A Thick Paste.
8. Add The Golden Syrup And Make A Thick Mixture. To Make Sure It Glazes The Cake Without Running Off The Edges Too Much Check The Mixture Is Thick Enough Not Run Off Of A Spoon.
9. If It’S Really Thick, Use A Pallet Knife Or Back Of A Large Spoon Which Had Been Warmed In A Glass Of Hot Water, To Spread The Icing Over The Cake.

title: Pecan or Almond Nuggets
ingredients:
1. 4 Cups Almonds Or Pecans Or 2 Cups Of Each Pulverized Using A Food Processer
2. Cup Rice Malt Syrup
3. Cup Barley Malt Syrup
4. 1 Tsp Vanilla
5. Desiccated Coconut
6. Grain Based Sweetened Chocolate Chips Optional
preparation:
1. Place Pulverized Nuts In A Large Mixing Bowl. In A Small Bowl Stir Together The Syrups And Vanilla. Mix The Wet Ingredients Into The Bowl Until The Nuts And Syrups Are Evenly Distributed And Are Sticking Together.
2. Place Some Water In A Bowl And Moisten Hands With Water To Keep The Mixture From Sticking. Pinch Off A Piece Of Mixture And Shape Into Small Balls. Roll In The Desiccated Coconut. Keep Chilled.
3. Note:If Coating In Chocolate Chips, Simply Pop The Chips In A Metallic Bowl Atop A Pot Of Simmering Water To Melt To A Liquid. Using Two Teaspoons Roll The Nuggets In The Melted Chocolate Chips And Leave To Set On Parchment Paper. Chill And Enjoy.

title: Maava Na Penda
ingredients:
1. 1 Cup Of Ground Almonds
2. 4 Tablespoons Of Coconut Flour
3. 8 Tablespoons Of Soft Brown Sugar
4. 3 Generous Pinches Of Fine Sea Salt
5. 12 A Teaspoon Of Finely Ground Cardamom Powder
6. 14 Of A Teaspoon Of Saffron Strands
7. 4 Teaspoons Of Soya Milk Or Other Non Dairy Milk
8. 4 Tablespoon Of Sweet Syrup  I Used Bali Nutra Coconut Syrup
9. 14 Cup Of Soya Milk Or Other Non Dairy Milk
10. 14 Cup Of Sliced Almonds  For Decroation
preparation:
1. This Recipe Makes 16 Pendas
2. Heat The 4 Teaspoons Of Soya Milk
3. Mix The Saffron Strands In It And Let Sit For 5 Minutes
4. In A Bowl, Mix The Ground Almonds, Coconut Flour, Sugar, Salt And Cardamom Powder
5. Add The Sugar Syrup And Soya Milk Which Has Saffron In It And Mix Well
6. Add The 1/4 Cup Of Soya Milk And Mix To Make A Soft Dough
7. Make Flat Discs With The Dough – I Did This Straight On The Greaseproof Paper Using A Biscuit Cutter That Was 48Mm In Diameter
8. Add Some Chopped Almonds On Top Of Each Penda
9. Bake At 150 Celsius For 9-10 Minutes – They Will Expand A Little
10. Let Them Cool Completely Before Serving Or Storing
11. Store In The Refrigerator In An Airtight Container For Up To A Week
12. Serve When Chilled
13. Adapted From Vegan Richa

title: Peanut Cookies
ingredients:
1. 180G Soya Margarine
2. 100G Coconut Butter Softened
3. 180G Sukrin Gold
4. 240G Sukrin Peanut Flour Or 120G Peanut Flour 120G Almond Flour For A Milder Flavour
5. 40G Unsalted Peanuts Cashews Or Almonds Chopped
6. 2 Heaped Teaspoons Of Egg Replacer
7. 1 Tsp Vanilla Extract
8. 1 Tsp Baking Soda
9. 1 Tsp Sea Salt
preparation:
1. Nutritional Comparison Is To Cookies Made With Sugar And Peanut Butter Rather Than Sukrin Gold, Coconut Butter And Chopped Nuts.
2. Preheat The Oven To 350F/180C/Gm4.
3. Line Two Baking Sheets With Parchment Paper.
4. Stir The Peanut Flour (And Almond If Using), Baking Soda And Sea Salt Together In A Bowl.
5. Cream The Butters With The Sukrin Gold In A Food Mixer Until Light And Fluffy.
6. Add The Egg Replacer Gradually Until Well Combined.
7. Gently Fold The Flour Mixture And The Chopped Nuts, A Spoonful At A Time.
8. Place Dessert Spoons Of The Mix On To The Trays, Leaving Plenty Of Space Between Them.
9. Bake For 12-15 Minutes, Removing From Oven While They Are Still A Little Soft In The Centre.
10. Cool On A Wire Rack And Keep In An Airtight Container.

title: Tofu Chorizo and Lemon Cauliflower Rice
ingredients:
1. For The Tofu
2. 400G Tofu Well Pressed For At Least Thirty Minutes
3. 2Tsp Paprika
4. 2Tsp Smoked Paprika
5. 1Tbsp Olive Oil
6. 1Tbsp Tamari Or Soy Sauce For Non Glutenfree
7. 1Tbsp Red Wine Vinegar
8. Tsp Ground Cumin
9. Tsp Ground Coriander
10. Tsp Chilli Powder
11. For The Rice
12. 1 Small Or Half A Large Cauliflower Cut Into Large Florets
13. 220G Cooked Chickpeas
14. 100G Mange Tout Top And Tailed Cut In Half
15. 100G Asparagus Cut Into Pieces
16. 2 Cloves Garlic Crushed
17. 50G Kalamata Olives
18. 1 Lemon Cut Into Two
19. Black Pepper To Taste
20. 1Tbsp Olive Oil For Cooking
preparation:
1. Cut The Tofu Into Cubes. Mix All Of The Remaining Tofu Ingredients Together In A Large Bowl To Create The Marinade. Add The Tofu To This Bowl, Mix Well To Ensure It Is Full Coated. Set Aside To Marinate Whilst You Prepare The Cauliflower Rice And Chop The Vegetables.
2. Add The Cauliflower To A Food Processor And Blend To Create Rice-Sized Grains (Do Not Over-Blend Or It Will Be Too Small To Have Any Texture).
3. Add One Tablespoon Of Olive Oil To A Large Frying Pan. Heat Over A Medium-High Heat.
4. Once The Oil Is Hot, Add The Tofu To The Pan. Fry For Around Ten To Twelve Minutes, Turning Frequently, Until It Has Begun To Crisp Around The Edges.
5. Add The Chickpeas, Mange Tout, Asparagus, And Garlic To The Pan With The Tofu. Cook For Three Minutes, Then Add The Cauliflower Grains, Olives, The Juice Of Half A Lemon, And Black Pepper.
6. Stirring Frequently, Cook For Around 4-5 Minutes Until The Cauliflower Is Tender But Firm.
7. Cut The Remaining Half Lemon Into Slices.
8. Serve With A Slice Of Lemon On Each Portion.

title: Easy Creamy Buffalo Sage Pumpkin Lasagne
ingredients:
1. Serves 6
2. For The Pumpkin Pure
3. 15 Kg Pumpkin Or Squash Unpeeled
4. 12 Cup Fresh Sage Leaves
5. 12 Tsp Sea Salt
6. 14 Tsp Ground Black Pepper
7. 1 Cup Unsweetened Non Dairy Milk I Prefer Soya Or Almond
8. For The Buffalo Tomato Sauce
9. 1 Medium Onion
10. 2 Cloves Of Garlic
11. 1 Tsp Sea Salt
12. 12 Tsp Ground Black Pepper
13. 2 Cans Of Chopped Tomatoes In Juice
14. 14 Cup Vegan Buffalo Sauce Like Franks Red Hot
15. 1 Tsp Dried Thyme
16. For The Creamy Cashew White Sauce
17. 12 Cup Soaked Raw Cashews
18. 6 Tablespoons Soya Flour Or Plain Flour Or Gf Flour
19. 1 Tsp Mustard Powder
20. 12 Tsp Ground Nutmeg
21. 14 Cup Nutritional Yeast
22. 1 Clove Of Garlic
23. 1 Tsp Sea Salt
24. 12 Tsp Ground Black Pepper
25. 2 Cups Unsweetened Non Dairy Milk I Prefer Soya Or Almond
26. For The Lasagne
27. 4 Tomatoes
28. 1 X 500G Box Dried Lasagne Sheets
29. Sea Salt And Cracked Black Pepper
preparation:
1. Preheat The Oven To 200’C.
2. Cut The Unpeeled Pumpkin Or Squash Into Wedges And De-Seed, Place On A Baking Tray And Roast For 20-30 Minutes Or Until The Squash Is Soft And Golden.
3. Leave To Cool Enough To Handle And Carefully Peel Away The Skin And Place The Flesh Into The Jug Of A Blender.
4. Add The Sage, Salt, Pepper And Half The Milk.
5. Blend, Adding The Remaining Milk As Necessary To Get A Smooth Purée. Pour Into A Bowl, Cover And Set Aside. Do Not Clean Out The Blender Jug.
6. Add All Of The Tomato Sauce Ingredients Into The Jug And Blend Until Well Combined And Almost Smooth. Transfer To A Saucepan And Wash Out The Blender Jug.
7. Blend Together The White Sauce Ingredients Until Perfectly Smooth, Transfer To A Saucepan.
8. Bring Both The Tomato And White Sauce To A Boil, Whisking The White Sauce All The Time Until Thickened Enough To Coat The Back Of A Spoon.
9. Assemble The Lasagne, Take A Large Baking Dish Approx 15 X 10 Inches And Place About A Quarter Of The Tomato Sauce On The Base, Topped With A Quarter Of The Lasagne Sheets.
10. Top With More Tomato Sauce, Some Pumpkin Purée Then More Lasagne Sheets, Then White Sauce And Repeat Until All Is Used Up, Ending With White Sauce.
11. Place Slices Of Tomato Over The Top, Sprinkle With Salt And Pepper Then Transfer To The Oven And Bake For 30-45 Minutes Until The Pasta Is Al Dente And The Top Is Golden And Bubbling.
12. Leave To Cool For About Ten Minutes Before Slicing And Serving.

title: Friday Night Pizza
ingredients:
1. Vegan Pizza Bases
2. Tomato Sauce Recipe In Method
3. Sauted Kale
4. Olives  Kalamata Or Stuffed Green Or A Mix Of The Two
5. Mushrooms Chopped
6. Redyellow Pepper Finely Chopped
7. Tomatoes Finely Sliced
8. Vegan Cheese Find Our Guide To The Best Vegan Cheese Here
9. Fresh Chilli
10. Artichokes
11. Fresh Rocket To Sprinkle Over The Top After Cooking
12. Pine Nuts
13. Fresh Basil
14. Chilli Infused Olive Oil To Sprinkle Over The Top After Cooking
15. Roasted Garlic
16. Spinach
preparation:
1. Make The Easy Pizza Tomato Sauce:
2. Finely Chop One Onion And A Couple Of Cloves Of Garlic. Add To A Frying Pan With A Little Olive Oil.
3. Add Half A Teaspoon (Each) Of Oregano, Basil And Thyme And Mix.
4. Add A Can Of Chopped Tomatoes, A Little Salt And Cracked Pepper And Leave To Simmer And Thicken. If You Don’T Let The Sauce Thicken Enough, Your Toppings Can All Slide Off When Eating. So This Is Why You Need A Little Time To Make The Sauce. You Don’T Want It In Any Way Watery.
5. Assemble Your Pizza:
6. Make Tomato Sauce Or Use A Base With Sauce Already Added.
7. Preheat Your Oven To 220C.
8. Wash Some Kale And Add It To A Frying Pan With A Little Olive Oil. Sauté For A Few Minutes Until The Kale Is Dark Green. Turn Off Heat.
9. Chop The Rest Of Your Ingredients And Grate The Cheese.
10. Create Your Pizza! Add Sauce, Kale, Olives, Mushrooms, Pepper, Tomato And, Lastly (After 5/10 Minutes In The Oven) Cheese – But You Can Really Do Any Order You Want.
11. Remove And Eat In Great Big Slices!
12. Explore More Vegan Pizza Recipes!

title: Sesame-Crusted Baked Tempeh
ingredients:
1. 200G Tempeh Uk 7Oz
2. 2 Tbsp Sesame Oil
3. 2 Tbsp Shoyu Sauce
4. 2 Tsp Hot Sauce Like Sriracha Optional
5. 2 Garlic Cloves Minced Divided
6. 1 Tsp Fresh Grated Ginger
7. Juice From One Lemon
8. 23 Tbsp Sesame Seeds
preparation:
1. Preheat The Oven To ± 190º F /370º C / Gas Mark 5.
2. Slice The Tempeh Into 1/4-Inch-Thick Pieces And Set Aside.
3. In A Small Bowl, Combine The Sesame Oil, Shoyu, Hot Sauce, (If Using) Garlic Cloves, Ginger And Juice From One Lemon. Whisk To Combine And Transfer To A Large, Zip-Closed Plastic Bag.
4. Place The Sliced Tempeh In The Bag And Gently Massage It With Your Hands To Coat All The Pieces. Refrigerate For 30 Minutes.
5. Add The Sesame Seeds To A Shallow Bowl.
6. Remove The Tempeh From The Marinade. Dip Each Side Of Each Piece Of Tempeh In The Sesame Seeds And Set On A Baking Sheet Lined With Some Parchment Paper. Bake For 10 Minutes, Turn Over And Bake Ten Minutes On The Other Side Until Crisp And Golden.
7. Serve On A Bed Of Steamed Greens Topped With Some Miso Or Natto Relish Or One Of My Tasty Sauces Or Chutneys.
8. This Also Makes Great ‘Bento’ Lunches, Delicious To Eat Cold The Following Day. Use In Sandwiches Stacked With Fresh Salad Greens, Cucumber And Vegan Mayo.

title: Francesinhas
ingredients:
1. For The Sandwiches
2. 8 Bread Slices
3. 16 Vegetal Cheese Must Melt But Not Too Much
4. 4 Tomato Slices
5. 4 Vegan Sausages
6. 4 Vegan Ham Slices
7. 4 Seitan Slices Or Tofu Or Tempeh
8. 100 G Of Sliced Mushrooms
9. Salt Pepper Garlic And Soy Sauce To Season
10. For The Sauce
11. 1 Cup Of Tomato Pastesauce
12. 2 Dl Of White Beer
13. 1 Dl Of Wine
14. 12 Cup Of Soy Milk
15. 1 Tablespoon Of Powder Garlic
16. 1 Bay Leaf Or A Small Spoon Of Bay Powder
17. 1 Cup Of Vegetable Broth
18. 1 Teaspoon Of Mustard
19. 1 Teaspoon Of Soy Sauce
20. 1 Teaspoon Of Worcester Sauce
21. Salt And Smoked Paprika To Taste
preparation:
1. 4 Units
2. Season The Seitan Slices With Salt, Pepper, Garlic And Soy Sauce. Grill Them And Also The Cut Sausages And The Mushrooms.
3. Display 4 Bread Slices In A Tray.
4. On Each Bread Slice Display The Seitan, The Sausages, The Ham, The Mushrooms, The Tomato Slices And Another Slice Of Bread On The Top.
5. Display The Cheese Slices In Order To Cover The Bread On The Top, And After Melting A Little They Should Cover All The Sides.
6. Take The Tray To The Oven At 200º C Just To Warm Up And Melt The Cheese.
7. Meanwhile, Prepare The Sauce By Adding All The Ingredients In A Food Processer To Mix Everything. Take It To Boil, Taste It And Rectify The Seasoning If Necessary.
8. Serve Each “Francesinha” With The Hot Sauce On It. Some French Fries Combine Very Well With It.
9. Maria Aragão, Author Of The Vegan Recipes Book “Omeletas Sem Ovos”.

title: Seitan-Cashew Blanquette
ingredients:
1. 200 G Gourmet Seitan Uk 7 Oz
2. 200 G White Mushrooms Uk 7 Oz
3. 1 Small Yellow Onion
4. 1 Medium Carrot
5. 1 Tbsp Olive Oil
6. 250 Cups Water Uk 1 Cup
7. 50 Cups Dry White Wine Uk  Cup
8. 100 Cups Plain Soy Cream Uk  Cup
9. Half A Vegetable Bouillon Cube Or 1 Teaspoon Bouillon Powder
10. 1 Tbsp Soy Sauce
11. 1 Tsp Garam Masala Or  Tsp Nutmeg Or Allspice
12. 1 Tbsp Cashew Butter
13. Salt And Pepper To Taste
preparation:
1. Cut The Seitan Into Bite-Size Strips, Slice The Mushrooms, Dice The Onion And Chop The Carrot Into Rounds. Heat The Olive Oil In A Cast-Iron Stockpot (A Sauté Pan With High Sides Or A Large Saucepan Will Also Do) Over Medium Heat And Sauté These Ingredients, Stirring Often.
2. Once The Onions Begin To Brown, Add The Water, White Wine, Soy Cream, Bouillon, Soy Sauce, And Spice. Cook For About 15 Minutes Over Medium-Low Heat (Just Below Simmering), Stirring Occasionally.
3. Taste And Add Salt And Pepper If Desired. Remove From Heat And Incorporate The Cashew Butter To Make The Sauce Creamier. Serve With Rice Or Quinoa.
4. Recipe Translated From French By Elisabeth Lyman

title: Rosemary Plum Ice Cream
ingredients:
1. 1 Cup Ripe Plums Pitted And Quartered
2. 1 Small Frozen Banana Sliced
3. 13 Cup Cashews Soaked Overnight
4. 3 Medjool Dates Pitted And Chopped
5. 3 Tbsp Fresh Rosemary Chopped
6. Tsp Vanilla Extract
7. 1 14Oz Can Fullfat Coconut Milk
8. Cup Nondairy Milk
preparation:
1. Since I Do Not Own An Ice Cream Maker, Nor, I’M Sure, Do Many Of You, I’Ve Offered Instruction : For Two S Of Making This Ice Cream With No More Appliances Than A Freezer, A Spoon, And Maybe A Food Processor.
2. Combine All Of The Ingredients In A Blender And Puree Until Very Smooth.
3. Ice Cream Machine :
4. Pour The Pureed Mixture Into An Ice Cream Maker And Churn According To The Maker’S Instruction :. Transfer To A Container And Store In The Freezer.
5. Non-Ice Cream Machine S:
6. Pour The Pureed Mixture Into A Large Tupperware Container, A Deep Baking Dish, Or A Stainless Steel Bowl Andplace Inside The Freezer. After 45 Minutes, Remove The Mixture From The Freezer Andstirit Vigorously With A Spatula Or Whisk, Breaking Up Any Frozen Sections. Return The Mixture To The Freezer, Stirring Vigorously Every 30 Minutes For About 2-3 Hours, Or Until The Mixture Is Completely Frozen. Store In The Freezer. With This , You’Ll Have To Thaw The Ice Cream For At Least 10 Minutes Before Serving.
7. An Alternative Non-Ice Cream Machine  Is To Pour The Pureed Mixture Into An Ice Cube Tray And Freeze Completely. When You’D Like To Enjoy A Bowl Of Ice Cream, Pop A Couple Of The Frozen Cubes Out Of The Tray And Blend In A Food Processor Until Creamy.

title: Noodles with Miso-Tahini Sauce
ingredients:
1. 1 Pack Uncooked Noodles
2. 4 Tbsp Level Sweet White Miso
3. 34 Tbsp Tahini
4. 100Cups Cold Water Uk 35 Fl Oz  Usa 34 Fl Oz
5. 2 Tbsp Brown Rice Vinegar
6. 1 Tbsp Mirin
7. 3Cm 12 Fresh Ginger Root Grated And Then Squeezed For Its Juice
8. 1 Clove Garlic Finely Chopped
9. Pinch Of Dried Tarragon Basil Or Thyme
10. Roasted Red Pepper Thinly Sliced Store Bought  Organic Jar
11. Finely Chopped Spring Onion
preparation:
1. Boil The Noodles In 2.5 Litres Of Water According To The Cooking Instruction :. [Uk 4.4 Pints]
2. Mix The Miso And Tahini In A Small Saucepan.
3. Add The Water A Little At A Time And Mix Well To Make A Smooth Sauce.
4. Add The Remaining Ingredients And Bring To A Gentle Simmer. If It’S Too Thick, Add A Bit More Water, If It’S Too Thin, Simmer Briefly To Thicken The Sauce.
5. To Serve, Put The Noodles Into Individual Serving Bowls, Spoon The Sauce Over The Top, And Garnish With The Spring Onion And Finely Sliced Red Peppers.

title: Vegan Tofu Benedict
ingredients: 1. 1 Block Smoked Tofu2 Tsp Cooking Oil For Fryingpinch Of Sea Saltpinch Of Ground Pepperhollandaise Sauce120Cups Protein Oat Mlk Or Another Plant Milk Of Your Choice3 Tbsp White Wine Vinegar120Cups Yellow Rapeseed Oil12 Tsp English Mustardpinch Sea Salt  Black Peppersauted Spinach4 Handfuls Of Baby Spinachsalt  Pepper Seasoningserve With2 Toasted Breakfast Muffinsfresh Chivespinch Of Cressa Handful Of Cherry Tomatoes Halved
preparation:
1. Make The Hollandaise Sauce In A Measuring Jug Adding The Protein Oat M.Lk, Vinegar, Seasoning & Mustard. Blend And Mix Well Together.
2. Slowly Trickle The Oil Until The Sauce Is Thick & Creamy.
3. Cover Your Sauce & Set Aside Until You’Re Ready To Serve
4. Cut The Tofu Into Rectangles & Fry In A Pre-Heated Frying Pan. Pan Fry Until Golden For Around 3-4 Mins
5. Put Your Tofu To The Side, And Pan Fry The Spinach For About 1 Minute Seasoning With A Pinch Of Salt & Pepper
6. Press Your Spinach With A Clean Kitchen Towel To Soak Up Any Excess Liquid
7. Serve Everything On Top Of Your Toasted Muffin Or Bagel!

title: Roast Veg Pizza on a Cauliflower Base
ingredients:
1. Pizza Crust Base
2. 400G Cauliflower Approx Half A Large Head Of Cauliflower Or One Small One
3. 15G Ground Chia Seeds
4. 25G Pulsin Soya Protein Powder
5. 50G Ground Almonds
6. 40G Nutritional Yeast
7. Chia Egg Substitute 2 Tbsp Milled Chia Mixed With 5 Tbsp Water Equivalent To 2 Eggs
8. 1 Tbsp Dried Mixed Herbs
9. Salt And Pepper
10. Tomato Sauce Topping
11. 1 Tbsp Ground Flaxseed This Is Optional But It Helps Thicken The Sauce And Adds Omega3S And Fibre
12. 1 12 Tbsp Sugarfree Apple Sauce
13. 5 Tbsp Tomato Pure
14. 2 Tbsp Tamari
15. 15 Tbsp Dried Oregano
16. Salt And Pepper
17. 2 Garlic Cloves Crushed
18. Toppings The Fun Bit
19. Of Course You Can Add What Toppings You Like Here I Have Topped Mine With Roasted Vegetables Sliced Beetroot Cubes Of Roasted Sweet Potato Red Onion Chunks Red Pepper Chunksroasted With A Little Rapeseed Oil For 3040 Mins
20. For 2 Medium Pizzas You Will Need
21. 1 Large Beetroot Peeled  Sliced
22. 2 Red Onions
23. 1 12 Red Pepper
24. 1 Medium Sweet Potato
25. 100G Basil Pesto Tofu Available In Supermarkets Sliced
26. 34 Tbsp Nutritional Yeast
preparation:
1. Remove The Leaves From The Cauliflower And Cut Into Chunks. Then Using A Blender Or Food Processor, Blitz The Cauliflower Until It Is Finely Chopped So That It Resembles Rice, I.E. Cauliflower Crumb
2. Transfer The Crumb Into A Steamer And Steam For 15 Mins Or Microwave In A Bowl With Cling-Film (With A Hole Or Two On Top) For 6 Mins Until Soft
3. Preheat The Oven To 200ºc (180ºc Fan). Line 2 Large Baking Sheets With Greaseproof Paper And A Little Coconut Spray Oil
4. Allow The Cooked Cauliflower Crumb To Cool Before Transferring Into A Clean Tea Towel And Squeezing As Much Moisture As You Can Out. (Really Wring It!) You May Need More Than One Tea Towel
5. Transfer The Dehydrated Cauliflower Crumb Into A Bowl And Add The Remaining Pizza Base Ingredients: Ground Chia Seeds, Protein Powder (I Used Pulsin Soya Protein Powder), Ground Almonds, Nutritional Yeast, Chia Egg Substitute, Dried Mixed Herbs, A Large Pinch Of Salt And Plenty Of Freshly Ground Black Pepper
6. Using Your Hands, Divide The Pizza Mixture In Half And Place Directly On Each Baking Sheet. Shape Into A Ball And Then Press Down To Form A Round Pizza Base Shape
7. Bake For 15 Mins Until The Bases Are Golden Brown And Starting To Crisp A Little At The Edges. If You Want Your Base Extra Crispy, Half-Way Through Baking, Flip It Over To Ensure Both Sides Are Well Baked
8. Whilst The Base Is Baking, Mix Together The Ground Flaxseed, Sugar-Free Apple Sauce, Tomato Purée, Tamari, Dried Oregano, Garlic And Season With Salt And Pepper
9. Spread The Tomato Topping Onto Each Of The Pizza Bases
10. Then Top Your Pizza With Your Topping Of Choice. I Have Chosen Roasted Vegetables And Slices Of Basil Pesto Tofu. Sprinkle Over With Nutritional Yeast
11. Turn The Oven Up To 240ºc (220ºc Fan) And Bake For A Further 12- 15 Mins
12. I Love To Serve Mine With A Large Handful Of Fresh Rocket On Top And A Side Salad. Enjoy!
13. The Key To Making A Great Cauliflower Crust Pizza Is By Making A Cauliflower Crumb And Then Dehydrating It, So That As Much Moisture Is Squeezed Out As Possible, Allowing The Remaining Crumb To Be Turned Into A Crispy Pizza Base. (If You Don’T Squeeze Out The Moisture, The Base Will Be All Soggy). You Will Be Surprised With The Amount Of Liquid Which Comes Out! But This Delicious Grain-Free Pizza Is Well Worth The Effort.
14. There Are Two Ways You Can Dehydrate Your Cauliflower Crumb: The More Time-Consuming  Is By Putting The Cooked Cauliflower Crumb In A Tea-Towel Or Two And Wringing Out The Moisture. (I Think Of This As Stress Relief!). Alternatively, If You Are Lucky Enough To Have A Juicer, You Can Simply Feed Cauliflower Florets Through The Juicer And Collect The Residual Crumb And Mix This Directly With The Remaining Pizza Base Ingredients. (No Need To Cook Before Using!).
15. So Why Not Give This Recipe A Go, To Create A Delicious Vegan Pizza Chock Full Of Vegetables!
16. So Man
17. Www.Sobody.Co.Uk
18. Hello! I Am So From Sobodyuk. I Am A Gym Bunny, Healthy Food Blogger & A Geeky Scientist! These Days My Lab Is The Kitchen! I Love Creating Delicious, Healthy, Wholefood, Clean-Eating, Nutrition-Dense Recipes To Maximise Performance & Health. My Recipes Include Paleo, Low Carb, Vegan, Vegetarian, Gluten Free.
19. Like This Recipe? Sign Up To Veganuary Today To Get Recipes Like This Delivered Directly To Your Inbox.

title: Chickpea and Sweet Potato Tikka Masala with Green Rice
ingredients:
1. 2 Handfuls Of Baby Spinach
2. 1 Green Chilli Finely Chopped
3. 1 Small White Onion Finely Chopped
4. Freshly Chopped Coriander Plus Extra For Garnish
5. 1 Tbsp Vegetable Oil
6. 140G Basmati Rice
7. 1 Vegetable Stock Cube Or 200Cups Fresh Vegetable Stock
8. 1 Pot Of Tideford Organics Vegan Tikka Masala Or Similar
9. 1 Can Chickpeas Drained
10. 1 Sweet Potato Peeled And Diced Into 1Cm Chunks
11. 3 Tbsp Of Soya Yoghurt
preparation:
1. Place The Basmati Rice In A Pan Of Water And Add The Vegetable Stock. Add Seasoning If Required. Bring To The Boil And Simmer Until Tender.
2. Meanwhile, Place The Tikka Sauce, Chickpeas And Sweet Potato In A Pan + Bring To A Simmer. Bubble Gently For 10-15 Minutes.
3. Drain The Rice And Keep Warm.
4. Heat The Sunflower Oil In A Frying Pan And Add The Spinach, Chilli, Onion And Coriander.
5. Fry Until The Onion Is Starting To Brown Slightly, Then Add The Rice And Turn Off The Heat. Stir In The Vegetable Gently So That The Rice Doesn’T Break Up.
6. Serve Topped With The Tikka Sauce And Dress With The Soya Yoghurt And A Little Coriander.
7. If You Enjoyed Making This Recipe, Why Not Browse More Of Our Favourite Vegan Curry Recipes?

title: Griddled Vegetable Skewers with Rogan Josh Sauce
ingredients:
1. 1 Red 1 Green  1 Yellow Pepper Cut Into 2Cm Chunks
2. 2 Red Onions Cut Into Wedges
3. 8 Button Mushrooms
4. 1 Pack Of Firm Tofu Cut Into 2Cm Cubes
5. 2 Tbsp Sunflower Oil
6. 2 X Pots Of Tideford Organics Vegan Rogan Josh
7. 280G Of Basmati Rice
8. 200G Peas
9. 10G Of Nigella Seeds
preparation:
