2. Potatoes: If Leaving The Skins On, Scrub The Potatoes, And Remove Any Unsightly Blemishes. Alternately, Peel The Potatoes. Slice The Potatoes Into 1/8 Inch Slices Using A Mandolin, Or Manually With A Knife. If Manually Slicing, Do Try To Cut Evenly As Possible So Potatoes Will Cook Uniformly.
3. Cream Sauce: Add The Cashews, Milk And/Or Veg Broth, Nutritional Yeast, Garlic, Onion Powder, Salt, Pepper And Lemon Juice/Vinegar To A High Speed Blender And Blend Until Creamy, About 45 Seconds To 1 Minute. Taste For Flavor, Adding More Of Anything You Like. Makes About 3 Cups.
4. Assemble: In A 9 X 13 Baking Dish, Pour A Thin Layer Of Sauce On The Bottom Of The Dish, Layer 1/2 Of The Potatoes, Top With 1/2 Cream Sauce, And Repeat. Top With A Sprinkle Of Thyme, And Any Additional Vegan Cheese. Alternatively, After Adding Sauce To The Bottom Of The Dish, Make Three Rows Of Potatoes, Layering Them At An Angle, Pour Sauce Evenly Overtop.
5. Bake: Place In Oven, Cover With Lid, Foil Or Silpat(See Notes), And Bake For 40 Minutes. Remove Cover And Bake Another 30 Minutes, Potatoes Should Be Fork Tender. Once Done, Sprinkle With A Little More Thyme, And Let Cool 5 – 10 Minutes Before Serving.
6. Serve Topped With Optional Chopped Chives, Parsley, Or More Fresh Thyme And/Or Freshly Ground Pepper.
7. Store Leftovers In An Air Container In The Refrigerator For Up To 5 Days. Reheat In Oven At 350, Covered With Foil, For 20 – 30 Minutes, Until Warmed Through.

title: VEGAN MACARONI SALAD
ingredients:
1. 1 Lb Elbow Pasta
2. 12 Red Onion Diced
3. 1 Red Bell Pepper Cored And Diced
4. 1 Large Carrot About 1 Cup Peeled And Diced
5. 2 Stalks Celery About 1 Cup Diced
6. 1 12 Cups Frozen Peas Thawed
7. 14 Cup Fresh Dill Chopped
8. Macaroni Dressing
9. 1 Cup Vegan Mayo
10. 14 Cup Apple Cider Vinegar
11. 1 Heaping Tablespoon Dijon
12. 1 Tablespoon Pure Maple Syrup
13. 12 Teaspoon Pepper
14. 12 Teaspoon Mineral Salt Or To Taste
preparation:
1. Pasta: Boil Your Elbow Macaroni Noodles Until They Are Al Dente, According To Package Directions. Drain The Noodles And Run Them Under Cool Running Water To Stop Them From Cooking.
2. Dressing: In A Small Bowl, Whisk Together The Ingredients For The Creamy Sauce.
3. Assemble: In A Large Mixing Bowl, Or Pot You Cooked The Pasta, Add The Pasta, Onion, Bell Pepper, Carrots, Celery, Peas And Dill. Pour The Creamy Sauce Overtop And Toss Well To Coat. Keep The Salad Chilled Until Ready To Serve.
4. Store: Leftovers Can Be Kept In The Refrigerator For Up To 5 – 6 Days In A Covered Container.

title: CHOPPED VEGETABLE SALAD
ingredients:
1. Salad
2. 1 English Cucumber About 2 Cups Chopped
3. 1 Medium Yellow Bell Pepper Chopped
4. 1 Medium Orange Bell Pepper Chopped
5. Handful Grape Tomatoes Halved Or Quartered
6. 14 Red Onion Diced Or 2  3 Scallions Sliced
7. Garlic Dressing
8. 2  3 Garlic Cloves Minced
9. 1 Medium Lemon Juice Of
10. 1 Tablespoon Extra Virgin Olive Oil
11. 1 Heaping Tablespoon Dijon Or Stoneground Mustard
12. 1  2 Tablespoons Water
13. Himalayan Salt To Taste
14. Fresh Cracked Pepper Or Lemon Pepper To Taste
preparation:
1. Dressing: In A Small Bowl Combine The Dressing Ingredients And Mix Well, Set Aside.
2. Assemble Salad: In A Large Bowl, Add The Cucumber, Bell Peppers, Tomatoes And Onion. Pour Dressing Over Vegetables And Toss Gently To Coat.
3. Chill: Chill In The Refrigerator For A Few Hours Or Enjoy At Room Temperature.
4. Serve: Salad Can Be Enjoyed As Is, Or Served On A Bed Of Leafy Greens Or Whole Grain Pasta..
5. Store: Leftovers Can Be Kept In The Refrigerator For Up To 5 – 6 Days In An Airtight Container.

title: VEGTABLE QUINOA SOUP
ingredients:
1. 2 Large Carrots Sliced Or Diced
2. 2 Stalks Celery Sliced
3. 1 Onion Diced
4. 14 Head Of Cabbage Chopped
5. 2 Medium Zucchini Cut In Half  Sliced
6. 1 Can 14 Oz Diced Tomatoes With Juices Pref Fire Roasted
7. 2 Cans 14 Oz Beans Of Choice Drained And Rinsed I Used One Can White Beans  One Can Three Bean Medley
8. 13 Cup Dry Quinoa
9. 2 Teaspoons Herbes De Provence Or 1 Teaspoon Each Thyme  Rosemary
10. 12 Teaspoon Garlic Powder
11. Pinch Of Red Pepper Flakes Optional
12. 6 Cups Water Or Vegetable Broth
13. Mineral Salt  Fresh Cracked Pepper To Taste
preparation:
1. Slow Cooker:
2. In 5 – 6 Quart Crockpot, Place Ingredients In The Bottom Starting With The Carrots And Ending With The Liquids.
3. Cook On Low For 6 – 8 Hours, Or High For 3 – 5 Hours. Taste For Seasoning, Adding Salt And Pepper To Taste.
4. Instant Pot:
5. Set Instant Pot To Saute And Add The 1 Tablespoon Olive Oil Or 1/4 Cup Water, Onion, Carrot, And Celery, Saute For 5 Minutes, Adding The Herbs And Garlic Powder In The Last Minute (Feel Free To Skip This Step Entirely Adding Everything To The Pot And Cooking).
6. Add Quinoa, Beans, Cabbage, Zucchini, Tomatoes, Red Pepper Flakes, Salt, Pepper, And Vegetable Broth, Stir To Combine.
7. Attach Lid And Turn To The Lock, Set The Valve To Sealing, And Manually Set To High Pressure For 3 Minutes (Takes About 25 Minutes To Come To Pressure). Let Natural Release For 10 Minutes. Season To Taste.
8. Stovetop:
9. In A Large Pot Or Dutch Oven, Heat 1 Tablespoon Oil (Or 1/4 Cup Water For Water Saute), Add Onions, Carrots And Celery, Saute For 5 Minutes.
10. Add Remaining Ingredients, Bring To A Boil, Cover, Turn Heat To Low And Simmer For 35 Minutes – 1 Hour. Taste For Seasoning, Adding Salt And Pepper To Taste.
11. Serve With Your Favorite Artisan Bread. Add Diced Avocado For Another Layer Of Flavor.
12. Store: Leftovers Can Be Stored In The Refrigerator In A Covered Container For 5 – 6 Days. To Keep Longer, Store In The Freezer For Up To 2 – 3 Months. Let Thaw Before Reheating.

title: INSTANT POT BLACK BEANS
ingredients:
1. 1 Lb Dried Black Beans Rinsed And Odd Beans Removed
2. 1 Small White Onion Diced
3. 3 Cloves Garlic Diced
4. 1 Jalapeno Seeds Removed And Diced
5. 1 Teaspoon Cumin
6. 1 Teaspoon Oregano Optional
7. 1 Teaspoon Mineral Salt
8. 1 Teaspoon Pepper
9. 2 Bay Leaves
10. 4 Cups Water Or Vegetable Broth
preparation:
1. Start By Washing The Beans.Rinse The Beans Under Cool Running Water Using A Colander. Pick Out And Remove Any Odd Shaped Beans.
2. Add Ingredients To The Instant Pot. Place The Black Beans In The Bowl Of The Instant Pot, Add The Onions, Garlic, Cumin, Jalapeno (If Using), Bay Leaves, Salt, Pepper And Finish With The Liquids.
3. Pressure Cook The Beans.Manually Set Theinstant Pot To High Pressure For 35 Minutes, Close The Vent To Seal. Once Done, Let The Pressure Cooker Steam Vent Naturally For About 25 Minutes.
4. Taste For Flavor.Taste The Beans, Adding As Much Lime Juice, Salt And Pepper As You Like.
5. Beans Will Soak Up The Remaining Liquids As They Cool. Remove Bay Leaves Before Serving.
6. Makes About 5 Cups. Store: Leftovers Can Be Stored In A Covered Container In The Refrigerator For Up To 4 – 5 Days. To Keep Longer, Store In Freezer Safe Containers Or Baggies For Up To 2 – 3 Months.

title: VEGETABLE LO MEIN WITH CRISPY TOFU
ingredients:
1. 8 Oz Vegan Ramen Or Linguini Noodles
2. 1 Tablespoon Sesame Oil Or Any Neutral Oil Or 14 Cup Veggie Broth For Water Saute
3. 1 Tub 14Oz Firm Tofu Cubed 12 Inch
4. 1 Teaspoon Garlic Powder
5. 1 Onion Sliced Lengthwise
6. 2 Cloves Garlic Minced
7. 2 Carrots Cut Into Matchsticks Or Thinly Sliced Diagonally
8. 1 Large Red Bell Pepper Julienned
9. 3  4 Tablespoons Tamari Coconut Aminos Or Soy Sauce
10. 1 Tablespoon Pure Maple Syrup Or Mirin
11. 1 Tablespoon Rice Wine Vinegar
12. 2  3 Teaspoons Dark Sesame Oil Toasted
13. Red Pepper Flakes Or Sriracha To Taste Optional
14. 3 Scallions Sliced
15. Bean Sprouts
16. Cilantro
preparation:
1. Tofu: Start With The Tofu By Cubing It Into 1/2 Cubes And Drying The Cubes Between A Dish Cloth Or Paper Towels To Remove Excess Moisture. Heat Up A Skillet Nice And Hot With A Little Oil, Cook Tofu, Shaking The Pan Often To Keep Them From Sticking, On Each Side For About 5 – 6 Minutes, Or Until Golden And Lightly Crispy Looking. Sprinkle With Garlic Powder And Season With Salt. Set Aside.
2. Noodles: Cook The Noodles According To Package Directions, Set Aside.
3. Sauce: In A Small Bowl Whisk Together The Tamari (Soy Sauce), Pure Maple Syrup/Mirin, Sesame Oil, And Rice Wine Vinegar, And Set Aside. For A Little Heat, Add A Pinch Of Red Pepper Flakes Or Sriracha To Taste.
4. Stir-Fry & Combine: Heat Oil In A Large Skillet Or Wok Over Medium Heat. Add In The Onion, Stir Fry For 3 Minutes. Add Garlic, Carrots, And Red Bell Pepper, Stir-Fry Until Al Dente, About 4 Minutes. Add The Noodles And Sauce, Toss Well To Combine. Add The Tofu And Scallions, Mix Again.
5. Serve Right Away With Bean Sprouts And Fresh Cilantro For Garnish.
6. Store Leftovers In The Refrigerator For Up To 5 – 6 Days. Or Keep In The Freezer For Up To 3 Months (Defrost Before Heating).
7. Reheat: Lo Mein Can Be Reheated On The Stovetop On Low Heat, Until Warmed Through, Adding Extra Sauce Or Veggie Broth To Bring Back Moisture As Needed.

title: SIMPLE VEGAN PHO
ingredients:
1. Pho Broth
2. 1 Onion Ends Removed And Sliced In Half Lengthwise
3. 3 Inch Piece Of Ginger Sliced
4. 3 Carrots Cut Into 2 Inch Pieces
5. 3 Cloves Garlic Slightly Crushed
6. 6  8 Dried Shiitake Mushrooms
7. 2  3 Lemongrass Stalks Cut Into 2  3 Inch Pieces And Slightly Smashed
8. 2  3 Star Anise
9. 1 Cinnamon Stick
10. 1 Tablespoon Peppercorns
11. 1 Tablespoon Fennel Seeds
12. 1 Tablespoon Coriander Seeds
13. 12 Cups Vegetable Broth Or Half Water And Broth
14. 2 Tablespoons Tamari Or Soy Sauce
15. Add Ins
16. Carrot Slicesribbons
17. Sugar Snap Peas
18. 14 Oz Firm Or Extrafirm Tofu Cubed
19. Napa Cabbage Sliced
20. 14 Oz Rice Stick Noodles Or 100 Soba Noodles
21. Garnishes
22. Beans Sprouts
23. Green Onions Sliced
24. Jalapeno Sliced  Most Seeds Removed
25. Cilantro
26. Thai Basil Regular Basil Is Fine Too
27. Lime Wedges
28. Sambal Oeleck Chili Paste
preparation:
1. Prepare The Broth:
2. Place The Onion And Ginger On A Small Baking Sheet. Place Under The Broiler Until The Onion And Ginger Becomes Scorched And Browned. Slice The Ginger.
3. Lightly Crush The Peppercorns, Fennel And Coriander Seeds. Add Them To A Tea Strainer Or Tie Them Up Using A Piece Of Cheese Cloth And String Or Small Mesh Bag.
4. In A Large Pot Or Dutch Oven, Add The Ingredients For The Pho Broth, Bring To A Boil, Cover, Reduce Heat And Simmer For At Least 1 Hour. You Can Also Make The Pho In The Crock Pot/Slow Cooker, Cook On Low For 4 – 6 Hours. Taste For Seasoning. Strain Or Remove Spices, Ginger, Lemon Grass And Onion. Reserve The Mushrooms And Carrots, Once Slightly Cooled, Slice And Add Back To The Pot.
5. Cook The Noodles: Cook Noodles According To Package Directions, Set Aside.
6. Prep Additional Add-Ins And Garnishes: Gather And Prep The Add-Ins. Serve Veggies Fresh When Serving Or Add Them To The Pho Broth And Heat Over Medium Heat For An Additional 10 -15 Minutes To Soften A Bit.
7. Serve: In Individual Bowls Add Noodles, Veggies And Broth. Top With Plenty Of Bean Sprouts, Greens Onions, Jalapenos, Cilantro & Basil, Add A Squeeze Of Lime And Some Chili Paste For Heat.

title: SPAGHETTI + ITALIAN VEGAN MEATBALLS
ingredients:
1. 12 Oz Pasta Or 2 Spaghetti Squash
2. 1 Jar 25 Oz Marinara Sauce Or Pasta Sauce Of Choice
3. Bean Balls
4. 1 Tablespoon Olive Oil Or 14 Cup Water For Water Saute
5. 8 Oz Mushrooms About 8 Oz Sliced I Used Cremini
6. 1 Small Yellow Onion Diced
7. 2 Cloves Garlic Minced
8. 12 Cup Walnuts Or Sunflower Seeds Optional
9. 1 Can 15 Oz Beans Cannellini Chickpeas Kidney Or Black Beans Drained And Rinsed
10. 1 Cup Of Oats Old Fashioned Or Quick Oats
11. 1 Tablespoon Italian Seasonings Sub With Dried Oregano Basil Thyme Or A Mixture Of These
12. 12 Teaspoon Garlic Powder
13. Pinch Of Red Pepper Flakes To Taste
14. Sea Salt And Pepper To Taste
preparation:
1. Saute: In A Skillet Or Pan, Heat Oil Or Water Over Medium Heat. Add Mushrooms, Onion And Garlic, Add Saute For 5 Minutes, Adding The Herbs During The Last Minute. Let Cool For A Few Minutes.
2. Food Processor: If Using The Nuts/Seeds, Place In Food Processor First And Pulse Until Coarsely Ground, And Continue. Also, If Using Old Fashioned Oats Place Them In The With The Nuts To Chop Them Up A Bit. Add The Beans, Sauteed Veggies, Oats. Pulse Until Just Combined (Don’T Overmix Or It’Ll Turn Into A Paste). Taste For Seasoning Adding Anything Extra You May Like. I Added In Some Fresh Chopped Basil I Had On Hand.
3. Shape Vegan Meatballs: Roll Mixture Into Balls, About 1 1/2 – 2 Inches, And Place On A Baking Sheet. I Was Able To Get 10 Jumbo Sized Bean Balls. You Can Easily Make Smaller Balls, Yielding 16 – 20.
4. Cook In 1 Of 2 Ways:
5. Bake: Place Balls On A Baking Sheet Lined With Parchment Or Silicone Mat. Put In The Oven On The Middle Rack And Bake For 25 – 30 Minutes At 400 Degrees F. If Roasting Spaghetti Squash, Add In While The Squash Is Cooking. Remove Both When Time Is Up And Let Cool.
6. Stovetop:In A Skillet Or Shallow Pan, Heat 1 Tablespoon Oil Over Medium Heat, Add Meatballs And Cook For 15 – 20 Minutes, Turning Often To Brown All Sides.
7. Cook Sauce + Meatballs:Add The Pasta Sauce And Meatballs Together, Cook Over Low For 10 Minutes, Or Until Sauce Is Warmed Through.
8. Pasta: Cook The Pasta According To Package Directions. If Using Spaghetti Squash, See How To Cook Spaghetti Squash
9. Serve: In Individual Bowls Serve Spaghetti Topped With Sauce And Vegan Meatballs. Top With Salt, Pepper, And Chopped Fresh Parsley Or Basil. A Nice Dusting Of Almond Parmesan Will Also Enhance This Dish!
10. Store Leftovers In An Airtight Container For Up To 5 Days. Leftovers Were Great!

title: MEDITERRANEAN SMASHED CHICKPEA SALAD
ingredients:
1. 2 Cans 14 Oz Chickpeas Garbanzo Beans Drained And Rinsed
2. 1 Red Bell Pepper Cored And Finely Diced
3. 13 Medium Red Onion Finely Diced
4. 1 Can 14Oz Artichoke Hearts Diced Pref In Water
5. 5  6 Oz Jar Kalamata Olives Chopped
6. 2 Teaspoons Fresh Dill Chopped Or 1 Teaspoon Dried
7. Salt  Pepper To Taste
8. Juice Of 1 Lemon
9. 23 Cup Vegan Mayo Or 12 Cup Hummus  3  6 Tablespoons Water To Thin See Notes
preparation:
1. Dressing: In A Small Mixing Bowl, Add The Hummus And Water, Mix Well, Set Aside. If Mixture Is Too Thin, Add More Hummus. If Mixture Is Too Thick, Add More Water. Consistency Should Be Creamy, Not Too Thick, Not Too Thin. Use Your Best Judgement. If Using Mayo, You May Consider Adding 1 Teaspoon Garlic Powder.
2. Mash Chickpeas: In A Large Mixing Bowl, Add The Chickpeas. Using The Back Of A Fork, Or Potato Masher, Roughly Mash About 3/4 Of The Chickpeas, Leaving Some Whole.
3. Assemble: Add To The Smashed Chickpeas The Remaining Ingredients And Mix Well To Combine.
4. Serve Chilled Or At Room Temperature.
5. Use This Chickpea Salad In Lettuce Wraps, On A Bed Of Leafy Greens With Sliced Cucumbers And Tomatoes, Scoop Up With Crackers Of Vegetables, Or Use As An Amazing Sandwich Filler. A Few Pepperoncinis On The Side Would Be Great Too!
6. Store: Leftovers In The Refrigerator For Up To 5 Days In An Airtight Container.

title: Instant Pot Red Beans and Rice
ingredients:
1. 1 Lb Dried Red Beans Or Kidney Beans About 2 Cups Rinsed And Odd Beans Removed
2. 1 Large Yellow Onion Diced
3. 5 Cloves Garlic Minced
4. 1 Large Green Bell Pepper Cored And Diced
5. 3  4 Celery Ribs Sliced
6. 1 Tablespoon Cajun Or Creole Seasoning
7. 1 Teaspoon Each Oregano Thyme And Smoked Paprika
8. 1 Teaspoon Hot Sauce Tabasco Or Sriracha Or 12 Teaspoon Red Pepper Flakes Or Cayenne
9. Generous Pinch Of Mineral Salt  Pepper
10. 2  3 Bay Leaves
11. 4 Cups Water Or Low Sodium Vegetable Broth
12. Vegan Sausage Optional
13. 14 Cup Fresh Parsley Chopped
14. To Serve
15. 3 Cups Of Cooked Rice Use Your Favorite Rice Or Quinoa
16. Chopped Parsley
17. Green Onions
18. Lime Wedges
preparation:
1. Start By Washing The Beans. Rinse The Beans Under Cool Running Water Using A Colander. Pick Out And Remove Any Odd Shaped Beans (No Soaking Required).
2. Add Ingredients To The Instant Pot. Place The Red Beans In The Bowl Of The Instant Pot, Add The Onions, Bell Pepper, Bell Pepper, Garlic, Oregano, Cajun Seasoning, Bay Leaves, Salt, Pepper And Finish With The Liquids.
3. Pressure Cook The Beans. Manually Set The Instant Pot To High Pressure For 60 Minutes (If Using Kidney Beans Cook 70 Min), Close The Vent To Seal. Once Done, Let The Pressure Cooker Steam Vent Naturally For About 20 – 25 Minutes.
4. Add Sausage And Taste For Flavor. Remove The Bay Leaves. Add The Optional Sausage And Parsley. Taste For Flavor, Adding As Much Salt And Pepper As You Like. Beans Will Soak Up The Remaining Liquids As They Cool. For A Thicker Sauce Like Gravy, Mash Some Of The Beans Against The Wall Of The Instant Pot Bowl With The Back Of A Fork.
5. Cook The Rice. While The Beans Are Pressure Cooking, Make The Rice According To Package Directions Using At Least 1 Cup Of Rice.
6. Pairs Well With This Vegan Cornbread Or Jalapeno Cornbread Muffins On The Side!
7. Store: Leftovers Will Keep For 5 – 6 Days In The Refrigerator, Stored In A Covered Container. To Keep Longer, Store In The Freezer Using Freezer Safe Containers For 2 – 3 Months. Let Thaw In The Refrigerator. Re-Warm On The Stovetop Or The Microwave.

title: VEGAN BLUEBERRY BANANA OAT BREAD
ingredients:
1. 1 14 Cups 120G Old Fashioned Oats
2. 1 14 Cups 125G Light Spelt Flour
3. 13 Cup 47G Sugar Turbinado Coconut Or Pure Cane
4. 2 Teaspoons Baking Powder
5. 12 Teaspoon Baking Soda
6. Generous Pinch Of Salt
7. 2  3 Ripe Bananas Mashed About 1 To 1 14 Cups 220276G
8. 14 Cup 56Cups Unsweetened Almond Milk
9. 14 Cup 56Cups Grapeseed Or Light Flavored Olive Oil Or Applesauce
10. 1 Cup 100G Fresh Blueberries Frozen Is Ok Too
11. Optional Add Ins
12. 1 Teaspoon Vanilla Extract
13. 1 Teaspoon Cinnamon
preparation:
1. Preheat Oven To 350 Degrees F. Grease A 9 X 5 Loaf Pan Lightly With Oil.
2. Combine: In A Medium Sized Mixing Bowl, Add The Flour, Oats, Sugar, Baking Powder, Baking Soda, Optional Cinnamon And Pinch Of Salt, Stir To Combine.
3. Mash The Bananas By Hand In A Small Bowl, Using The Back Of A Fork Or Slotted Spoon.
4. Mix: To The Dry Ingredients, Add The Mashed Bananas, Oil, Plant Milk And Optional Vanilla, Mix To Combine, Just Until The Flour Is Incorporated. Best Practice For Mixing Quick Bread Batter: Don’T Overmix, As Overmixing The Ingredients Will Cause The Gluten Proteins To Create An Elastic Batter That Will Not Rise Well.
5. Gently Fold In The Blueberries.
6. Pour The Batter Into A Lightly Greased 9 X 5 Loaf Pan. Optionally, Add A Few Blueberries Strategically To The Top And Sprinkle A Small Handful Of Oats Over Top. I Added Quick Oats, But Old Fashioned Oat Would Look Nice Too. You Can Also Chop Old Fashioned Oats Into Smaller Pieces.
7. Bake: Place Loaf Pan In Oven And Bake For 50 – 55 Minutes, Rotating The Pan Once Halfway Through. Top Will Turn Golden And Toothpick Placed In The Center Will Come Out Clean.
8. Once Done, Let Cool For 15 Minutes In The Pan. You Should Be Able To Tilt The Pan And The Loaf Will Come Out Clean, Place On Rack To Cool Completely.
9. Store Covered On The Counter For Up To 3 Days Or In The Refrigerator Up To 1 Week. Keep In The Freezer For Up To 3 Months – Place Completely Cooled Loaves In Freezer Containers Or Bags. Thaw The Wrapped Loaves Overnight In The Refrigerator.

title: RAW PAD THAI
ingredients:
1. 1 Package 16 Oz Kelp Noodles
2. 1 Large Carrot Julienned Or 12 Cup Shredded Carrots
3. 1 Zucchini Julienned
4. 1 Red Bell Pepper Thinly Sliced
5. 4 Scallions Thinly Sliced
6. 1 Cup Bean Sprouts
7. 12 Cup Cilantro Roughly Chopped
8. 1 Jalapeno Sliced Optional
9. Raw Cashews Or Peanuts Garnish
10. Lime Wedges Garnish
11. Sauce
12. 14 Cup Raw Almond Butter I Used Crunchy
13. 14 Cup Tahini
14. 14 Cup Water  More As Needed
15. 3 Tablespoons Tamari Coconut Aminos Or Nama Shoyu
16. 3 Tablespoon Pure Maple Syrup
17. 1 Teaspoon Garlic Minced
18. 1 Teaspoon Ginger Minced
19. Pinch Of Mineral Salt
20. 12 Lime Squeezed
preparation:
1. Sauce: In A Small/Medium Bowl, Combine The Sauce Ingredients And Mix Together Until Blended. Set Aside For 30 Min To Let The Flavors Mingle. Add Extra Ingredients To Suit Your Taste.
2. Prep: While Sauce Is Setting, Prepare Your Veggies And Rinse The Kelp Noodles. You Could Cut Your Kelp Noodles Into Smaller Pieces Or Leave As Is (I Left Mine As Is).
3. Assemble: Place Kelp Noodles And Other Vegetables In A Large Bowl, Pour The Pad Thai Sauce Over Top And Toss Until Thoroughly Coated.
4. Serve In Individual Bowls With A Squeeze Of Lime And Cashews Over Top. Enjoy To The Fullest!
5. Store: Leftovers Can Be Stored In The Refrigerator For Up To 3 – 4 Days, In A Covered Container.

title: KALE, DATE & ALMOND SALAD + LEMON DRESSING
ingredients:
1. Juice Of 1 Large Lemon
2. 1 Teaspoon Pure Maple Syrup
3. Pinch Of Salt
4. Pinch Of Red Pepper Flakes Or Fresh Cracked Pepper
5. 5 Oz Package Baby Kale Or 1 Large Bunch Lacinato Or Curly Kale Stem Removed And Julienned
6. 18 Red Onion Or 1 Small Shallot Thinly Sliced
7. 2 Tablespoons Extra Virgin Olive Oil Optional
8. 8 Dates Seeds Removed And Chopped
9. 13 Cup Slivered Almonds
10. 3 Tablespoons Hemp Hearts
11. Almond Parmesan Or Violife Vegan Parm
preparation:
1. In A Large Bowl, Combine The Lemon Juice, Maple Syrup, Salt And Red Pepper Flakes, Add The Kale And Shallots, Mix Well. If Using Large Leaf Kale, Let Set For At Least 20 Minutes (Or Overnight In The Fridge) Making Sure To Toss A Few Times. If Using Baby Kale, Serve Right Away As Baby Kale Is Tender Ready.
2. Before Serving Add A Drizzle Of The Optional Olive Oil, Toss Well. Add In The Dates, Almonds, Hemp Hearts And Light Dusting Of Almond Parmesan Or Shaved Vegan Parm.

title: CURRY RED LENTIL STEW WITH KALE & CHICKPEAS
ingredients:
1. 1 Tablespoon Olive Oil Or 14 Cup Waterveg Broth
2. 1 Large Yellow Onion Diced
3. 5 Cloves Garlic Minced
4. 1 12 Inch Knob Fresh Ginger Minced
5. 1  2 Tablespoons Curry Yellow To Taste
6. 1 Teaspoon Cumin
7. 1 Teaspoon Turmeric
8. Himalayan Salt To Taste
9. 1  2 Teaspoons Red Pepper Flakes Optional
10. 1 Can 15 Oz Fire Roasted Tomatoes Or 1 Cup Fresh Tomatoes Diced
11. 2 Cups Dry Red Lentils Rinsed And Picked Over
12. 1 12 Cups Cooked Chickpeas Or 1 Can 15 Oz Garbanzo Beans Drained And Rinsed
13. 6 Cups Water Or Vegetable Broth  More As Needed
14. 4 Cups Kale Julienned
15. Juice Of One Lemon Optional
16. Cooked Basmati Rice Brown Or Jasmine Ok Too To Serve
preparation:
1. In Large Pot Or Stock Pot, Heat Oil Over Medium Heat, Saute Onion, Garlic, And Ginger Until Onion Becomes Transparent, About 5 Minutes. Add Spices, Tomatoes, Lentils, Garbanzo Beans And 6 Cups Of Liquids, Bring To A Boil, Cover, Reduce Heat And Simmer For About 30 Minutes. Add In The Kale And Optional Lemon Juice, Continue To Cook For 10 Minutes Or Until Kale Softens And Wilts.
2. Serve Alone, Or Over White Rice, Brown Rice Or Quinoa. It Would Pair Well With This Flavorful Lime Cilantro Rice. And For Soaking And Swiping This Vegan Naan Breadis Just What You Need. Enjoy!

title: CURRY & SRIRACHA ROASTED CHICKPEAS
ingredients:
1. 1 12 Cups Cooked Garbanzo Beans Chickpeas Or 1 Can 15 Oz Drained Rinsed And Patted Dry
2. 1 Or 2 Teaspoons Sesame Coconut Or Olive Oil
3. 1 Heaping Teaspoon Sriracha
4. 1 Heaping Teaspoon Curry Powder
5. Dash Or Two Garlic Powder
6. Pinch Of Mineral Salt
preparation:
1. Preheat Oven To 400 Degrees F.
2. Dry: Rinse And Dry The Chickpeas Between A Kitchen Towel. Remove Any Lose Skins.
3. Season: Place Ingredients In A Medium Size Bowl And Combine Well To Coat.
4. Layer: Arrange Chickpeas In A Single Layer On A Roasting Pan Or Rimmed Cookie Sheet Lined With Parchment Paper, Silpat Or Lightly Greased.
5. Roast: Bake For About 40-45 Minutes Mixing Them Around Every 10 Minutes Or So Until Chickpeas Have A Nice Roasted Look And Are Crispy.
6. Cool: Let Cool For 10 Minutes Before Serving.
7. Store: Keep Chickpeas Crunchy By Storing Them In A Container That Lets Air Flow Through. When Stored In An Airtight Container They Will Soften Up And Lose Their Crunchiness.
8. Notes:
9. Feel Free To Add Extra Spice If You Want It A Little Spicier!
10. Recommended Equipment: I Love And Use This Parchment Paper And Silpat(Affiliate Links). For More Of My Favorite Cooking Tools, Shop My Kitchen Essentials.
11. P.S. Don’T Forget To Drink Plenty Of Water With Your Chickpeas. Enjoy!

title: Vegan Strawberry Muffins (Healthy + Easy)
ingredients:
1. 13 Cup Sugar Pure Cane Coconut Or Pure Maple Syrup
2. 13 Cup Olive Oil Or Vegan Butter At Room Temp
3. 1 Teaspoon Vanilla Extract
4. 1 Cup Nondairy Milk Almond Cashew Oat Soy Etc
5. 2 Cups Flour Allpurpose Whole Wheat Spelt Or Combo
6. 2 12 Teaspoons Baking Powder
7. Pinch Of Salt
8. 1 12 Cups Of Strawberries Diced Plus Extra For Topping
preparation:
1. Prep: Preheat Oven To 350 Degrees F. Line A Muffin Tin With Parchment Paper Liners Or Lightly Grease With Oil.
2. Batter: In The Bottom Of A Large Mixing Bowl, Add The Sugar And Oil/Butter, Mix Well. Add The Vanilla And Non-Dairy Milk, Stir To Combine. Lastly, Add The Flour, Baking Powder, And Salt, Mix Until Combined.
3. Add Strawberries: Toss In The Strawberries And Gently Fold Them Into The Batter.
4. Scoop: Fill Each Muffin-Lined Hole With Batter. For Uniformity, Fill Muffin Tin Using A ¼ Measuring Cup Or Large Ice Cream Scooper To Scoop Up The Batter And Pour Into The Muffin Holes.
5. Topping: Optionally, Add A Few Strategic Strawberries On Top And Sprinkle The Top With A Little Pure Cane Sugar Or Raw Sugar. The Sugar Will Add A Nice Crunch To The Tops!
6. Bake: Place In The Oven On The Center Rack And Bake For 30 – 35 Minutes. Let Cool A Few Minutes And Enjoy Warm Or At Room Temperature.
7. Makes 12 Muffins

title: CHICKPEA, POTATO & PARSLEY BOWL
ingredients:
1. 1  1 12 Pounds Potatoes About 3  4 Medium Sliced 14  12 Inch
2. 2 Large Carrots Sliced
3. 1 Can 15Oz Chickpeas Garbanzo Beans Or 1 12 Cups Cooked Drained And Rinsed
4. 1  2 Tablespoons Olive Oil
5. 12  1 Teaspoon Paprika Everyday Seasoning Mix Or Lemonpepper
6. 12 Teaspoon Garlic Powder
7. Mineral Salt  Pepper To Taste
8. 1 Bunch Parsley About 2 Cups Roughly Chopped
9. Sriracha To Serve Optional
10. Lemon Tahini Dressing
11. 5 Tablespoons Tahini
12. 5 Tablespoons Water
13. Juice Of 1 Lemon
14. Red Pepper Flakes Optional
preparation:
1. Preheat Oven To 425 Degrees F. Line A Rimmed Sheet Pan With Parchment Paper, A Silpat Or Lightly Grease With Oil.
2. Roasting: Place Potatoes, Carrots And Chickpeas On Sheet Pan, Drizzle With Oil, Sprinkle With Spices And Herbs Of Choice, And Toss Together To Coat, Either Using Your Hands Or Two Large Spoons. Spread Veggies In A Single Layer, Sprinkle With Additional Seasonings If Needed. Place In Oven On Middle Rack, Center Of Oven And Bake For 40 Minutes, Stirring 2 – 3 Times.
3. Dressing: In A Mason Jar Or Small Bowl, Add The Tahini, Water, Lemon Juice And Salt, And Mix Well.
4. Chop The Parsley.
5. Serve: Once Veggies Are Done, Let Cool A Few Minutes And Assemble Your Bowls.
6. For Dressing Variation, Try This Creamy Lemon-Herb Hemp Dressingor Sriracha Cashew Cream Sauce!
7. Store: Leftovers Can Be Kept In The Refrigerator For 4 – 5 Days. Reheat On The Stovetop Over Low, Stirring Occasionally Until Warmed Through. Also, Heat In The Microwave For 1 – 2 Minutes, Stopping To Stir Every 30 Seconds Or So.

title: CREAMY CELERY SOUP (VEGAN)
ingredients:
1. 14 Cup Vegan Butter I Use Miyokos Or 12 Cup Water For Water Saute
2. 1 Large Head Of Celery About 5  6 Cups Thinly Sliced With Leaves
3. 1 Medium Onion Or Leek Diced
4. 4 Cloves Garlic Minced
5. 1 Lb Potatoes Waxy White Or Yukon Gold Diced Into 14  12 Inch Cubes
6. 4 Cups Vegetable Broth Or Water Or Combo
7. 14 Cup Fresh Dill Chopped
8. 12 Cup Parsley Chopped
9. Pinch Of Red Pepper Flakes
10. Mineral Salt  Pepper To Taste
preparation:
1. Saute: Heat Butter/Oil/Water Over Medium Heat, Add The Celery, Leek/Onion, Potatoes, Garlic, And Generous Pinch Of Salt, Saute For 8 – 10 Minutes Stirring Frequently.
2. Simmer: Add The Liquids, Bring To A Boil, Reduce Heat To Medium Low And Cook At A Gentle Boil For 10 Minutes, Or Until Potatoes Are Just Fork Tender.
3. Add Herbs: Remove From Heat, Add The Dill And Parsley, Give A Good Stir. Enjoy As Is Or Continue To Next Step.
4. Puree: Puree The Soup Using An Immersion Blender Or Transfer The Soup To A Blender And Blend Until Creamy.
5. Serve Warm Or Chilled Topped With A Few Chopped Celery Leaves And Parsley. Great With Drizzle Of Vegan Cream!
6. Soup Pairs Well With Homemade Artisan Bread, Naan Bread Or A Slice Of Toasted Dave’S Killer Bread With Vegan Butter. For Gluten Free, Try This Chickpea Flour Socca Flatbread, It’S Not As Bready But It’S Still Delicious!
7. Store: Leftovers Will Keep For 5 – 6 Days In The Refrigerator, Stored Covered. For Longer Storage, This Soup Can Be Stored In The Freezer For 2 Months In Freezer Safe Containers Or Baggies.

title: SAFFRON POTATO LEEK SOUP + FRIED GARLIC & ALMONDS
ingredients:
1. 2 Pounds Organic Yukon Gold Potatoes
2. 2 Small Leeks Sliced And Any Dirt Removed
3. 2 Tablespoons Olive Oil
4. 12 Cup Raw Slivered Almonds
5. 4  6 Large Garlic Cloves Minced
6. 6 Cups Water Or Vegetable Broth  More As Needed
7. 12 Cup Rice Basmati Or Jasmine Rice
8. 1 Pinch Saffron Partially Crushed
9. Mineral Salt And Fresh Cracked Pepper To Taste
10. 2 Teaspoons Sherry Vinegar Or Redwhite Wine Vinegar
11. 2 Tablespoons Flat Leaf Parsley Minced
preparation:
1. Potatoes: Cut Potatoes Into Irregular Chunks By Inserting The Tip Of A Small, Sharp Knife Into A Potato And Twisting Until A 1 1/2 Chunk Comes Out. Repeat Until The Entire Potato Is Cut Up, Than Continue With The Remaining Potatoes, Set Aside. You Can Also Just Roughly Chop The Potatoes Into 1 1/2 Inch Chunks. Peeling Is Optional.
2. Fried Almonds + Garlic: Heat Oil In A Heavy Pot Over Medium Heat, Add Almonds And Garlic, Cooking, Stirring Frequently Until Golden, 3 – 4 Minutes. Transfer The Almonds And Garlic To A Bowl To Cool Slightly. In A Food Processor, Place The Garlic And Almonds, Pulse Until Desired Texture. I Left Mine Fairly Course. You Can Also Simply Mince Them With A Knife. Add All But 2 Tablespoons To The Soup. Season Soup With Salt And Pepper To Taste.
3. Saute: Add Leeks And A 2 Tablespoons Of Water To The Pot And Cook, Stirring Occasionally, Until Softened, About 4 Minutes.
4. Simmer: Add Potatoes, Vegetable Broth And Rice, Bring To A Boil, Cover, Reduce Heat To Low And Simmer 40 To 45 Minutes.
5. Saffron: Remove A Few Tablespoons Of Soup From The Pot And Place In A Small Bowl, Add Saffron And Let Steep For 2 Minutes, Add To The Soup. Add A Little More Water Or Broth If The Soup Seems To Thick And Continue To Cook.
6. Add Remaining Ingredients: Add The Vinegar To The Reserved Ground Almond Mixture And Stir In The Soup. Add The Parsley And Cook For A Minute. Taste For Seasonings, Adding A Little More Salt And Vinegar If Necessary.
7. Serve With Dense Whole Grain Or Artisan Breador Naan Bread.
8. Store: Leftover Can Be Stored In The Refrigerator For Up To 4 – 5 Days. Keep Longer In The Freezer, Up To 2 – 3 Months.
9. Notes:
10. If Using Almonds With The Skin, Just Know That The Skins Will Fall Off In The Soup. For Me This Is Not An Issue (I Like The Added Fiber) But If You’Re Serving For Company You May Consider Using Blanched Almonds.
11. How To Make Without Rice: Reduce The Liquids To 4 Cups, Adding More As Needed. When Soup Is Done, If You’D Like It A Little Creamier, Mash A Few Of The Potato Pieces With The Back Of A Spoon.
12. Slow Cooker: Add The Leeks, Potatoes, Rice And Liquids To The Bowl Of Your Slow Cooker. Cook On Low For 4 – 5 Hours Or High For 3 – 4 Hours. Fry The Almonds And Garlic According To Directions And Continue With The Recipe Add The Mixture And Saffron At The End Of Cooking.
13. Recipe Adapted From Food 52Anya Von Bremzen’S Potato Soup With Fried Almonds.
14. Recommended Equipment: I Have Been Loving This Staub Braiser (Affiliate Link) You See In The Photos, 5 Stars For Ease And Clean Up! It’S My New Favorite For Everyday Cooking – Soups, Fried Tofu, Skillet Potatoes, Etc. For More Of My Favorite Cooking Tools, Shop My Kitchen Essentials!

title: SAVORY CHICKPEA PANCAKE (GF)
ingredients:
1. 23 Cup Chickpea Flour Aka Garbanzo Bean Or Besan
2. 23 Cup Water
3. 12 Heaping Teaspoon Baking Soda Can Be Optional
4. Pinch Of Turmeric Will Give It A Yellow Color Optional
5. 12 Teaspoon Cumin Or To Taste
6. 14 Teaspoon Garlic Powder
7. Mineral Salt To Taste
8. Juice Of 12 Small Lemon Or 1 Teaspoon Apple Cider Vinegar
9. Addins
10. 23 Cup Greens Kale Or Spinach Julienned And Loosely Packed
11. Small Handful Mushrooms Thinly Sliced
12. 12 Shallot Finely Diced
13. 7 Grape Tomatoes Halved Or Quartered Depending On The Size
preparation:
1. Preheat Griddle On Medium.
2. Mix: In A Medium Size Bowl, Combine Flour, Water, Baking Soda, Optional Turmeric, Cumin, Garlic Powder And Salt To Taste. Mix Well Ensuring All The Flour Lumps Are Gone. Add In Lemon, Stir And You Will Notice The Batter Rise And Foam A Bit. Add In Veggies And Combine Thoroughly. (Note: I Don’T Really Measure The Vegetables, So This Is An Approximation)
3. Cook: Pour 1/2 Of The Mixture Onto The Preheated Griddle Or Skillet. You Can Use Your Spatula To Move The Veggies Around And Flatten As Needed If They Are Piled Up In Areas. Also You Can Help Make Your Pancake Round By Gently Pushing In The Edges Where Needed. There May Be Times When It Appears That You Have More Veggies Than Batter, Don’T Panic….In A Few Minutes The Batter Will Puff Up From The Baking Soda And Fill In Making It Look Fluffy And Full. Let Cook For 5 Minutes. Flip And Cook Another 5 – 7 Minutes, Making Sure The Batter Cooks Throughout.
4. Serve With Your Choice Of Condiments. A Thinned Hummus Would Also Be Great! Pairs Well With Fresh Fruit On The Side.
5. Makes 2 Pancakes
6. Store: Leftovers Can Be Stored In The Refrigerator For Up To 4 Days, In A Covered Container. Reheat In The Toaster Oven Or Microwave.

title: QUICK & HEALTHY BANANA BOATS
ingredients:
1. Bananas 1 Per Person Or However Much You Want The Serving To Be
2. Natural Peanut Butter Or Raw Almond Butter
3. Goji Berries
4. Shredded Coconut
5. Hemp Hearts
6. Cacao Nibs Or Semisweet Mini Chocolate Chips
preparation:
1. Peel And Slice Your Banana In Half Lengthwise. Place Banana Slices Cut Side Up And Layer Your Bananas Starting With The Nut Butter. Next, Add The Remaining Ingredients In Any Order You Like. I Added Them In The Order In The List. Enjoy The Simples!
2. Notes:
3. Add Toppings In Any Amount You Like. This Is Just A Guide And Hopefully Some Good Inspiration!
4. Some Optional Toppings Would Be Raisins, Cranberries, Finely Chopped Nuts Such As Almonds, Pistachios Or Walnuts. A Dash Or Light Dusting Of Cinnamon Or Raw Cacao Powder Would Also Be Great!

title: BLACKENED ROASTED CAULIFLOWER ‘STEAKS’
ingredients:
1. 1  2 Tablespoons Olive Oil
2. 1 Large Head Cauliflower
3. Blackened Creole Or Cajun Seasoning Of Choice Recipe For Homemade Below
4. 1 Pint Cherry Or Grape Tomatoes
5. Chopped Fresh Parsley To Serve
6. Lemon Wedges To Garnish
7. Grain Of Choice  Quinoa Brown Rice Or Farro
8. Himalayan Salt To Taste
9. Fresh Ground Pepper To Taste
preparation:
1. Preheat Oven To 425 Degrees F.
2. Prep The Cauliflower: Place The Cauliflower Stem Side Down, And Using A Sharp Knife Cut Into The Top Center And Slice The Cauliflower In Half. You Want To Create As Many Cauliflower Steaks As You Can From The Center Cut Out That Will Be At Least 3/4 Inch Thick. The Remaining Sides And Pieces Can Be Cut Into Cauliflower Nuggets And Roasted Alongside The Steaks, Or On A Separate Baking Sheet. I Feel It’S Best To Use Two Baking Sheets To Prepare This Meal. Using Two Will Give You Plenty Of Room For The Steak Slices To Be Turned Over Without Too Much Crowding.
3. Roasting: Grease Your Baking Sheet/S And Carefully Place Your Cauliflower Steaks Along With The Broken Florets, Or Place The Florets On A Separate Baking Sheet. Using An Small Brush, Gently Brush The ‘Steaks’ And Florets With Oil. Sprinkle As Much Seasoning As You Wish To Coat On ‘Steaks’ And Florets. Add Your Tomatoes To The Baking Sheet, You Can Coat These With Oil Too And Add A Sprinkle Of Sea Salt.
4. Place Your Baking Sheet Into The Oven, If Using Two, Place Sheets On Separate Racks Or Side By Side, Depending On The Size. Bake For 15 Minutes, Gently Flip ‘Steaks’ And Stir Florets, Season Again And Bake For An Additional 15 Minutes.
5. Serve Immediately With Roasted Tomatoes, Grain Of Choice, Sprinkle Of Chopped Parsley And Lemon Wedges.
6. Store: Leftovers Can Be Stored In The Refrigerator For 4 Days, In A Covered Container.

title: Tomato Basil Soup (Vegan)
ingredients:
1. 1 Tablespoon Olive Oil Or 14 Cup Water
2. 1 Large White Onion Sliced
3. 6 Cloves Garlic Minced
4. 2 12 Lbs Tomatoes Roma Plum Or Tomatoes On The Vine
5. 12 Cup Basil Leaves About 10 12 Large Leaves Or 2 Teaspoons Dried
6. 12 Teaspoon Dried Oregano
7. 2 Cups Lowsodium Vegetable Broth
8. Salt  Pepper To Taste
9. Vegan Cream To Serve
preparation:
1. Prep:Start By Prepping The Onion And Garlic. Cut The Quarter The Tomatoes Or Cut Into 1 Inch Pieces If Using Larger Tomatoes.
2. Saute: In A Heavy Bottom Pan, Heat Oil Or Water Over Medium Heat, Saute The Onion For 7 Minutes, Add The Garlic And Cook 1 Minute More.
3. Add Remaining Ingredients: Add The Tomatoes, Basil, Oregano, Pinch Of Salt And Pepper, And Broth.
4. Simmer:Bring The Chunky Soup To A Boil, Cover, Reduce Heat And Simmer For 15 Minutes.
5. Puree: Once Soup Is Done, Let Rest For 10 Minutes To Cool. Using An Immersion Blender Or Cup Blender, Puree The Soup Until Desired Consistency. Season With More Salt & Pepper As Needed. If Soup Seems Bland, It Needs More Salt. Stir In A Couple Tablespoons Of Vegan Cream If You Like.
6. Serve: Serve With A Drizzle Of Vegan Cream, Basil And Fresh Cracked Pepper. For A Little Heat, Add A Pinch Of Red Pepper Flakes. Pair With Homemade Artisan Bread Or Soft And Chewy Vegan Naan For Soaking Up The Juices.
7. Store: Leftovers Can Be Stored In The Refrigerator For Up To 6 Days In A Covered Container. To Store Longer, Freeze For Up To 2 – 3 Months.

title: CHICKPEA TACOS (QUICK + EASY)
ingredients:
1. 1 12 Cups Cooked Chickpeas Garbanzo Beans Or 1 Can 15Oz Drained And Rinsed
2. 1 Tablespoon Tamari
3. 1 Teaspoon Garlic Powder
4. 12 Teaspoon Cumin
5. 12 Teaspoon Paprika Regular Or Smoked
6. 12 Teaspoon Onion Powder
7. 1  2 Tablespoons Hot Sauce Sriracha Franks Tapatio Etc Or To Taste
8. 6 Corn Tortillas Warmed
9. 12 Avocado Sliced
10. 14 Head Cabbage Red Or Green Shredded
11. 2 Green Onions Thinly Sliced
12. 14 Cup Cilantro
13. Vegan Sour Cream Creamy Hatch Chile Dressing Cilantrolime Sour Cream Or Sriracha Cashew Cream
14. Lime Wedges To Serve
preparation:
1. Spiced Chickpeas: In A Small Pan, Combine The Chickpeas, Garlic + Onion Powder, Cumin, Paprika, Tamari, And As Much Hot Sauce To Suit Your Taste. Warm Chickpea Mixture Over Medium Heat Until Warmed Through. Alternatively, Warm The Chickpeas In The Microwave, Using A Microwave Safe Bowl, For 45 – 60 Seconds.
2. Warm The Tortillas: I Do This Carefully On The Stove Top Over An Open Flame To Give It Some Charring On The Edges. Stack Them On Top Of Each Other To Keep Them Warm, You Can Also Place Them In A Tortilla Warmer.
3. Assemble: Layer Each Tortilla With Buffalo Chickpeas, Avocado, Cabbage, Green Onions, Cilantro, And Drizzle Of Vegan Crema.
4. Store: Leftover Chickpea Mixture Can Be Stored In The Refrigerator For Up To 5 – 6 Days, In A Covered Container.

title: ALMOND BUTTER COOKIES (4 Ingredients)
ingredients:
1. 1 Cup Almond Butter At Room Temp Crunchy Or Creamy
2. 12 Cup Coconut Sugar Or Organic Pure Cane Sugar
3. 1 Tablespoon Vanilla Extract
4. 1 Flax Egg 1 Heaping Tbsp Flaxseed Meal  3 Tbsp Nondairy Milk Or Water Or 12 Large Banana Mashed
preparation:
1. Preheat Oven To 350 Degrees. Line Baking Sheet With A Silpat, Parchment Paper, Or Leave Baking Sheet Ungreased.
2. Flax Egg: Start By Making Your Flax Egg. In A Small Bowl, Place Flaxseed Meal And Water/Milk, Stir And Set Aside To Set, About 10 Minutes. Or If Using Banana, Mash Well In A Small Bowl And Set Aside.
3. Mix: In A Medium Mixing Bowl, Combine Nut Butter, Sugar, Vanilla And Flax Egg/Banana. Mix Well Until Dough Is Stiffened And Hard To Mix, About 1 Minute.
4. Scoop + Flatten: Using A Tablespoon Measuring Spoon, Scoop Out Rounded Tablespoons, Place On Cookie Sheet About 2 Inches Apart. Using A Fork Or Your Index And Middle Finger, Gently Press To Flatten, Making A Crisscross Pattern. Your Dough Will Seem Oily And Stick To The Fork, It’S Normal With The Almond Butter, Just Be Patient, You’Ll Be Rewarded Soon. Feel Free To Sprinkle A Little Sugar Or Salt Over Each Cookie.
5. Bake: Place Baking Sheet On Middle Rack And Bake 10 – 13 Minutes. Remove From Oven And Let Cool.
6. Store: These Cookies Are Best Stored Covered On A Couple Paper Towels, The Paper Towels Will Help Soak Up Some Of The Natural Oil From The Almond Butter. Cookies Will Keep For Up To 5 Days. Or Keep In The Refrigerator For Up To 2 Weeks.
7. Makes Approx. 18 Cookies (That’S If You Don’T Eat The Batter!).

title: HEALTHY CINNAMON OATMEAL
ingredients:
1. 1 Cup Old Fashioned Oats
2. 12 Teaspoon Cinnamon
3. 1 34 Cup Water Or Unsweetened Nondairy Milk Or A Combo
4. Healthy Toppings
5. 12  23 Cup Cranberry Applesauce
6. 1 Apple Cored And Diced
7. Small Handful Pecans Whole Or Broken
8. Small Handful Pepitas
9. Small Handful Pomegranate Seeds
10. Pure Maple Syrup To Taste
preparation:
1. Stovetop: In A Medium Sauce Pan, Add The Oats, Cinnamon And Water/Milk, Bring To A Boil, Reduce Heat To Low And Simmer, Uncovered, Over A Gentle Boil For 5 – 7 Minutes, Stirring Frequently. Let Cool A Few Minutes Before Serving.
2. Microwave: In A Medium Sized Bowl, Add Oats, Cinnamon, And Water/Milk. Microwave On Full Power For 3 – 4 Minutes. After 3 Minutes, Keep An Eye On The Bowl, If It Starts To Boil Over, Open The Microwave Door To Stop It. Once Oatmeal Has Settled, Continue Cooking Keeping An Eye On It. Add 30 Seconds – 1 Minute More If Needed.Let Cool A Few Minutes Before Serving.
3. Serve With The Healthy Toppings, Or Anything Else You May Like, And Enjoy A Healthy Bowl Of Cinnamon Oatmeal.
4. Store Leftover Oatmeal In An Air-Tight Container In The Refrigerator For Up To 4 Days Or Freeze In Individual Portions For Up To 2 Months.
5. To Reheat, Add A Splash Of Water To Theoatmealandheatover Low Heat On The Stove, Or On High Power In The Microwave For 1 – 2 Minutes.

title: OVERNIGHT STEEL-CUT OATS OATMEAL
ingredients:
1. 1 12 Cups Steelcut Oats
2. 3 Cups Water
3. 3 Cups Unsweetened Almond Milk Or Your Favorite Plant Milk
4. 1  2 Ripe Bananas About 34  1 Cup Mashed
5. 14 Cup Pure Maple Syrup
6. 1 12 Teaspoons Cinnamon
7. 1 Teaspoon Vanilla Extract Or Vanilla Powder
8. Pinch Of Mineral Salt
9. Optional Toppings
10. Chopped Walnuts Almonds Or Pecans
11. Banana Slices Or Fresh Berries
12. Goji Berries Or Toasted Coconut
preparation:
1. Grease Bowl: Lightly Grease The Sides Of The Insert With Oil. This Will Keep The Mixture From Sticking To The Sides, But Can Be Optional.
2. Slow Cooker:In A 4 – 6 Quart Crock Pot, Place Oats, Water, Milk, Mashed Banana, Maple Syrup, Cinnamon, Vanilla And Pinch Of Salt, Stir To Mix, Cover And Cook On Low For 3 – 5 Hours, Or Up To 8 Hours For Overnight. If You Can, It Does Help To Stir 2 -3 Times During Cooking, But Is Not Necessary.
3. Cool Down: Once Done, Give A Good Stir, And Let Cool A Bit. Oats Will Thicken Upon Standing. Add A Tad Extra Non-Dairy Milk Or Water As Needed To Create Desired Consistency. Adding More Liquid Will Create A Creamier Consistency.
4. Serve: Spoon Into Individual Serving Bowls And Top With Any Of The Optional Toppings Of Choice. Drizzle A Little Non-Dairy Milk Over Top If You Like.
5. Store: Leftovers Can Be Stored In An Airtight Container In The Refrigerator For 5 – Days. Can Be Reheated With A Little Milk Or Water On The Stove Top Over Low, Or In The Microwave For A Minute Or Two.

title: VEGAN SHEPHERD’S PIE
ingredients:
1. 2 Tablespoons Olive Oil Or 14 Cup Water
2. 1 Small Yellow Onion About 1 Cup Diced
3. 2 Cloves Garlic Minced
4. 1 Cup Carrots Diced
5. 1 Cup Celery Diced
6. 2 Teaspoons Dried Thyme Or Half Rosemary
7. 2 Cans 14Oz Lentils Or 3 Cups Cooked Drained And Rinsed
8. 2 Tablespoons Allpurpose Flour
9. 2 Tablespoons Tomato Paste
10. 1 Tablespoon Vegan Worcestershire Sauce Such As Annies Or Use Tamari Or Soy Sauce
11. 1 Rounded Teaspoon Dijon
12. 1 Cup Frozen Peas
13. 1 Cup Frozen Corn Or 6Oz Can Drained
14. 1 Cup Vegetable Broth
15. Salt  Pepper To Taste
16. Potato Topping
17. 2 12 Lbs Potatoes Yukon Or Russet Cut Into 1 Inch Cubes
18. 4 Tablespoons Vegan Butter My Favorite It Miyokos Or Olive Oil
19. 13  23 Cup Unsweetened Plain Almond Milk Or Vegan Cream
20. 1 Teaspoon Garlic Powder
21. Salt  Fresh Cracked Pepper To Taste
preparation:
1. Potatoes:Cut Potatoes Into 1 Inch Cubes. Addpotatoesto A Large Pot And Cover With Water (I Added A Few Sprigs Of Thyme To The Water.) Bring To A Boil And Simmer Until Potatoes Are Tender, About 15 Minutes. Drain Potatoes, Addbutter/Oil, Mash Into Potatoes To Melt, Add Milk And Stir Until Desired Consistency. Add Salt And Freshly Ground Pepper To Taste And Set Aside In A Warm Place.
2. Preheat Oven To 400 Degrees F.
3. Filling: In A Shallow Pot Or Dutch Oven, Warm Oil/Water Over Medium Heat, Add Onions, Carrots, Celery And Garlic, Saute For 5 Minutes. Add Thyme And Rosemary, Cook For 1 Minute More. Add The Lentils, Tomato Paste, Worcestershire Sauceandflour, Mix Well Until Flour Is Incorporated And No White Streaks. Add Thecorn, Peas, Dijon, Salt, Pepper, And Vegetable Broth, Simmer For 5 Minutes, Stirring Occasionally. Taste For Flavor And Season With More Salt And Pepper To Taste.
4. Assemble: Using The Pot You Cooked The Vegetables Or Transfer To A 9 X 9 Or 9 X 11 Baking Dish, Evenly Layer The Mashed Potato Topping Overtop, Spreading From Edge To Edge. Leave As Is, Or Make A Pattern On The Potatoes Using The Back Of A Fork, Dragging It From Edge To Edge, Then Repeat In The Other Direction For A Criss Cross Pattern.
5. Bake: If The Baking Dish Seems Very Full, Place It On A Rimmed Baking Sheet So That The Filling Doesn’T Bubble Over Into Your Oven. Place In The Oven And Bake, Uncovered, For 25 – 30 Minutes. Let Cool For 15 Minutes Before Serving.
6. Store: Leftovers Can Be Stored In The Refrigerator For Up To 5 – 6 Days In A Covered Container. To Store Longer, Keep In The Freezer For 2 – 3 Months.

title: SIMPLE MISO NOODLE SOUP (7 Ingredients)
ingredients:
1. 1 Package 9 Oz Noodles Udon Soba Ramen Mung Bean Or Rice Noodles Or 2 Packages 7 Oz Fresh Udon Noodles
2. 5 Cups Of Water
3. 4  5 Tablespoons Miso Use Your Favorite
4. 7 Oz Organic Tofu Firm Or Extrafirm Cut Into 12 Inch Cubes
5. 1 Nori Sheet Cut Into Slivers Or Small Handful Of Wakame Or Dulse
6. 1 Cup Shredded Carrots
7. 2  3 Scallions Thinly Sliced
preparation:
1. Noodles: Cook Noodles According To Package Directions And Set Aside. If Using The Precooked Or Fresh Noodles, Simply Add To The Soup To Warm Through.
2. Heat Soup: In A Medium Size Pot, Add Water/Broth And Miso, Gently Heat Over Medium-Low, Stirring Occasionally, Until Miso Has Dissolved. If Using A Seaweed That Needs To Be Soaked, Add It With The Soup. It Will Add A Nice Flavor To The Soup Base. Remove The Seaweed With Tongs, Slice And Place Back Into The Soup. Addtofu And Noodles To The Pot, Continue To Cook Until Warmed Through.
3. Serve: Using Tongs, Place Noodles In Individual Bowls. Ladle In The Soup Broth And Tofu Cubes. Add The Shredded Carrots, Scallions And Nori Slivers (If Using) Over Top And Give A Good Stir. Enjoy This Simple, Healthy And Delicious Soup!
4. Store: Leftovers Can Be Stored In The Refrigerator For Up To 5 Days.

title: EASY LEMONY ASPARAGUS PASTA SALAD
ingredients:
1. 12 Oz Whole Grain Pasta Penne Elbow Farfalle Or Your Favorite
2. 1 Lb Asparagus Tough Ends Removed And Cut Into 1 Inch Length Pieces
3. 12 Cup Smoked Sundried Tomatoes Julienned And Chopped
4. 12 Red Onion Diced
5. 12 Cup Parsley Chopped Optional
6. Lemongarlic Dressing
7. 3 Tablespoons Extra Virgin Olive Oil
8. 2 Tablespoons Dijon Mustard
9. Juice Of Large 2  3 Lemons About 4  6 Tablespoons
10. 4  6 Garlic Cloves Minced
11. 12 Teaspoon Fresh Cracked Pepper
12. Mineral Salt To Taste
preparation:
1. Pasta & Asparagus: Bring A Large Pot Of Water To A Boil, Add Pasta And Cook According To Package Directions. Three (3) Minutes Before Pasta Is Ready, Carefully Add Cut Asparagus And Cook Together, Allowing The Asparagus To Blanch And Brighten In Color. Drain And Rinse Under Cool Running Water, And Set Aside.
2. Dressing: In A Small Mixing Bowl, Whisk Together The Ingredients For The Dressing Until The Dijon And Oil Have Emulsified And Become Creamy.
3. Assemble: Add The Pasta And Asparagus Back To The Pot It Was Cooked In. Add The Sun-Dried Tomatoes And Red Onion, And Optional Parsley, Pour The Dressing Over Top And Toss Well To Coat. Add More Pepper To Taste.
4. Serve: Serve At Room Temperature Or Chilled.
5. Store: Keep Pasta Salad In The Refrigerator, In An Airtight Container, For Up To 6 Days.
6. Make Ahead 1 Of 2 Ways:
7. Cook Everything As Directed, Omitting The Dressing Until Ready To Serve. Keep The Pasta Salad In The Refrigerator, When Ready, Whip Up The Dressing And Toss It All Together Just Before Serving.
8. Make The Pasta Salad As Directed, Store In The Refrigerator Until Ready To Serve. To Add Moisture When Ready To Serve, Squeeze More Lemon Over Top.

title: SPICY THAI CURRY CORN SOUP
ingredients:
1. 1 Tablespoon Sesame Or Coconut Oil Or 14 Cup Water For Water Saute
2. 1 Small Onion Chopped
3. 2 Cloves Garlic Chopped
4. 1Inch Knob Of Ginger Peeled And Grated Or Minced
5. 4 Ears Of Corn Cut Off The Cob
6. 3 Celery Stalks Leaves Ok Too Diced
7. 1 Red Bell Pepper Diced
8. 5  8 Oz Mushrooms Shiitakes Or Cremeni Sliced
9. 3  4 Teaspoons Yellow Curry Powder
10. 1 Teaspoon Red Pepper Flakes Or To Taste
11. 1 Can 15 Oz Coconut Milk Full Or Low Fat
12. 2 Cups Unsweetened Almond Milk Or Plant Milk Of Choice
13. 1 Cup Water Or Vegetable Broth Plus More As Needed
14. Juice Of 1 Lime
15. Large Handful Spinach Chopped If Needed
16. Salt  Pepper To Taste
preparation:
1. Prep: Have All The Veggies Chopped, Diced, And Ready To Go.
2. Saute: Heat Oil In A Large Pot Over Medium-High Heat And Saute Onions Until Translucent, About 5 Minutes. Add The Garlic And Ginger, Saute 1 Minute More. Add The Corn, Celery, Bell Pepper, And Mushrooms, Cook 3 – 4 Minutes.
3. Simmer: Pour In The Coconut Milk, Unsweetened Non-Dairy Milk, Water, Curry Powder, Red Pepper Flakes, Salt & Pepper To Taste, And Cook On Medium Heat For 10 Minutes Or Until Heated Through.
4. Add Spinach + Lime: Add Lime Juice And Spinach, And Cook Until Wilted To Your Liking. Test For Flavors Adding More Spices If Desired.
5. Serve With Lime Wedges And Cilantro If You Like.
6. Store: Leftovers Can Be Stored In The Refrigerator For Up To 5 – 6 Days. For Longer Storage, Freeze For Up To 2 – 3 Months. Let Thaw Before Reheating.

title: BALELA SALAD RECIPE
ingredients:
1. 2 Cans 14 Oz Chickpeas Garbanzo Beans Drained And Rinsed
2. 1 Can 14 Oz Black Beans Drained And Rinsed
3. 2 Firm Roma Tomatoes Seeds Removed And Diced
4. 12 Red Onion Diced
5. 12 English Cucumber Diced
6. 3 Cloves Garlic Minced
7. 2 Tablespoons Fresh Mint Chopped
8. 14 Cup Fresh Parsley Chopped
9. 1 Teaspoon Sumac
10. Mineral Salt  Fresh Cracked Pepper To Taste
11. 3  4 Tablespoons Olive Oil I Used A Garlic Infused Olive Oil
12. Juice Of 1 Large Lemon
13. Optional Ingredients To Serve With
14. Pita Bread
15. Hummus
16. Arugula
preparation:
1. In A Large Mixing Bowl, Combine The Chickpeas, Black Beans, Tomatoes, Onion, Cucumber, Garlic, Mint And Parsley. Add The Sumac, A Good Drizzle Of Olive Oil, Lemon Juice, Salt And Pepper. Mix Well To Combine.
2. Serve At Room Temperature Or Chilled. Store Leftovers In An Airtight Container In The Refrigerator For Up To 5 Days.
3. This Salad Is Perfect In Pita Bread That’S Been Slathered With Hummus And Layered With Arugula. Alternately, You Can Add A Large Handful Of Arugula To The Salad And Serve With Pita Bread And Hummus On The Side.
4. Notes:
5. Try Adding A Dash Of Cayenne Pepper Or Red Pepper Flakes For A Little Heat.

title: LENTIL LASAGNA & ASPARAGUS
ingredients:
1. 1 Jar 28 Oz Pasta Sauce Or Make Marinara Sauce
2. 1  12 Cups Cooked Lentils Or 1 Can 15 Oz Lentils Drained And Rinsed
3. 2 Cups Vegan Ricotta Cashew Ricotta Cheese Or Tofu Ricotta
4. 1 Lb Asparagus Ends Trimmed
5. 12 Wholegrain Lasagna Noodles
preparation:
1. Cashew Ricotta: Make Your Cashew Cheese Ahead Of Time And Keep In The Fridge. If You’Re In A Pinch You Could Just As Easily Prepare It While The Noodles Are Cooking.
2. Preheat Oven To 400 Degrees.
3. Noodles: Cook Your Noodles, Al Dente, And Set Aside.
4. Layer: In The Bottom Of An 8×11 Baking Dish, Add 1/2 Cup Of Pasta Sauce, Then 3 Noodles, 1/2 Of The Ricotta Cheese, 1/2 Of The Lentils, And Repeat With The Noodles, Sauce, Cheese, Beans, Noodles, And Sauce.
5. Top With Asparagus, Coating Them Lightly With Some Extra Virgin Olive Oil And Balsamic Vinegar. Top With A Few Twists Of Sea Salt And Cracked Pepper.
6. Bake For 20 – 25 Minutes, Until Asparagus Is Slightly Tender.
7. Serve With Artisan Bread On The Side To Wipe Up Any Remaining Sauce.
8. Store: If You Manage To Have Any Leftovers, Store In Airtight Container In Refrigerator For Up To 5 – 6 Days.

title: VEGETABLE VEGAN FRITTATA
ingredients:
1. 1 Tablespoon Olive Oil Or 14 Cup Water For Water Saute
2. 2 Medium Potatoes Diced With Or Without The Skin
3. 1 Small Onion Diced
4. 1 Bell Pepper Diced
5. 1 Zucchini Diced
6. 2 Cloves Garlic Minced
7. Handful Grape Tomatoes Halved Or Quartered
8. Pinch Of Red Pepper Flakes Optional
9. Mineral Salt And Pepper To Taste
10. For The Blenderfood Processor
11. 1 Package 16 Oz Organic Silken Tofu Soft Or Firm Drained No Pressing Needed
12. 14 Cup Unsweetened Nondairy Milk
13. 2 Heaping Teaspoons Cornstarch Arrowroot Or Tapioca Flour
14. 2  3 Tablespoons Nutritional Yeast
15. 1 Teaspoon Mustard Any Kind Or 12 Teaspoon Mustard Powder
16. 1 12 Teaspoons Dried Tarragon Thyme Or Basil Or A Combo
17. 12 Teaspoon Garlic Powder
18. 12 Teaspoon Salt
19. 14 Teaspoon Turmeric
20. 18 Teaspoon Pepper Black Or White
preparation:
1. Preheat Oven To 375 Degrees F.
2. Saute: Heat Oil In A Pan Over Medium Heat, Saute Potatoes For 5 Minutes, Add Onion And Cook An Additional 5 Minutes. Add Bell Pepper, Zucchini And Garlic, Cook Until Softened. Add Tomatoes And Optional Red Pepper Flakes, Cook Another Minute Or Two. Season With Salt And Pepper To Taste.
3. Tofu Egg: In A Food Processor/Blender, Combine The Remaining Ingredients And Process Until Smooth. Taste For Seasoning.
4. Assemble: Add The Tofu Mixture To The Pan The Vegetables Cooked In And Mix Well. Spoon Mixture Into A Lightly Greased 9 Inch Round Pie/Quiche Dish Or Springform Pan. Level The Top Flat With The Back Of A Spatula Or Spoon And Make Sure All Edges Are Filled.
5. Bake: Place On The Middle Rack And Bake For 35 – 45 Minutes, Frittata Should Be Firm To The Touch. If Top Starts To Brown Too Much, Cover With Foil Or Small Silpat. Remove And Let Cool For At Least 10 Minutes. If Using A Pie/Quiche Dish, Loosen The Edges Of The Frittata, Place A Plate Over Top And Carefully Flip So Frittata Falls Onto The Plate And Serve (This Step Is Optional).
6. This Frittata Is Wonderful With Sliced Avocado And A Little Sriracha For Heat.
7. Store: Leftovers Can Be Stored In The Refrigerator For 4 – 5 Days. To Keep Longer, Store In The Freezer Using Freezer Safe Containers For Up To 2 – 3 Months.

title: Santa Fe Black Bean Burger (Vegan)
ingredients:
1. 1 Can 14 Oz Organic Black Beans Drained And Rinsed
2. 14 Cup Oats Rolled Or Quick
3. 14 Cup Flax Meal Or Flour Of Choice See Notes
4. 1 Teaspoon Cumin
5. 12 Teaspoon Cayenne Or Chipotle Powder
6. 12 Teaspoon Garlic Powder
7. 12 Teaspoon Pink Salt
8. 14 Cup Chunky Salsa Or Pico De Gallo Give Or Take
9. 1 Tablespoon Olive Oil For Panfrying
10. Cornmeal For Dusting I Used Coarse Grind Optional
preparation:
1. Mash Black Beans: In A Medium-Size Bowl, Mash Black Beans With A Strong Fork Or Use A Potato Masher, Leaving Some Chunks For Texture If You Like.
2. Make Patty Mixture: Add Oats, Flour, Spices, Salt, And Salsa, Mix Again, Feel Free To Use Your Hands If You Like To. If The Mixture Is Too Wet, Add More Flax Meal/Flour To The Mix, But Really It Should Be Ok. Taste For Flavor.
3. Shape Patties: Divide The Mixture And Shape Your Patties Into Whatever Size You Like. I Like To Make 2 Jumbo-Sized Burger Patties, But You Can Make 3 – 4 Smaller Ones. Give A Light Dusting Of Cornmeal If You Have It. It Will Give A Nice Crunch, Flavor And Cook Up Crispy.
4. Cook On The Stovetop, Oven, Or Grill:
5. Stovetop: Heat 1 Tablespoon Oil In A Skillet On Medium. Cook For About 5 Minutes On Each Side. It’S Ok If The Cornmeal Gets A Little Crispy. Trust Me, It’S Delicious!
6. Oven (Oil-Free): Preheat Oven To 350 Degrees F. Line A Baking Sheet With Parchment Or A Silicone Mat. Place Patties On A Baking Sheet, Place In The Oven On The Center Rack, And Bake For 10 – 15 Minutes, Flip And Repeat.
7. Serve With Your Choice Of Accompaniments Such As Red Onion Slices, Leafy Greens, Salsa, Or Vegan Mayo. Add Some Mashed Avocado As A Spread Or Sliced Avocado If You Prefer. Or Serve On A Bed Of Leafy Greens.
8. Makes 2 Jumbo-Sized Patties Or 3 – 4 Smaller Ones.

title: SPANISH VEGAN PAELLA
ingredients:
1. 12 Heaping Teaspoon Saffron Or Turmeric
2. 2 Tablespoons Olive Oil Or 14 Cup Waterveggie Broth
3. 1 Large Yellow Onion Thinly Sliced
4. 2 Bell Peppers Red Orange Or Yellow Cored And Thinly Sliced
5. 4 Cloves Garlic Minced
6. 1 12 Cups Green Beans Or Asparagus Cut Into 2Inch Pieces
7. 1 Lb 16 Oz Tomatoes Seeded And Diced Or 1 Can 14 Oz Diced Tomatoes  Juice
8. 1 12 Teaspoons Smoked Paprika
9. 1 Teaspoon Red Pepper Flakes Optional
10. 2  3 Bay Leaves
11. 1 12 Cups Short Grain Rice Valencia Or Arborio
12. 3 12 Cups Lowsodium Vegetable Broth
13. 12  1 Teaspoon Salt Or To Taste
14. 1 Canjar 14 Oz Artichoke Hearts In Water Drained And Quartered
15. 1 Cup Green Peas Fresh Or Frozen Thawed
16. Chopped Parsley Leaves To Garnish
17. Lemon Wedges To Serve
preparation:
1. Steep Saffron: In A Small Bowl, Add The Saffron Threads To 3 Tablespoons Warm Water, Let Set 10 Minutes To Steep. If Using Turmeric, Skip This Step And Add Turmeric With The Other Spices.
2. Saute: Heat Olive Oil/Broth Over Medium Heat In A Large Wide Flat-Bottomed Pan Or Paella Pan (A Dutch Oven Or Large Pot Would Also Suffice). Add Onions And Bell Peppers, Cook Until Tender, About 5 Minutes. Add Garlic, Green Beans, Tomatoes, Smoked Paprika, Red Pepper Flakes And Bay Leaves, Cook Another 3 Minutes Stirring Frequently. For Softer Veggies, Cook Another 7 Minutes Or So, Totaling 10 Minutes After Adding The Latter Ingredients.
3. Add Rice + Broth: Add In The Rice, Broth, Saffron Mixture/Turmeric And Salt. Gently Move The Vegetables Around So The Rice Falls To The Bottom Of The Pan As Much As Possible.
4. Boil + Simmer: Bring To A Boil, Reduce Heat To Medium Or Medium-Low And Cook At A Continuous Gentle Boil, Uncovered, For 15 Minutes. Do Not Stir The Rice. If Using A Large Paella Pan (15 Inches Or So) You’Ll Want To Rotate The Pan Over The Burner Every So Often To Help Cook The Rice Evenly. Stay In The Kitchen And Clean Up So You’Re Right There To Adjust The Pan When Needed. If Liquids Seem To Boil Off Too Quickly, Add A Little Extra Warm Water/Broth.
5. Add Peas And Artichokes: After 15 Minutes Of Cooking, Scatter The Peas And Artichoke Hearts On Top, Cook For 5 Minutes More.
6. Cover To Steam: Turn Off Heat And Cover For 10 Minutes With A Kitchen Towel Or Other Cover Of Choice. This Will Allow The Rice To Absorb Any Remaining Liquid As Well As Steam The Peas And Warm The Artichoke Hearts And Any Other Optional Ingredients Added As Noted Below. Once Done, Lightly Fluff The Rice And Serve. Discard Bay Leaves Before Eating. Season With Salt, Pepper Or More Paprika To Taste.
7. Serve: Garnish With Chopped Parsley. Pairs Perfectly With A Side Of Leafy Greens And A Big Squeeze Of Lemon Over Top. Enjoy Straight From The Pan Or Serve In Individual Bowls.

title: Fresh Herb Potato Salad
ingredients:
1. 2 Lbs Baby Potatoes Red White Or Gold
2. 14 Cup Parsley Finely Chopped
3. 2 Tablespoons Chives Chopped
4. 2 Tablespoons Thyme Finely Chopped
5. Dressing
6. 14 Cup Olive Oil
7. 2 Teaspoons Dijon
8. 2 Garlic Cloves Minced
9. Juice Of 12 Lemon
10. Mineral Salt  Pepper To Taste
preparation:
1. Potatoes: Wash, Scrub And Quarter The Potatoes (If Using Larger Potatoes, Cut Into 1-Inch Cubes). In A Medium-Sized Pot, Add Potatoes And Cover With At Least 1 Inch Of Water. Bring To A Boil, Reduce Heat To Medium-Low And Cook At A Gentle Boil For 6 – 8 Minutes, Or Until Fork-Tender. Drain Potatoes And Run Under Cool Running Water. Let Cool For About 10 Minutes.
2. Dressing:While Potatoes Are Cooking, Whisking Together The Dressing Ingredients In A Small Bowl.
3. Herbs: While The Potatoes Are Cooling, Chop The Herbs.
4. Assemble: Add The Cooled Potatoes To A Medium-Sized Bowl, Top With The Herbs And Dressing, Mix Until Well Coated. Season With More Salt And Pepper To Taste.
5. Store: Potato Salad Is Best Kept In The Refrigerator In An Airtight Container For Maximum Freshness And Will Last For Up To 5 Days.

title: Vegan Banana Chocolate Chip Muffins (Healthy)
ingredients:
1. 1 34 Cups Spelt Flour Or Flour Of Choice
2. 2 Teaspoons Baking Powder
3. 12 Teaspoon Baking Soda
4. 14 Teaspoon Salt
5. 14 Cup Light Flavored Olive Oil Or Warmed Coconut Oil
6. 1 Teaspoon Vanilla Extract
7. 13 Cup Organic Sugar Pure Cane Or Coconut Sugar
8. 4 Small Or 3 Large Bananas Preferably Overripe Mashed
9. 14 Cup Or So Chocolate Chips I Used Enjoy Life Mini
preparation:
1. Preheat Oven To 350 Degrees.
2. Dry Ingredients: Combine Flour, Baking Powder, Baking Soda And Salt In A Medium/Large Size Bowl And Set Aside.
3. Wet Ingredients: In A Small Bowl, Mix Oil, Sugar And Vanilla.
4. Banana: Mash Bananas, You Should Have Approx. 1 1/2 – 1 3/4 Cups.
5. Combine: Add The Wet Ingredients And Bananas To Batter And Mix Until Just Combined. If Mixture Seems Too Dry, Add A Bit Of Non-Dairy Milk, Maybe 1/4 – 1/2 Cup At Most (I’Ve Never Had To Add Any).
6. Chocolate: Add In Chocolate Chips And Mix Briefly.
7. Fill Muffin Tin: Spoon Into A Well-Greased Or Paper-Lined Muffin Tin, Fill Each Muffin About 2/3 – 3/4 Full.
8. Bake: Place In The Oven, On The Center Rack, And Bake For About 20 – 25 Minutes. You Can Also Do The Toothpick Test In The Center Of One Muffin, If It Comes Out Clean It’S Ready.
9. Remove From Oven And Let Cool For 10 Min.
10. Makes About 12 Muffins.
11. Store: Once Completely Cooled, Store Muffins In An Airtight Container Lined With A Paper Towel On The Counter For Up To 3 – 4 Days. The Paper Towel Will Soak Up Moisture And Keep Them From Getting Too Moist. Or Store In The Refrigerator For Up To A Week.

title: EASY LEMON ROSEMARY WHITE BEAN SOUP
ingredients:
1. 2 Tablespoons Olive Oil Or 14 Cup Water
2. 1 Small Onion Diced
3. 3 Large Carrots Sliced Or Diced
4. 2 Stalks Celery Sliced
5. 2 Cloves Garlic Minced
6. 12 Teaspoon Each Dried Thyme  Rosemary
7. 3 Cans 15Oz White Beans Cannellini Great Northern Or Chickpeas Drained And Rinsed
8. 4  5 Cups Low Sodium Vegetable Broth
9. 2 Tablespoon Tahini
10. 1  2 Lemons Juice Of 1
11. Salt  Pepper
12. Fresh Chopped Parsley To Serve
preparation:
1. Saute: In A Large Pot, Heat Oil Or Water Over Medium Heat, Add Onion, Carrots, And Celery, Saute For 7 Minutes. Add Garlic, Thyme And Rosemary And Cook 1 Minute More.
2. Simmer: Add The White Beans, Vegetable Broth, Tahini, And Salt + Pepper, Give A Good Stir, Bring To A Boil, Reduce Heat To Low, Cover Askew, And Let Simmer For 10 Minutes, Stirring Occasionally.
3. Add Lemon: Remove From Heat, Add Lemon Juice And Let Cool A Bit Before Serving. The Broth Will Thicken Upon Standing. Season With More Salt, Pepper Or Herbs As Desired.
4. Serve In Individual Bowls With Fresh Parsley And Squeeze Of Lemon. Add A Sprinkle Of Red Pepper Flakes For A Little Heat.
5. Pairs Well With Homemade Artisan Bread And Side Classic House Salad.
6. Store: Leftovers Can Be Kept In The Refrigerator For Up To 5 – 6 Days. For Longer Storage, Keep In The Freezer For Up To 2 – 3 Months. Let Thaw Before Reheating.

title: BEST VEGAN MASHED POTATOES
ingredients:
1. 2 12 Lb Potatoes Russet Yukon Or Red Cut Into 1 12  2 Inch Cubes
2. 14 Cup Vegan Butter Miyokos Pref Or Extra Virgin Olive Oil At Room Temp
3. 34  1 Cup Unsweetened Nondairy Milk Almond Cashew Oat Soy Etc At Room Temp
4. Salt  Pepper To Taste
preparation:
1. Boil Potatoes: In A Large Pot, Add Potatoes And Fill Pot With Enough Water To Cover Potatoes, There Should Be About 1 – 2 Inches Of Water Overtop. Bring To A Boil, Cover Askew, Reduce Heat To Low, And Cook Over A Gentle Boil For 15 – 20 Minutes. Potatoes Are Done When Fork Tender. Remove From Heat, Carefully Drain Water.
2. Mash: Add The Fat (Butter/Oil) Right Away, Mash Into The Potatoes With A Potato Masher. Pour In The Non-Dairy Milk And Continue To Mash Until Fluffy And Creamy. Season To Taste With Salt And Pepper.
3. Store: Leftovers Can Be Stored In The Refrigerator For Up To 5 – 6 Days. For Longer Storage, Freeze For Up To 2 – 3 Months. Let Thaw Before Reheating.

title: NO BAKE CHOCOLATE PISTACHIO COOKIE BALLS
ingredients:
1. 34 Cup Medjool Dates About 7  8 Pitted And Chopped
2. 14 Cup Unsweetened Shredded Coconut Optional
3. 12 Cup Rolled Oats
4. 1 Cup Pistachios Divided
5. 1 Teaspoon Vanilla
6. 3 Tablespoon Pure Maple Syrup
7. Pinch Of Himalayan Salt
8. 14 Cup Chocolate Chips Raw Dark Chocolate Chips  Cacao Nibs Or Vegan Chocolate Chips
preparation:
1. Process: Place All Ingredients In Food Processor Except For 1/4 Cup Of The Pistachios, Water And Chocolate Chips. Blend Until Combined, Stopping To Scrape Down The Sides As Needed. If Mixture Seems Too Dry, Add 1 Tablespoon Of Water At A Time, As Needed.
2. Add Remaining Ingredients. In A Medium Bowl, Add The Dough With Remaining Pistachios And Chocolate Chips, Mixing Well With A Spoon Or Your Hands.
3. Roll: Using A 1 Tablespoon Measuring Spoon, Scoop Up Rounded Tablespoons Of The Dough And Roll Into Balls.
4. Makes Approx. 12 – 14 Cookie Balls
5. Roll In Crushed Pistachios (Optional): Place 1/4 – 1/3 Pistachios Between A Piece Of Folded Parchment Paper And Crush With The Bottom Of A Glass That Has A Flat Surface Or Use A Rolling Pin. Roll Your Balls On The Crushed Pistachios.
6. Store: Store Energy Bites In An Airtight Container. They Will Keep In The Fridge For A Couple Weeks And Last Even Longer In The Freezer. You Can Always Make These Ahead For Special Occasions.

title: OAT JAM THUMBPRINT COOKIES
ingredients:
1. 1 12 Cups Oat Flour See Notes
2. 12 Cup Rolled Oats
3. 1 Teaspoon Cinnamon
4. 1 Teaspoon Baking Powder
5. Pinch Of Mineral Salt
6. 14 Cup Pure Maple Syrup
7. 14 Cup Olive Or Coconut Oil In Its Melted State Or Applesauce
8. 2 Tablespoons Almond Butter Optional
9. 1 Teaspoon Vanilla Extract
10. Triple Berry Chia Jam Or 100 Fruit Jam For Filling
preparation:
1. Preheat Oven To 350 Degrees. Lined A Baking Sheet With Parchment Paper Or Silicone Mat.
2. Mix: In A Medium Sized Bowl Combine The Flour, Oats, Cinnamon, Baking Powder And Salt. Add Coconut Oil, Maple Syrup And Vanilla, Blend Until It Comes Together And Forms A Ball.
3. Roll & Flatten: Scoop 1 Rounded Tablespoons Of The Dough And Shape Into A Ball. The Dough Will Be Moist So Just Do The Best You Can. You Can Also Shape The Mound On The Cookie Sheet. Using The Bake Of A Rounded Teaspoon, Make An Impression In The Middle Of Each Cookie. If Edges Crack A Bit, Press It Together Gently.
4. Add Jam: Add One Teaspoon Of Fruit Jam/Filling Into Each Dent.
5. Bake: Place In The Oven, On The Center Rack, And Bake For 10 -13 Minutes, Rotating The Baking Sheet Once. Remove From Oven, Let Cool A Few Minutes.
6. Makes 12 Cookies

title: ROASTED FENNEL & POTATO SOUP
ingredients:
1. 1 12 Lbs 3  4 Yukon Gold Potatoes Cut Into 1 Inch Chunks
2. 2 Large Or 3 Small Fennel Bulbs Sliced Into 1 Inch Slices Reserve Some Fronds For Garnish
3. 1 Medium Onion Peeled And Cut Into 12 Inch Slices
4. 2 Tablespoons Olive Oil
5. Mineral Salt  Fresh Cracked Pepper To Taste
6. 2 Cups Water Or Lowsodium Vegetable Broth
7. 2 Cups Unsweetened Plain Nondairy Milk
preparation:
1. Preheat Oven To 425 Degrees F.
2. Roast: Using A Large Rimmed Baking Sheets Lined With Parchment Paper Or Silpat, Place Potatoes, Fennel & Onion.. Add A Light Drizzle Of And Toss Vegetables Until Evenly Coated, Spread Evenly On The Sheet. Add A Sprinkle Of Salt & Pepper Over Top. Place In Oven And Cook For 30 – 40 Minutes, Tossing Half Way. Potatoes Should Be Fork Tender. Remove Any Fennel That Seems To Burn Too Fast. Reserve A Few Fennel Pieces For Garnish If You Like.
3. Puree: In A Large Pot, Add Water/Broth And Milk. Add Vegetables And Using An Immersion Blender, Puree Until Desired Consistency, Add More Liquids As Needed. You May Like Your Soup A Little Chunky Or Smooth. You May Also Use A Blender/Food Processor To Puree The Soup (This  May Take Two Batches To Complete). Taste For Flavor Adding More Salt & Pepper As Needed.
4. Warm: Bring The Pot To The Stove And Heat Soup Over Medium Low Until Warmed Through.
5. Serve: Fill Individual Bowls And Top With Reserved Fennel And Fresh Cracked Pepper. Pairs Well With Crusty Bread Of Choice.

title: VEGAN CAESAR DRESSING
ingredients:
1. 34 Cup Raw Cashews
2. 12 Cup Water
3. 1  2 Garlic Cloves
4. 2 Teaspoons Capers
5. 1  2 Teaspoons Dijon
6. 2 Teaspoons Lemon Juice Or 1 Tsp Apple Cider Vinegar
7. 12 Teaspoon Salt
8. 14 Teaspoon Pepper
preparation:
1. Soak The Cashews: Soak The Cashews In Hot, Not Boiling, Water For At Least Five Minutes. If You Have Digestive Sensitivities To Nuts, Be Sure To Soak Them In Cool Water For 2 – 3 Hours To Aid With Digestion. Drain Well.
2. Assemble Dressing: Using A Blender Or Food Processor, Add The Soaked Cashews, Water, Garlic, Capers, Dijon, Lemon Juice, Salt And Pepper, Blend Until Smooth And Creamy, About 1 Minute, Stopping To Scrape Down The Sides As Needed. If You Find It Tough To Blend, Add A Tad Bit More Water As Needed To Help It Move Along. Add More Water To Thin. Taste For Flavor.
3. Makes About 1 Cup.
4. Store: Leftovers Can Be Stored In The Refrigerator For Up To 6 – 7 Days. Give A Good Stir Before Using.

title: FARMER’S MARKET SALAD
ingredients:
1. Salad
2. 2 Heads Romaine Chopped Or 5 Oz Spinach Or Baby Kale
3. 2 Ears Of Corn Cut Off The Cob
4. 1 Small Zucchini Cut Into Moon Shapes
5. 1  2 Nectarines Or Peaches
6. 1 Red Bell Pepper Diced
7. 1 Avocado
8. Salt  Pepper To Taste
9. Sundried Tomato Vinaigrette
10. 12 Cup Water
11. 3 Tablespoons Olive Oil
12. 3 Tablespoons Sundried Tomatoes Packed In Oil Or Water Soaked See Notes
13. 2 Tablespoons Apple Cider Vinegar
14. 1 Clove Garlic
15. 14 Teaspoon Salt
16. 18 Teaspoon Pepper
preparation:
1. Vinaigrette: Place Ingredients Into A Food Processor Or Blender, And Blend Until Mixture Is Fairly Smooth. Makes About 1 Cup.
2. Salad: For The Salad Use A Much, Or As Little, As You Like Of Each Vegetable.
3. Assemble: Fill Individual Bowls With Leafy Greens And Top With The Remaining Produce. Drizzle With Sun-Dried Tomato Vinaigrette Overtop. Finish It Off With Mineral Salt And Freshly Cracked Pepper To Taste.
4. Salad Serves 2 Generously. Dressing Serves 4.

title: CURRY LENTIL SOUP
ingredients:
1. 14 Cup Water Or 2 Tablespoons Olive Oil
2. 1 Medium Onion Diced
3. 2 Stalks Celery Diced
4. 2 Carrots Diced
5. 1 Tablespoon Tomato Paste Or Red Curry Paste
6. 3 Cloves Garlic Minced Or 1 Teaspoon Garlic Powder
7. 1  2 Tablespoons Curry Powder To Taste
8. 1 Teaspoon Cumin
9. 12 Teaspoon Red Pepper Flakes Optional
10. 1 Can 15 Oz Diced Tomatoes With Juice Or 2  3 Roma Tomatoes Diced
11. 2 Bay Leaves
12. 1 12 Cups Lentils Brown Or Green  See Notes
13. 3 Medium Potatoes Diced 12 Inch Cubes
14. Mineral Salt  Pepper To Taste
15. 6 Cups Water Or Vegetable Broth Or Combo
16. 1 Bunch Or 2 Large Handfuls Of Greens I Used Baby Kale  Spinach
17. Lemon Wedges To Serve
18. Chopped Cilantro To Serve
preparation:
1. Stovetop:
2. In Large Stock Pot, Heat Water/Olive Oil Over Medium Heat. Add Carrots, Celery And Onions, Saute For 5 Minutes. Add The Curry/Tomato Paste And Garlic, Stir To Combine And Cook For 3 Minutes. Add The Curry, Cumin And Red Pepper, Mix To Combine And Cook For 1 More Minute.
3. Add Lentils, Tomatoes, Potatoes, Then Water/Broth (In This Order The Tomatoes And Potatoes Won’T Splash), Bay Leaves, Salt And Pepper, Bring To Boil Over Medium High Heat. Turn Heat To Low, Cover And Simmer For 30 – 35 Minutes, Stirring Occasionally.
4. Add The Greens Five Minutes Before The Soup Is Done. Add Additional Water As Needed, Maybe Up To 1 Cup. Remove Bay Leaves. Season With Salt & Pepper.
5. Instant Pot: Add The Ingredients, Except The Greens And Water/Oil, To The Bowl Of Your Pressure Cooker. Place The Lid On The Instant Pot And Set The Release Valve To The Sealed Position. Press The Manual Button And Set The Timer At 10 Minutes. Once Finished, Set Valve To Quick Release Or Let It Release Pressure On It’S Own (Takes About 20 Minutes). Remove Lid, Stir In The Greens. Remove Bay Leaves Before Serving.
6. Slow Cooker: Add The Ingredients, Except The Greens And Water/Oil, To The Bowl Of Your Crock Pot. Cover With Lid. Set On High For 3 – 4 Hours Or Low For 6 – 8 Hours. Add Greens, Let Them Wilt. Remove Bay Leaves And Enjoy!
7. Serve With Homemade Vegan Naan Or Artisan Bread. Add A Squeeze Of Lemon Juice For A Touch Of Brightness And Chopped Fresh Cilantro For Extra Flavor!
8. Store: Leftovers Will Keep In The Refrigerator For 4 – 5 Days. Store Covered. To Keep Longer, Store In The Freezer In Freezer Safe Containers For 2 – 3 Months.

title: SWEET POTATO & KALE SOUP
ingredients:
1. 1 Tablespoon Olive Oil Or 14 Cup Water For Water Saute
2. 1 Small Onion Diced
3. 2 Garlic Cloves Minced
4. 3 Oz Package Sundried Tomatoes About 1 Cup Chopped
5. 2 Teaspoons Herbes De Provence Or Thyme
6. 2 Large Sweet Potatoes Cut Into 12 Inch Cubes Or Use Your Favorites
7. 2 Cans 15 Oz Cannellini Beans Drained And Rinsed Or 3 Cups Cooked
8. 5  6 Cups Vegetable Broth Or Water Or Combo
9. 1 Small Bunch Of Kale About 7 Cups Center Stem Removed And Chopped
10. 2 Tablespoons Nutritional Yeast
11. Mineral Salt  Fresh Cracked Pepper To Taste
preparation:
1. Saute: In Large Pot Or Dutch Oven, Heat Oil/Water Over Medium Heat, Add Onion And Saute For 5 Minutes. Add Garlic, Sun-Dried Tomatoes And Herbes De Provence, Saute 1 Minute.
2. Simmer: Add Potatoes, Beans And Broth, Bring To A Boil, Cover, Turn Down Heat To Low And Simmer For 15 To 20 Minutes, Or Until Potatoes Are Tender. Just Before Soup Is Done, About 5 Minutes Beforehand, Add Kale And Continue To Cook.
3. Season: Remove From Heat, Add Nutritional Yeast And Give A Good Stir. Season With Salt & Fresh Cracked Pepper To Taste.
4. Serve: Ladle Into Individual Serving Bowls And Top With A Light Dusting Of Almond Parmesan For Extra Flavor. Soup Pairs Well With Homemade Artisan Breadfor Soaking Up The Juices.
5. Makes 4 – 6 Servings
6. Store: Leftovers Can Be Kept In The Refrigerator For Up To 4 – 5 Days, In A Covered Container. To Keep Longer, Store In The Freezer For Up To 2 – 3 Months, Let Thaw Before Reheating.

title: VEGAN COLLARD GREENS
ingredients:
1. 1 Tablespoon Olive Oil Or 14 Cup Vegetable Broth
2. 1 Cup Diced Onion Shallot Or Onion
3. 2  3 Garlic Cloves Minced
4. 1 Bunch Collard Greens 12  16 Oz Stems Removed And Chopped
5. 1 Can 14Oz Diced Tomatoes Juices Mostly Drained Or 2 Fresh Tomatoes Diced
6. 1 Can 14Oz Beans Blackeyed Peas Chickpeas Or Cannellini Drained And Rinsed Optional
7. 2  3 Tablespoons Lemon Juice 1 Large Or 2 Small Lemons
8. 12 Cup Vegetable Broth As Needed
9. Salt  Pepper To Taste
10. Red Pepper Flakes To Taste Optional
preparation:
1. Saute: Heat Oil In A Large Skillet Over Medium Heat, Add Onion, And Sauté 5 Minutes. Add The Garlic, Saute 1 Minute More.
2. Cook: Add Collards, Tomatoes, Lemon Juice, And Salt & Pepper, Cook Another 5 Minutes. Add Optional Beans, And Continue To Cook, Stirring Occasionally, Until Collards Are Wilted And Beans Are Heated Through. I Prefer My Collards Al Dente And Cooked For About 5 Extra Minutes. Ending Cooking Time Will Vary Depending On How Soft You Like Your Collards. Add The Vegetable Broth If Cooking Longer, Or As Needed.
3. Serve In Individual Bowls With A Squeeze Of Lemon. Pair With Vegan Cornbread Or Jalapeno Vegan Cornbread Muffins.
4. Store:Leftovers Can Be Stored In The Refrigerator For Up To 5 Days.

title: RAINBOW ASIAN ZUCCHINI NOODLE BOWL + CRISPY TOFU
ingredients:
1. 7 Oz Organic Tofu Use Firm Extrafirm Or Superfirm
2. 1 12  2 Teaspoons Sesame Oil Or Other Neutral Oil
3. Dash Of Garlic Powder
4. 2 Large Zucchini Spiralized Or Julienned
5. 1 Red Bell Pepper Thinly Sliced
6. 2  3 Green Onions Sliced Into 1 Inch Pieces
7. 1 Cup Shredded Carrots Or 2 Carrots Julienned
8. Large Handful Snow Peas
9. 18 Red Cabbage Thinly Shredded
10. 14  13 Cup Chopped Cilantro
11. Handful Bean Sprouts Optional
12. Chopped Peanuts To Serve
13. Lime Wedges To Serve
14. Spicy Peanut Dressing
15. 3 Rounded Tablespoons Almond Butter Or Natural Peanut Butter
16. 1 Clove Garlic Minced Or Good Pinch Of Garlic Powder
17. 2 Tablespoons Tamari Coconut Aminos Or Soy Sauce
18. 1 Tablespoon Pure Maple Syrup
19. 12 Teaspoon Ground Ginger Or 1 Teaspoon Freshly Grated
20. 2 Limes Juice Of
21. 14  12 Teaspoon Red Pepper Flakes Or 12  1 Teaspoon Sambal Oelek
22. Water As Needed To Thin About 2  3 Tablespoons
preparation:
1. Press & Cook Tofu: If Using Firm Or Extra-Firm Tofu, You’Ll Most Likely Want To Press It A Bit To Remove Excess Water (If Using Super-Firm Tofu You Can Skip This Step). Place Tofu Between A Clean, Double Folded Kitchen Towel. Place A Heavy Book Or Pot Over Top To Use As A Press. Let Set For At Least 10 Minutes, And Up To 30 Minutes. Once Done, Slice Tofu Into 1 Inch Pieces, About 1/4 Inch Thick. Heat A Pan Over Medium Heat, With 2 Teaspoons Of Oil, Twirl The Pan To Coat With Oil. Place Tofu In Pan And Cook About 4 – 5 Minutes, Flip, Sprinkle With A Little Garlic Powder And Cook Another 4 – 5 Minutes. The Time Given Here Is For Super-Firm Tofu. If Using Firm Or Extra-Firm, You’Ll Most Likely Need To Cook About 4 Minutes Longer On Each Side. Tofu Will Be Ready When Golden On Both Sides. Set Aside.
2. Mix Dressing: In A Small Bowl, Combine The Ingredients For The Dressing And Mix Well. Add Water 1 Tablespoon At A Time To Thin As Needed. If Dressing Becomes To Thin, Add A Little Nut Butter. Taste For Flavor And Set Aside. Keep In Mind That The Flavors Will Mellow Into Each Other As It Sits. If Using Coconut Amino’S, You May Want To Add A Pinch Of Mineral Salt. Taste Again For Flavor Before Mixing With Vegetables.
3. Prep And Cook Vegetables: Once Vegetables Are Prepped, Heat Wok Or Pan Over Medium-High Heat. Add The Bell Peppers, Carrots, Green Onions, Cabbage And Snow Peas, Cook Stirring Constantly For 2 Minutes. We Just Want Them To Become Ever So Slightly Softened (Not Too Much). Add Zucchini Noodles And Cook For 2 More Minutes, Stirring Constantly To Ensure Everything Cooks Evenly. Remove From Heat. Toss In Tofu And Cilantro, Give A Good Stir. Add Peanut Dressing Over Top And Mix Well To Coat.
4. Serve: Place Portions In Bowl And Serve With Lime Wedges, Chopped Peanuts And Optional Bean Sprouts. Easy, Peasy – Delicious!
5. Notes:
6. If You’Re A Vinegar Lover, Feel Free To Add 1 Tablespoon Apple Cider Or Rice Wine Vinegar To The Dressing Ingredients.
7. If Allergic To Peanuts, Use Sesame Seeds Instead (Or Cashews).

title: VEGGIE TOFU SCRAMBLE WITH DIJON
ingredients:
1. 1 Tablespoon Olive Oil
2. 12 Onion Diced
3. 1 Block 1416 Oz Tofu Firm Or Extra Firm Drained No Need To Press
